loans.name: Nour

texts.en:
Nour is a 25-year-old married woman from Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan.
She is looking to improve her family living conditions so she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to do maintenance work on her house.
Nour is looking to purchase a house for her family instead of their current rented one.
Because Nour is under 30 years old, her loan is considered as a youth loan.

loans.use: to do maintenance work on her house

loans.name: Margot Alicia

texts.es: Margot Alicia de cincuenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su hijo, ella posee un chalet donde vende productos de primera necesidad frijoles, pan, leche, huevos, entre otros, además los viernes y sábados vende pescado; tiene varios años con el negocio y es muy conocida en el lugar se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Margot es una mujer emprendedora muy dedicada a su labor, piensa que el futuro pertenece a quienes creen en la belleza de sus sueños,  quiere ver crecer su negocio y necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, etc. Margot es muy responsable y de buena paga tiene la certeza que podrá pagar el financiamiento y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Margot Alicia is 57 years old and lives with her child. She owns a chalet where she sells staple products like beans, bread, milk and eggs, among other iterms. In addition, she sells fish on Fridays and Saturdays. She has had the business for several years and is very well known in the area and has many customers because all that she sells is of high quality, at affordable prices and the service is excellent. 

Margot is a entrepreneurial woman who is very dedicated to her work. She hopes that the future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. She wants to see her business grow and needs to invest in supplies. For this reason she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that she will be able to purchase staple grains, instant products, candy, drinks, etc. Margot is very responsible and a good pay reputation. She is certain that she will be able to pay back the loan and at the same time give her a family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy staple grains, instant products, candy and drinks.

loans.name: Choan

texts.en: Choan is a responsible father who is managing a rice mill business to support his family needs. He is now 36 years old and has four school-age children. Due to financial difficulty, he cannot afford to finance the repair and maintenance of his business as well as the schooling of their children. In this regard, Choan decided to increase their proceeds. He is now requesting for a loan of P25,000 to be utilized in repairing and maintaining his rice mill business. He hopes that through his patience and hard work, he will increase his income. In the future, they are hoping that their children will earn a degree and have a better life.

loans.use: to repair and maintain his rice mill business

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet so the man in the photo is her husband.
Amal is a 50-year-old married woman from Ashrafia, Amman in Jordan, and she supports 4 members of her family.
Amal has a small grocery store. She is requesting a loan of 499 JD to purchase food goods and products.
Amal is looking to increase her family income and provide them with better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase food goods and products for her grocery store

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes vive junto a su hija de dieciséis años la cual todavía estudia; Ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas de queso, frijol con queso y revueltas, además por las tardes vende tortillas, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia, se ha hecho de mucha clientela la gente la prefiere porque sus pupusas son exquisitas elaboradas con material de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es el más rápido del lugar siempre está a la orden del día; Mercedes es una mujer trabajadora muy entusiasta de cumplir sus sueños su más grande secreto para alcanzar el éxito es la constancia y dedicación, quiere hacer crecer su negocio y necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito  que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, quesillo, frijol, verduras etc. Mercedes tiene buenas referencias crediticias y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez logrará darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Mercedes lives with her sixteen year old daughter who is still in school.  She sells cheese, beans with cheese and mixed beans, cheese and fried pork skin pupusas (filled tortillas that are grilled and topped with sliced cabbage) besides selling tortillas in the afternoons.  She has been in this business for some years and she has a lot of experience.  She has many customers who prefer her pupusas because they are delicious, made with first quality ingredients and are reasonably priced.  Also she serves the fastest in the area and each day she is always ready to take care of her customers.  Mercedes is a hardworking woman and very enthuiastic about fulfilling her dreams.  Her biggest secret in this is her consistency and dedication.  She wants her business to grow and she needs to buy ingredients and that is why she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL.  This financing will allow her to buy corn wholesale, cheese, beans, vegetables, etc.  Mercedes has a good credit history and she is very responsible.  She assures us that she will be able to get out of debt and at the same time succeed in giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale, cheese, beans and vegetables

loans.name: Nehaya

texts.en:
Nehaya is a conservative person. She is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet, so the man in the photo is her husband.
Nehaya is a 36-year-old married woman from Irbid, Jordan, and she is supporting 2 members of her family.
Nehaya is looking to improve her family living conditions, so she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to do maintenance work on her house.
Nehaya is looking to purchase her own personal computer and renew her house furniture.

loans.use: to do maintenance work on her house

loans.name: Kayi

texts.fr:
Kayi est une femme de 35 ans. Elle est mariée à un transporteur et est mère de 4 enfants. Trois de ses enfants sont scolarisés. Le plus vieux a 11 ans et le plus jeune 2 ans.
Kayi est revendeuse ambulante depuis 2004. Elle propose à ses clients des tissus et des pagnes. Elle souffre d’un manque d’argent ce qui l’empêche d’avoir un stock consistant.
De fait, Kayi sollicite un premier prêt chez WAGES. Elle utilisera son crédit afin de s’approvisionner en marchandises. A terme, elle voudrait ouvrir une boutique de vente de pagnes et de tissus. Elle espère aussi pouvoir acheter un terrain.
texts.en:
Kayi is a 35-year-old woman. She is married to a man who works in transportation, and is a mother of four. Three of her children are in school. The eldest is 11 years old and the youngest is two years old.

Kayi has been a traveling saleswoman since 2004. She offers her customers fabric and pagnes [traditional cloth]. Her problem is a lack of money, which prevents her from having a substantial stock. 

This is why Kayi is seeking her first loan from WAGES. She will use her loan to bolster her stock. Eventually, she would like to open a boutique selling pagnes and fabric. She also hopes to be able to purchase some land.

loans.use: To purchase fabric and pagnes [traditional cloth].

loans.name: Reina Beatriz

texts.es: Reina Beatriz  de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y sorgo, tiene muchos años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas , el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola, ella comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija, estas personas siempre prefieren su producto pues es de calidad y a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es inigualable, adicional a su trabajo en el campo también en su vivienda posee una pequeña tienda que le da ganancias extras para el mantenimiento del hogar; Reina es una mujer dedicada a su labor, luchadora siempre dispuesta a trabajar duro para alcanzar el éxito, quiere aprovechar el auge de su negocio para aumentar la producción y así poder tener mejores ganancias, necesita invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, abono, insecticida, herramienta, etc. Reina Beatriz tiene buenas referencias de pago y está segura que podrá saldar su deuda a tiempo, y a la vez tiene la confianza que podrá darle a su familia la vida que se merecen.
texts.en: Reina Beatriz is 33 years old and lives with her life partner and their children.  She makes a living as a farmer, and grows corn and sorghum.  She has farmed for many years, and this valuable experience helps her to grow the best crops.  Her plot of land is located in an agricultural area.  Reina Beatriz sells her produce in all of the adjacent districts and already has a large group of loyal customers.  These individuals always prefer her produce, since it is high quality and she sells it for very affordable prices—plus her service is unbeatable.  In addition to her agricultural activities, Reina Beatriz also has a small store in her house that provides additional income for maintaining her home.  Reina Beatriz is very dedicated to her work, and is always ready to work hard so she can succeed.  She wants to make the most of her business’s growth so she can increase her production and thus have higher earnings.  She needs to invest in supplies but doesn’t have enough capital.  That is why Reina Beatriz is asking Apoyo Integral for a loan that will allow her to purchase corn and sorghum seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools.  Reina Beatriz has good references and is confident that she will be able to pay off her debt on time.  She is also confident that she can provide her family with the life they deserve.

loans.use: to purchase corn and sorghum seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools.

loans.name: Yamen

texts.en:
Yamen is a 31-year-old married man from Marka, Amman, Jordan.
Yamen has his own Gaz van through which he sells Gaz cylinders to houses and shops.
Recently, Yamen purchased a shop for his business and he is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase more Gaz cylinders to fill his shop.

loans.use: to establish a Gaz cylinder for trading purposes

loans.name: Kossiwa

texts.fr:
Kossiwa est une femme célibataire et sans enfant.
Elle est revendeuse ambulante depuis 2008. Elle propose à ses clients des bazins et des pagnes. Cependant, elle souffre d’un manque d’argent chronique.
Kossiwa sollicite un premier prêt auprès de WAGES afin de s’approvisionner en bazins et pagnes. Elle aimerait réinvestir les profits supplémentaires dans l’activité. A terme, elle souhaiterait également ouvrir une boutique de vente et dégager des bénéfices qui puissent pourvoir aux besoins de la famille.
texts.en:
Kossiwa is a single woman with no children.

She has been a traveling saleswoman since 2008. She offers her customers damask and pagnes [traditional cloth]. However, she suffers from a chronic lack of money.

Kossiwa is seeking her first loan from WAGES in order to purchase damask and pagnes. She would like to reinvest the extra profits in her business. Eventually, she also hopes to open a shop and make a profit that can provide for the needs of the family.

loans.use: To purchase pagnes [traditional cloth] and damask.

loans.name: Ayoko

texts.fr:
Ayoko est une femme de 58 ans. Elle est mariée à un chef shipping et mère de trois enfants âgés entre 15 et 23 ans. 
Depuis 2000, Ayoko vend des oignons à son domicile. Elle souffre d’un retard dans ses livraisons. 
Ayoko sollicite un premier prêt chez WAGES afin d’étendre son activité, d’augmenter son capital et vendre de nouveaux produits comme l’ail et des épices.  Elle aimerait plus spécialement devenir une grande grossiste de vente d’oignons et ouvrir une grande boutique qu’elle confierait ensuite à ses enfants.
texts.en:
Ayoko is a 58-year-old woman. She is married to a shipping manager and is the mother of three children between the ages of 15 and 23.

Since 2000, Ayoko has been selling onions from her home. She is experiencing a delay in her deliveries.

Ayoko is seeking her first loan from WAGES in order to extend her business, increase her capital and sell new products, such as garlic and spices. She would especially like to become a major wholesaler of onions and open a large store, which she would then entrust to her children.

loans.use: To purchase onions.

loans.name: Komlan

texts.fr:
Komlan est un homme âgé de 35 ans. Marié à une revendeuse, il est aussi père d’un enfant de 7 ans. 
Menuisier de profession, il travaille le bois depuis 2005 à son domicile. 
Komlan sollicite un quatrième prêt chez WAGES afin d’acheter des planches pour la fabrication de fauteuils et d’armoires. Il souhaite réinjecter les profits supplémentaires dans la création d’une entreprise pour le traitement du bois (sciage, coupure…). A terme, il aimerait devenir un grand professionnel dans le domaine du bois et créer une école de formation en menuiserie.
texts.en:
Komlan is a 35-year-old man. Married to a retailer, he is also the father of seven children.

A carpenter by trade, he has been working with wood from his home since 2005.

Komlan is seeking his fourth loan from WAGES in order to purchase planks for the construction of chairs and cupboards. He hopes to reinvest the extra profits in the establishment of a business for wood treatments (sawing, cutting, etc.). Eventually, he would like to become a leading professional in the wood industry, and establish a carpentry training school.

loans.use: To purchase planks for the construction of furniture and cupboards.

loans.name: Emilio

texts.es: El señor Emilio, de 37 años de edad, esta casado con la señora Dionicia hace más de 16 años. Ambos cuentan con una instrucción de nivel primario con 4 hijos dependientes que estudian. Viven hace 15 años en la comunidad de 2da Candelaria, sindicato Rodeo Alto hacia el norte de Colomi. El señor Emilio y su esposa se dedican a la actividad agrícola y son muy trabajadores: venden papa, haba, oca y papaliza, los cuales cultivan en un terreno propio dentro de 7,800 hectáreas. Don Emilio con su esposa pasaron por nuestra oficina de CIDRE IFD a solicitar un crédito que les faltó urgentemente para comprar dos cabezas de ganado vacuno (yunta) para su uso en las faenas agrícolas. Se sienten muy felices al haber conseguido lo que más estaban necesitando; ahora sembrarán en más superficies ya que no tenían yunta para preparar terreno para la siembra de esta campaña agrícola.
texts.en:
Sr. Emilio is 37 years old and has been married to Sra. Dionicia for more than 16 years. Both of them have an elementary school education and together they have four dependent children who are in school. They have lived 15 years in the community of Candelaria, which is part of the Rodeo Alto syndicate and located north of Colomi.

Sr. Emilio and his wife are hardworking farmers who sell potatoes, beans, oca, and ulluco. They cultivate their own land, which measures 7,800 hectares. Don Emilio and his wife came to the offices of CIDRE IFD in order to request a loan. They are lacking urgent funds to purchase two head of cattle (oxen) for performing farm work. Emilio and his wife are pleased that they will be able to secure what they need most. They will now be able to plant on more of their land since they currently do not have the oxen required to perform the farm work.

loans.use: to buy oxen for performing farm work.

loans.name: Vanna

texts.en:
Vanna is 52 years old. He is the father of six children and lives with his wife in Siem Reap province, Cambodia. He has been involved in an agricultural business for more than 20 years and has extensive experience. He is successful in his career. He is involved in cultivating rice and fattening up animals. He earns approximately $5 per day. His wife runs a business buying freshwater eels and fish to resell. She earns about $6 per day. Three of his children are employed. They earn about $15 per day. 

Due to difficulties with his family’s transportation, Vanna is requesting a loan of $1000 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase will enable him to use money saved on his transportation expenses to support his family. In the future, he would like to expand his business and help his children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, he hopes to build a new house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting

loans.name: Mario Alfonso

texts.es: Mario Alfonso de 43 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos, formando una familia muy unida y trabajadora. Mario  ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cultivo de frijoles y maíz, una actividad muy usual en la zona rural del país. En la actualidad él junto a toda su familia se dedican a realizar este trabajo en una parcela en la cual también habitan. Mario solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de maíz y frijoles para poder hacer crecer la siembra de su parcela y poder cosechar más granos básicos. Con el aumento de las ventas Mario tiene la certeza que podrá contar con una vida mejor junto a su familia.
texts.en: Mario Alfonso, 43, lives with his wife and two children, forming a united and hardworking family. Mario has dedicated a large part of his life to growing beans and corn, a typical activity in rural areas of the country. Currently he and his family do this work on a parcel of land where they also live.  Mario asks for a loan that will help him to have enough money to buy a larger quantity of corn and beans so he can increase how much he plants on his land and harvest more basic grains. With the increase in sales, Mario is certain that he and his family will have a better life together.

loans.use: to buy corn to plant.

loans.name: Sarom

texts.en:
Sarom is 43 years old, married, and blessed with three children, in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in agricultural business for more than five years; she has extensive experience and is successful in her career. She is involved in cultivating rice and fattening up pigs. Approximately, she earns $6 per day. Her husband helps her run the business. Two of her children are employed, one as a security guard and the other as a construction worker. They earn about $8 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family’s transportation, Sarom is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase a motorbike to commute. This purchase would enable her to use the money she saves on transportation expenses to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her pig farm and to rebuild her present house to make it more comfortable for her family.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to commute

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 31-year-old married man from Baqa'a, Jordan.

Ahmad has his own barber shop. He is requesting a loan of 400 Jordan dinars (JD) to purchase cosmetics products for his shop.

Ahmad is looking to establish another branch for his shop with an aspiration of purchasing a house for the family.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics products for his barber shop.

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en: Godfrey is a 34-year-old married man with five children living in Kagadi, Uganda. He is a teacher by profession and for the 12 years that he has been in service, he has been able to pay school fees for his children and build a semi-permanent house for a residence. He would like to educate his children and upgrade his studies as he is aiming to become a principal. Godfrey wants a loan to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Richar Yefri

texts.es: Richar Yefri trabaja como mecánico y albañil, y también se dedica en época de cosecha a la siembra de frijoles y maíz, el vive junto a su esposa e hijos, y se destaca por ser una persona muy trabajadora y responsable quien trabaja muy duro por salir adelante.  Con el enorme deseo de aumentar su producción de granos básicos Richar solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de semilla de maíz y frijoles para sembrar, así mismo desea comprar unos depósitos para colocar la cosecha y de esta forma mantenerla siempre fresca. Richar junto a su esposa comercializan los granos básicos en diferentes tiendas y mercados, dándolos a muy buenos precios, con el préstamo también comprara abono y pesticidas para mantener sano los granos, y de esta forma asegurarse de brindar siempre la mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Richar Yefri works as a mechanic and bricklayer, and also works [during] the harvest season planting beans and corn.  He lives with his wife and children, and is noted for being a very hardworking and responsible person who works very hard to get ahead.  

With the overwhelming desire to increase his production of staple grains, Richar has requested Apoyo Integral for a loan.  Through [this loan], he would be able to rely on having the money needed to invest in the purchase of a greater quantity of maize and bean seeds to sow, as well as the purchase of storage areas to put the harvest in [for the purpose of] always keeping it fresh.  Richar, together with his wife, sell [their] staple grains to different shops and markets, giving them very good prices.  With the loan, he would also like to buy fertilizer and pesticides in order to maintain healthy grains; thus insuring [that he is] always offering the best quality.

loans.use: to purchase beans to harvest.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es:
Gerardo, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio agrícola, pues considera tener una buena atención y un buen servicio con estos préstamos, que le ayudan a realizar su trabajo en la tierra, se comprará abono, herbicidas, insecticidas, que son necesarios para darle inicio a la siembra de maíz en una manzana de terreno.
El considera que a través de los préstamos kiva, está logrando mejorar su producción de granos básicos, le ha podido ayudar a su familia en este periodo y su condiciónes considera que van creciendo de la misma manera.
texts.en:
Gerardo is requesting a new loan so that he can invest in his farming business. He says that he has received good attention and good service with these loans, which have helped him complete the work on his land. Gerardo will buy compost, herbicides, and insecticides since these are necessary supplies that he needs to begin planting corn on one plot of land.

He believes the Kiva loans have enabled him to improve his production of basic grains. This helped his family during this period and his conditions improved at the same time.

loans.use: to buy compost, herbicides, and insecticides.

loans.name: Ana Ester

texts.es: Ana Ester  de cuarenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, sorgo y frijol tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura y ya tiene experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener siempre las mejores cosechas y a la vez le ayuda a mejorar su trabajo día con día, el terreno de siembra está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y está cercano a la localidad donde reside, comercia en todos los alrededores y se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles además se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad con los clientes; Ana es una mujer emprendedora, muy entregada a su labor, siempre está dispuesta a buscar oportunidades que le ayuden a llegar al éxito y no piensa rendirse; en la última temporada de siembra tuvo muchas pérdidas debido al clima, por eso en esta ocasión quiere recuperarse  e invertir en insumos para aumentar la producción por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, frijol, fertilizante, herramientas, etc. Ana Ester tiene buen record crediticio y muy buenas referencias de pago tiene la seguridad que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia la calidad de vida que se merecen.
texts.en:
Ana Ester is 42 years old and lives with her life partner and her son.  She makes a living by growing corn, sorghum and beans.  She has many years of  valuable experience that allows her to grow the best crops and better her job day by day.  The land where she plants her seeds is located in high altitude and is near her home.  She does business in many places and has built a strong customer base.  Her customers know that everything she sells is of high quality and affordable prices.  In addition, she has a good relationship with her customers.

Ana is an entrepreneur.  She is very dedicated to her work, is always ready to seek new opportunities that will give her success and never thinks to quit.  Last season she incurred losses due to the weather which is why she is looking to invest in supplies to increase production.  This is why she is seeking a loan from Integral that will allow her to purchase seeds for corn, sorghum, beans, fertilizer, and tools etc.  

Ana Ester has a good credit history and many good references.  She is sure she will be able to pay back the loans and at the same time giver her family the quality of life they deserve.

loans.use: to purchase seeds for corn, sorghum, beans, fertilizer, and tools.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es: Guadalupe de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de experiencia  muy valiosa que le permite  obtener siempre las mejores cosechas, está muy orgulloso de su trabajo y su familia lo apoya en un cien por ciento, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de incidencia agrícola muy cercano a la localidad donde reside, comercia en todos los alrededores y ya tiene muy buena clientela pues saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable, adicional a su trabajo de agricultor también se dedica a ser albañil así logra completar todos los gastos del hogar; Guadalupe es un hombre visionario que desea un futuro próspero y está seguro que podrá lograrlo, desde hace mucho tiempo quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herramientas etc. Guadalupe tiene moral intachable y buenas referencias de pago tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Guadalupe, 52, lives with his partner and their children. He grows corn and beans. He has worked as a farmer for some years and has made himself very valuable through his experience which allows him to get the best harvests. He's very proud of his work and his family supports him 100%. The land that they work is located in an agricultural zone near where they live. He sells his product in nearby areas and already has very good clientele because they know that everything he sells is good quality and at affordable prices; what's more, the service is unequaled. In addition to farming, he also works as a mason to cover the costs of the household.

Guadalupe is a visionary man who wants a prosperous future and is sure that he can achieve it. For a long time he has wanted to increase production but lacked the capital, which is why he's asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, tools, etc. Guadalupe has irreproachable morals and good references. He is certain that he will be able to pay off his debt and at the same time give his family a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer and tools.

loans.name: Darwin Adalberto

texts.es: Darwin Adalberto de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y sorgo, tiene muchos años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le ayuda a obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cerca de su vivienda, comercia en todos los lugares aledaños y tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de calidad y a excelentes precios además el servicio es inigualable; Darwin es un hombre dedicado a su labor siempre dispuesto a salir adelante y alcanzar sus sueños, piensa que si lucha no perderá la guerra, quiere aumentar la producción y necesita invertir pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, sorgo, fertilizante, abono, herramienta, etc. Darwin tiene buenas referencias de pago y está seguro que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Darwin Adalberto, 33, lives with his life partner.  He grows corn and sorghum.  He has worked in agriculture for many years and has a lot of experience, which helps him get better harvests.  His plot of land is located very close to his home in an area with a lot of farming.  He sells in all the nearby places and has a lot of customers because people know that everything he sells is high quality at a good price; also, his service is incomparable.

Darwin is dedicated to his work and always ready to get ahead and realize his dreams.  He thinks he will not lose the battle if he struggles.  He wants to increase production and he needs to invest, but he needs capital.  This is why he is asking Integral for a loan that will allow him to buy corn seeds, sorghum, fertilizer, manure, tools, etc.

Darwin has good payment references and is sure he will be able to repay the debt and give his family a better quality of life at the same time.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, sorghum, fertilizer, manure, and tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy liquor to restock her business.

loans.name: Neris Armando

texts.es: Neris Armando de 42 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos, él es una persona muy humilde pero emprendedora quien trabaja muy arduamente día con día. Neris posee una parcela en la que se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijoles, la cual posteriormente comercializa en diferentes departamentos del país, obteniendo muy buenas ganancias. Él desea aumentar su cosecha en un 50% razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar pesticidas, abono, arados y semillas de frijol y maíz de la mejor calidad para sembrar y así obtener una excelente cosecha. El mayor deseo de Neris es mejorar grandemente su negocio, garantizando la calidad de su semilla y así satisfacer siempre a sus clientes y así mismo obtener otros nuevos, lo que le permita mejorar la estabilidad económica de su familia.
texts.en:
Neris Armando, 42, lives with his wife and children.  He is a very modest but enterprising person who works very hard every day.  Neris has a plot of land where he grows corn and beans, which later he sells in different departments around the country, getting good profits.

He wants to increase his crop by 50%.  This is the reason he's asking Integral for a loan with which he can buy pesticide, manure, hoes, and the highest quality of bean and corn seed to plant and get an excellent harvest.

Neris's biggest desire is to greatly improve his business, guaranteeing the quality of his seed and this way always satisfy his customers as well as get new ones, which will allow him to improve his family's financial stability.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: Roberto es un señor muy trabajador y responsable, vive junto a su familia la cual está conformada por su esposa y cuatro hijos menores de edad, por quienes debe trabajar arduamente para salir adelante. Roberto se dedica al cultivo de cereales como: maicillo y maíz, los cuales comercializa por mayoreo en  mercados y tiendas. Este trabajo representa la única fuente de ingresos para él y su familia, por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL con el cual pueda invertir en su negocio comprando mayor cantidad de materia prima para la siembra de cereales y así producir mayor cantidad, con lo que podrá mejorar de forma significativa sus ventas y por consecuente sus ganancias, el trabajo  de Roberto es bastante pesado  ya que debe sembrar las semillas para luego cosecharlas y posteriormente poder venderlas a muy buenos precios, por lo que desea poder aprovechar al máximo la temporada de inicio de siembra comprando semilla de excelente calidad en cantidades mayores.
texts.en: Roberto is a very hardworking and responsible man. He lives with his family, which is made up of his wife and four children. He works hard to get ahead for them. Roberto farms grains, such as sorghum and corn, which he sells at wholesale price in markets and stores. This work is the only source of income for him and his family. He is requesting a loan from Integral so that he can invest in his business by buying a larger amount of inputs for planting grains so that he can produce more. This would allow him to significantly improve his sales, and therefore his earnings. Roberto’s work is quite hard since he has to plant the seeds, harvest them, and then sell them at good prices. So, he wants to take the best advantage possible of the beginning of the planting season by buying a larger quantity of excellent-quality seed.

loans.use: to buy seed

loans.name: Farid

texts.en: Farid is a 59-year-old man from Hay Nazal, Jordan who supports 2 members of his family. He is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to help maintain and expand his home for his family.

loans.use: to pay for the maintenance of his home.

loans.name: Phy

texts.en:
Phy is 25 years old. She is married and blessed with two children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been cultivating rice and fattening animals for more than ten years, earning approximately $2 per day. Her husband is a sculptor who earns about $4 per day. 

Due to the difficulty in her family's transportation, Phy is requesting a loan of $700 to purchase a motorbike for commuting. This purchase would enable her to use the money saved on her transportation expenses to support her family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor's degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Dilma Esperanza

texts.es: Dilma Esperanza es una mujer muy humilde y responsable, quien trabaja arduamente por sacar adelante a sus ocho hijos, ella es una madre soltera que debido a las circunstancias debe trabajar el doble para poder contar con el sustento diario y todo lo necesario para su hogar. Dilma se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos como maicillo, frijoles y maíz, el cual comercializa posteriormente. Así mismo se dedica a la pesca artesanal, lo cual es una actividad bastante normal en la zona rural del país, día tras día Dilma toma sus redes y su pequeña lancha dispuesta a pescar la mayor cantidad de mariscos para poder venderlos con turistas y personas de las zonas cercanas. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para poder comprar semilla de maíz, frijoles y maicillo y  así aumentar su producción de granos básico, también usará el préstamo para comprar nuevas redes y materia prima para realizar la pesca artesanal, trabajo al cual sus hijos ya le brindan una pequeña ayuda.
texts.en: Dilma Esperanza is a very responsible and humble person who works very hard to help her eight children get ahead. She is a single mother, so due to these circumstances she has to work twice as hard to earn enough for her family’s daily needs and for everything that her household requires. Dilma grows basic grains such as sorghum, beans, and corn, which she later sells. She also works in artisanal fishing, which is quite common in the rural areas of the country. Day after day, Dilma takes her nets and her small boat to go fishing for as many fish as she can so she can then sell them to tourists and other people in the nearby areas. She is requesting a loan from Integral for seed for corn, beans, and sorghum so she can increase her production of basic grains. She will also use the loan to buy new nets and materials for fishing, work which her children already help her with a little.

loans.use: to buy seed and also nets and other materials for fishing

loans.name: Daniel Antonio

texts.es: Daniel Antonio vive junto a su esposa un hijo y una nuera, El posee una pequeña tienda en la que se comercializan: jugos, huevos, leche, pan y golosinas, el negocio es atendido por el mismo. Así mismo para brindarle una ayuda extra la esposa de Daniel se dedica a elaborar tortillas, las cuales comercializa al mediodía y por las noches, Daniel le ayuda a repartirlas de casa en casa, con la intención de dar un mejor servicio  y así obtener nuevos clientes. Tanto Daniel como su esposa son dos personas muy trabajadoras, responsables y dedicadas a tener una vida mejor. Daniel solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la tienda y comprar mayor cantidad de productos de conveniencia y primera necesidad como: pan, leche, huevos, cereales, jabón, detergente, champú y otros más, así mismo para comprar mayor cantidad de maíz y de esta forma elaborar más tortillas. La principal motivación de Daniel es poder aumentar sus ventas en ambos negocios y de esta manera poder vivir mejor junto a su esposa.
texts.en: Daniel Antonio lives with his wife, a son, and a daughter-in-law. He has a little store where he sells juices, eggs, milk, bread, and candies. He tends to the store himself. In addition, to offer him some extra help, Daniel's wife makes tortillas, which she sells at noon and in the evening. Daniel helps her distribute them from house to house, with the idea of giving better service and thus obtaining new customers. Daniel as well as his wife are two hard-working, responsible people dedicated to having a better life. Daniel is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan so that he can have the necessary funds to invest in the store and buy a larger quantity of convenience products and basic necessities such as bread, milk, eggs, cereals, soap, detergent, shampoo, and other items, and also to buy a greater quantity of corn and in this way make more tortillas. Daniel's principal motivation is to be able to increase his sales in both businesses and in this way be able to live better, together with his wife.

loans.use: to buy bread milk, eggs, and cereals to stock his store

loans.name: Modesta Rosa

texts.es: La señora Modesta de 49 años de edad, es clienta Kiva habitante de la ciudad de Granada, de oficio comerciante se dedica al negocio de pulpería desde hace 10 años, madre de tres hijos. Ella dice que el préstamo le fue de gran ayuda porque le permitió incrementar su mercadería, aumentaron sus ventas, generando a la vez mas ingresos para el hogar, utilizo el crédito para comprar granos básicos, leche, gaseosa, pan, jugos, huevos, arroz, avena, etc. Pero eso no satisface las necesidades de Modesta pues su deseo es complacer a sus clientes con nuevos productos para vender en la pulpería, hoy en día ella desea invertir aun más en su negocio para mayor atracción de clientes es por esta razón que requiere del préstamo Kiva para comprar mercadería, leche, huevo, pan, arroz, queso, jugos, estantes y vitrinas, todo lo necesario para surtir su negocio y exhibir sus productos con el objetivo de generar mas ingresos para la familia, sus planes futuros es seguir trabajando con el apoyo de Kiva para cumplir sus sueños y poder salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Modesta, age 49, is a Kiva client who resides in the city of Granada. She is a merchant by trade and has managed a grocery business for 10 years. Modesta is the mother of three children. She says that her loan was a great help because it allowed her to increase her inventory of merchandise, generate more sales, and earn more household income.

Modesta will use this loan to buy basic grains, milk, sodas, bread, juices, eggs, rice, oats, and other products. She does not have what she needs to satisfy her customers, so she wants to provide them with new products that she will sell in her store. Today she wants to invest more into her business and display her products so that she can generate more income for her family. Her future plans include continuing her work with the support of Kiva so that she can fulfill her dreams and move forward with her family.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, milk, sodas, bread, juices, eggs, rice, oats, and other products.

loans.name: María Celsa

texts.es: María Celsa de 41 años de edad, es una persona muy conocida en su lugar de vivienda por ser alguien muy amable y responsable quien ha tenido que trabajar muy duro para salir adelante. Ella vive sola en casa propia y desde que su esposo murió ella toma las riendas de su negocio, realizando la actividad de cultivar maíz, el cual comercializa en su casa y así mismo en tiendas. También cría gallinas las cuales vende a muy buenos precios. María solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL a través del cual pueda tener la capacidad económica de comprar mayor cantidad de maíz para sembrar, así mismo para contratar a alguna persona que le ayude a realizar el pesado trabajo de plantar las semillas. El mayor deseo de María es el poder contar con una vida estable y así mismo ahorrar para tener una buena vejez, en donde pueda seguirse sosteniéndose sin depender económicamente de otras personas.
texts.en: María Celsa is 41 years old. She is well-known in her town for being a very friendly and responsible person who has had to work very hard to get ahead. She lives alone in her own house, and since her husband died she has taken the reins of the business of growing corn, which she sells from her house and also in stores. She also raises chickens, which sell at very good prices. María is requesting a loan from Integral so that she can buy a larger amount of corn for planting. She will also hire a person to help her with the heavy work of planting. María’s greatest wish is to be able to count on having a stable life and to save so that she have a comfortable old age, one where she can provide for herself, instead of having to depend economically on other people.

loans.use: to buy corn seed for planting

loans.name: Vilma Esperanza

texts.es: Vilma Esperanza 63 años de edad, trabaja como costurera desde hace muchos años, por lo que es  muy conocida por su excelente trabajo haciendo ropa para niños, y adultos. Vilma vive junto a su único hijo quien ya está casado, por lo que ella trabaja para sus gastos personales y así mismo para darle una pequeña ayuda a su hijo para los gastos del hogar. El negocio de Vilma está ubicado cerca de su casa de habitación, al cual desea hacerle unas reparaciones de forma que sea más apto para ella, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL,  y así cambiar el piso del lugar, también desea sustituir las gradas de la entrada por una rampa ya que se le dificulta subirlas por problemas que sufre en sus piernas, con lo que espera facilitar el ingreso a su trabajo. Vilma es una persona muy trabajadora la cual desea mejorar las condiciones de su trabajo y así poder seguir desempeñando el oficio que le ha permitido salir adelante.
texts.en: Vilma Esperanza is 63 years old. She has worked as a seamstress for many years, and so she is very well known for her excellent work, making clothing for children and adults. Vilma lives with her only son, who is now married, and so she works to pay her personal expenses and also to give a little help to her son for the household expenses. Vilma's business is located close to the house where she lives, and she wants to make some repairs [to her business] so that it will be more suitable for her. This is why she has applied to INTEGRAL for a loan, so that she can change the floor at her business location. She also wants to replace the steps at the entrance with a ramp, since she has difficulty going up the steps because of problems she suffers in her legs. With this she hopes to make the access to her work easier. Vilma is a very hard-working person who wants to improve her working conditions and thus be able to continue performing the work which has permitted her to advance.

loans.use: to repair the facilities at her business

loans.name: Ahlam

texts.en:
Ahlam is a 32-year-old married woman from Al Baqa'a, Jordan.

Ahlam is an ambitious micro-entrepreneur. She sells cosmetic products to neighbours and friends as a way to increase her family's living income.

Ahlam is requesting a loan of 1,000 JOD to purchase more supplies of cosmetic products for trading purposes.

Ahlam is looking to establish her own shop to operate away from her house so that she can increase her sales volume and profit accordingly.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetic products for trading purposes.

loans.name: Lilian

texts.en:
Lilian is a resident of Nkubu, in central Kenya, and has been in farming for fifteen years. She is married with four children between the ages of 13 and 21 years, all of whom are still in school. Her farm currently produces milk, maize and bananas which are all sold at the local market. She has employed three farmhands.

Lilian has requested a loan of 75,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to buy a water tank, at a cost of 40,000 KES, and irrigation water pipes, at a cost of 35,000 KES. She will use these to supply water to her farm, more specifically for banana and dairy farming. She adds that this will mitigate the challenges of low rains and too many man-hours lost fetching water for the dairy animals. She expects her milk production to improve and to help her family as a food supplement and income for other basic needs.

Lilian laments the high cost of farm inputs.

loans.use: to buy a water tank and irrigation pipes.

loans.name: María De Los Ángeles

texts.es: María de Los Ángeles vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos los cuales se dedican a estudiar. El esposo de María posee un microbús, con el cual trabaja transportando personas a diferentes lugares como iglesias, colegios, entre otros. María trabaja en su casa de habitación atendiendo una pequeña tienda de productos de primera necesidad como: jabón, productos alimenticios, bebidas, agua embotellada, y mucho más. Con este negocio ella pueda contribuir con los gastos del hogar, lo que les permite tener una vida un poco más estable. Las ganancias de la tienda son de mucha importancia para María, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda surtir el negocio con más productos como: diferentes tipos de pan, sodas, medicinas, aderezos, papel higiénico entre otros, con lo que ella se asegure de aumentar sus ventas, lo cual es el principal deseo de María ya que es esto lo que le brindara grandes beneficios para su hogar.
texts.en: María de Los Ángeles lives with her husband and their two children, who are in school. María’s husband owns a mini-bus, which he uses to transport people to different places, such as churches, schools, and other places. María works in her house tending to a small store that sells basic items such as: soap, food products, soft drinks, bottled water, and much more. With this business she can contribute to the household expenses, which allows them to have a more stable life. The earnings from the store are very important to María. She is requesting a loan so that she can stock her business with more products, such as: different kinds of bread, soft drinks, medicines, dressings, and toilet paper, among other things. This  will assure her of increased sales, which is María’s greatest wish, since this will provide great benefit to her household.

loans.use: to buy basic goods to stock her store

loans.name: Job Barac

texts.es: Job Barac de 40 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa quien se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y junto a sus  hijos. Job posee un negocio de reparación de llantas, trabajo que personalmente atiende, así mismo comercializa llantas para carros, buses y camiones, con esto  Job tiene la intención de ampliar su mercado, dando precios económicos y para diferentes nichos.  La llantería representa la única opción para darle todo lo necesario a su familia, razón por la que Job solicita un préstamo con el que pueda comprar mayor cantidad de llantas en diferentes tamaños y marcas, también para adquirir herramientas nuevas y todos los materiales necesarios para realizar este trabajo. Job es un padre muy responsable quien sueña con darle lo mejor a sus hijos y su esposa, por lo que se esfuerza día con día para mejorar en su negocio y así obtener más ganancias para el bienestar de su hogar.
texts.en: Job Barac is 40 years old. He lives with his wife, who works in the home, and their children. Job has a business that repairs tires, and that he tends to personally. He also sells tires for cars, buses, and trucks. Job intends to expand his market by having economical prices and also in different niches. The tire business represents his only option for providing the necessities for his family. He is requesting a loan that he will use to buy a larger number of tires in different sizes and brands. He will also buy new tools and all the materials he needs to do his work. Job is a very responsible father who dreams of giving the best to his children and wife. He works hard every day to improve in his business so that he can have better earnings, for the wellbeing of his family.

loans.use: to buy new and used tires for resale

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es: El cliente, Nelson, es un señor de 22 años de edad, soltero, quien trabaja en el servicio de la construcción en la ciudad de Cochabamba. Actualmente el cliente vive por la zona este, aproximadamente a 8 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba. La casa donde vive el cliente no es propia, vive con su madre en alquiler. Ninguno de ellos tienen dependientes y el destino del nuevo crédito es para la compra de mercadería, debido a que su madre se dedica a la venta de caramelos y dulces ambulando por las calles. En la actualidad la mercadería que la cliente maneja es muy escasa y necesita el capital para el negocio, ya que se esta agotando el pago del alquiler de la casa donde viven; es por esto que reflejamos esta pequeña historia del cliente, para el conocimiento de todos ustedes.
texts.en:
Nelson, a CIDRE client, is a 22-year-old gentleman who is single and works in the construction sector in the city of Cochabamba. He currently lives in the eastern district, which is approximately eight kilometers from the city of Cochabamba. Nelson and his mother live in a rental property since he does not own a house. Neither of them have dependents.

Nelson will use this new loan to buy merchandise since his mother sells candies and sweets as a street vendor. At the moment, his inventory of merchandise is low and he is in need of capital for this business since his funds have been exhausted in order to pay the rent. There is very little history about this client that can be shared with all of the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy candies and sweets that his mother can sell.

loans.name: Rahet Al Bal Group

texts.en:
Laura is the featured borrower for Rahet Al Bal's group. She is a 26-year-old married woman with one child. She got together with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. She is seated in the middle. She works as a hairdresser at her house, in addition to being a tutor and a school teacher. This is all done in order to help her husband in making their living and to raising their only child.
Laura applied for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, in order to buy new tools and machines necessary for improving her business. Laura will also buy a hairdressing chair, which makes her business more flexible.

Sobhiya is a 42-year-old married woman and mother of five children. She has a small Saj bread bakery and is requesting a loan in order to buy extra flour and a new dough maker to improve and increase her income. Sobhiya is the featured borrower on the left.

Zeinab is a 52-year-old married woman with 3 children. She owns a small convenience store. She is the one on the right side of the picture. She is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua in order to buy special offers products that will increase her selling, and at the same time increase her income.

loans.use: to buy new tools and machines necessary for improving her business

loans.name: Lester Antonio

texts.es:
El joven Lester de 29 años de edad, es habitante de Granada, casado, padre de 3 hijos que están a su cargo, actualmente solo los dos hijos mayores estudian, el de oficio comerciante se dedica al negocio de soldadura desde hace 3 años, su nivel académico es de técnico soldador. Lester inicio su actividad al culminar sus estudios de técnico soldador, luego se casa, decide independizarse porque vio la necesidad de generar ingresos para la familia, empieza a trabajar de soldador en la comunidad, en su negocio no tiene apoyo de nadie lo saca adelante por si solo, el ademas de dedicarse al negocio de soldadura también realiza trabajos de albañil para obtener otros ingresos, anteriormente le ayudaba a su mama ya que ella tiene un tramo de ventas de verduras en Granada. 

Lester desea poder entregar a sus clientes en tiempo  y forma el trabajo que le solicitan  es por esta razón  que realiza el préstamo para comprar herramientas, soldador, compresor, taladro y pulidora, todos los instrumentos que son necesarios en su trabajo, el estima este préstamo será de ayuda porque podrá invertir en su negocio y podrá entregar mas rápido su trabajo, generando a la vez mas ingresos, sus planes futuros es llegar a tener su propio taller de soldadura ya que ahorita realiza sus trabajos de manera ambulante en la ciudad de Granada, su meta es seguir trabajando en el negocio ya que es algo que le gusta hacer y con el  que ha podido sacar adelante a su familia.
texts.en:
Lester is a young man who is 29 years of age and a resident of Granada. He is married and the father of three dependent children. His two older children are currently in school. Lester is a merchant who has managed a welding business for the past three years. He received vocational training in metalwork. Lester started welding after he finished his technical studies. After he got married, Lester decided to become independent because he needed to generate income for his family. He began performing welding jobs in his community. In his business he has no one supporting him so he must move forward by himself. In addition to managing his welding business, Lester also works as a bricklayer in order to earn additional income. He previously helped his mother manage a vegetable stand that she owns in Granada.

Lester wants to deliver his customers’ orders on time and according to specification. For this reason he is requesting a loan in order to buy tools, welding equipment, a compressor, a drill, and a polisher. All of these supplies are needed for his work. He estimates that this loan will be helpful because he will be able to invest in his business and complete his work faster. As a result, he will generate more income. His plans for the future include setting up his own welding shop since he currently travels to job sites throughout the city of Granada. His goal is to continue working since this is something he enjoys doing and it allows him to move his family forward.

loans.use: to buy tools, welding equipment, a compressor, a drill, and a polisher.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
* Fatima is a conservative woman and prefers not to have her photo on the internet; thus the photo above is of her husband. 


Fatima is a 43-year-old married woman from Hay Nazal, Jordan who supports two members of her family. She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to buy materials and tools for arts and crafts. She is planning to open a shop to sell her artwork and hopes to eventually buy a house for her family to live in.

loans.use: to pay for materials and tools for arts and crafts

loans.name: Iman

texts.en:
Iman is a 44-year-old woman from Idon, Irbid, Jordan who is supporting one of her family members. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to purchase new furniture for her home to help maintain it. 

* Iman is a conservative woman and prefers not to put her photo on the internet; thus the photo above is of one of her male relatives.

loans.use: to purchase furniture for her home

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr:
Akouvi est une femme de 43 ans. Elle est mariée à un douanier à la retraite.
Depuis 2008, Akouvi vend des pagnes et des bijoux de façon ambulante. Elle souffre principalement d’un manque d’argent pour stocker les produits avant les périodes de fête. 
Akouvi sollicite un second prêt auprès de WAGES pour acheter et revendre des pagnes et bijoux. Elle espère réinjecter les profits supplémentaires dans l’activité afin d’ouvrir une boutique de pagnes, bijoux et prêt-à-porter. A terme, elle souhaiterait également pouvoir acheter un terrain et satisfaire aux dépenses de la famille.
texts.en:
Akouvi is a 43-year-old woman.  She is married to a retired customs officer.

Since 2008, she has been selling jewelry and pagnes (colorful West-African fabrics) as an itinerant seller.  She mainly lacks money to stock up merchandise before the holiday season.

She is requesting a second loan from WAGES in order to buy and resell pagnes and jewelry.  She is hoping to reinvest additional profits into her professional activity and open a shop where she would sell pagnes, jewelry and ready-to-wear items.

In the long run, she would also like to be able to buy a plot of land and meet her family's expenses.

loans.use: to buy jewelry and pagnes (colorful West-African fabrics).

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr:
Afi est une femme âgée de 36 ans actuellement célibataire. 
Revendeuse  ambulante, elle propose des pagnes à ses clients depuis 2005. 
Afi a sollicité un quatrième crédit auprès de WAGES afin de réinvestir dans son activité. A terme, elle souhaite ouvrir une boutique et construire sa propre maison.
texts.en:
Afi is a 36-year-old woman.  She is currently single.

She has been selling pagnes (colorful West-African fabrics) to her customers since 2005 and works as an itinerant seller.

Afi has requested a fourth loan from WAGES in order to reinvest in her business.  

In the long run, she would like to open a shop and build her own house.

loans.use: to buy "pagnes" (colorful West-African fabrics).

loans.name: Akouvi

texts.fr: Akouvi est une femme mariée de 55 ans et mère de 4 enfants. Revendeuse de profession, elle est l’épouse d’un agent d’impôts en retraite. Akouvi commercialise des produits d’alimentation générale et est très souvent confrontée à une variation. Elle effectue ses opérations financières depuis cette année avec WAGES et sollicite un crédit dans le but de s’approvisionner en produits d’alimentation générale et de constituer son stock. Elle espère pouvoir être indépendante et avoir une famille épanouie.
texts.en:
Akouvi is a 55-year-old woman who is married and the mother of four children.

She is a professional reseller and her husband is a retired tax officer.  

She sells basic food supplies and often has to face fluctuations in sales volume.

For the past year she has been relying on WAGES to conduct her financial transactions and she is now requesting a loan in order to stock up basic food supplies and replenish her inventory.

She hopes to become (financially) independent and would like to contribute to her family's happiness.

loans.use: to buy general food products.

loans.name: Maria Leonza

texts.es:
María, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para el fortalecimiento de su negocio, ella quiere invertir en la compra de materia prima para hacer hamacas como el hilo de seda de varios colores, también estará iniciando la siembra de granos básicos y para esto invertirá una parte del crédito en la compra de los insumos como el abono, y los herbicidas, que sólo necesarios para poder prevenir las plagas.

El credito anterior le ayudó en la fabricación de hamacas, teniendo  la mayor cantidad de insumos para su elaboración, esto le permitió poder ofrecer a los clientes una variedad de tamaños en las hamacas.
texts.en:
María is requesting a new loan in order to strengthen her business. She wants to invest in the purchase of raw materials, such as silk thread in various colors, for making hammocks. María will also begin planting basic grains, so she will invest part of the loan in the purchase of supplies, such as compost and herbicides, since these are the only products that she needs to prevent pests.

Her previous loan helped her with producing hammocks since she was able to acquire a large quantity of supplies. This enabled her to offer hammocks of various sizes to her customers.

loans.use: to buy silk thread for making hammocks and compost and herbicides for her crops.

loans.name: Juana Magdalena

texts.es: Juana Magdalena de 50 años de edad, vive junto a una hija discapacitada que utiliza una silla de ruedas para movilizarse, y junto a un hijo de 13 años de edad. Juana es madre soltera y se destaca por ser una mujer muy humilde y trabajadora quien pese a las dificultades  ha logrado salir adelante. Para contar con todo lo necesario en su hogar Juana hace tortillas, negocio que está ubicado en su casa de habitación, lo que le trae ventajas ya que puede estar al tanto de sus hijos mientras trabaja, para obtener ganancias extras ella elabora tortillas en el mediodía y en las tarde y gracias a su excelente servicio e higiene cuenta con varios clientes. Juana desea atender a más clientes, lo que muchas veces se le hace imposible ya que la masa para elaborar tortillas es muy poca, por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el deseo de contar con el dinero necesario para comprar más maíz y elaborar mayor cantidad de masa para hacer más tortillas y así mismo para comprar más cilindros de gas propano. El aumento de ventas será de mucho beneficio para Juana y su familia ya que podrá no solo darle una mejor estabilidad económica a sus hijos, sino también comprarle todas las medicinas necesarias a su hija para que cuente con una mejor salud.
texts.en:
Juana Magdalena, 50, lives with her daughter who has a physical disability and uses a wheelchair to get around, and her son, 13.  Juana is a single mother and well-known for being very humble and hard-working, who despite her difficulties has been able to prosper.  In order to have everything she needs to run a household Juana makes tortillas, a business she runs from her house, which is advantageous because she can care for her children while she works.  To earn extra income she makes tortillas at noon and in the evening, and thanks to the fact that she offers excellent service and is hygienic, she has many customers. 
 
Juana wants to attract more customers, but many times it is impossible to have enough dough to make tortillas.  Therefore, she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL, in order to have the money she needs to buy more corn and be able to make more dough for the tortillas.  She will also buy tanks of propane gas.  The increase in sales will be very beneficial for Juana and her family since it will give better economic stability to her children and she will be able to buy all the medicines her daughter needs to improve her health.

loans.use: To buy limewater and corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Mirna Del Carmen

texts.es: Mirna Del Carmen de 35 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos menores de edad, quienes estudian por las mañanas y en la tarde le ayudan a su madre con el negocio. Mirna trabaja en su propia tienda donde comercializa diferentes productos de primera necesidad para el hogar como: leche, huevos, pan, entre otros.  Su tienda es la única en la zona por lo que cuenta con varios clientes, debido a esto Mirna desea mejorar las condiciones de su hogar, para poder ampliar la tienda y poder tener todos los productos a la vista y de esta forma agilizar su servicio. Mirna solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para comprar maderas para realizar unas repisas donde pueda colocar los productos, así mismo para colocarle balcones más fuertes y de esta forma asegurar más su negocio, y también invertirá en la compra de otros productos para la tienda que aún no posee.
texts.en:
Mirna del Carmen, 35, lives with her husband and two minor children who are in school in the morning and help their mother with her business in the afternoon.  Mirna runs her own store where she sells different essential household goods such as: milk, eggs, bread, etc.  Her store is the only one in the area so she has many customers.  This is why Mirna wants to renovate her house and expand the store, so she can display all her products and speed up service.

Mirna is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy wood to build shelves for the products.  She also wants to add stronger balconies to make her business safer, as well as buy other products for the store.

loans.use: To pay for house renovation.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es: María del Carmen de cuarenta y nueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica a la venta de comida en el mercado de la localidad, tiene muchos años de trabajar en este negocio y ya tiene mucha experiencia siempre prepara los platillos más exquisitos, sopas, carnes, pollo, arroz, ensaladas entre otros, ya tiene mucha clientela pues la gente la prefiere por el rico sabor de sus comidas que son elaboradas con material de primera calidad, la higiene y por los excelentes precios, además se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad con las personas que compran en su puesto; María es una mujer visionaria con grandes objetivos para el futuro, piensa que el éxito es aprender en el camino porque así la felicidad está completa; ella quiere acrecentar el negocio pero necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar carnes, granos básicos, verduras, bebidas etc. María del Carmen tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable está segura que podrá saldar el financiamiento y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María del Carmen, 49, lives with her common-law husband and her children.  She has a food stall at the local market and has been in this business for several years.  She has much expertise and is always preparing the tastiest of dishes: soups, meats, chicken, rice, and salads, among others.  She has many customers because they prefer the rich flavor of her food which is made with quality ingredients, in a hygienic atmosphere and at excellent prices.  She is also well-known for her kindness.  

María is a visionary and has great goals for the future.  She believes success is learning along the way, as this will lead to complete happiness.  She wants to expand her business and needs to invest in supplies.  So she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy meat, basic grains, vegetables, beverages, etc.  María del Carmen has good credit references and is responsible.  She is sure she will pay back the loan while also giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy meat, basic grains, vegetables, and beverages.

loans.name: Ana María

texts.es: Ana María es una mujer muy emprendedora quien posee un pequeño negocio en su hogar, ella vive junto a su esposo y tres hijos, por quienes se esfuerza día tras día. Ana María se dedica a la elaboración de antojitos típicos, como: pastelitos, pupusas, enchiladas, empanadas, atoles, yuca frita y otros más. Este tipo de comidas rápidas poseen una gran demanda, ya que en la mayoría de lugares se tiene por costumbre comerlos todas las tardes por lo que tienen una gran demanda. Ana María solicita un préstamo para poder comprar mayor cantidad de materia prima como: maíz, queso, verduras, aceites, carne, y otros más los cuales le permitan variar más su menú y así mismo ofrecer mayor cantidad de platillos. Los hijos de Ana le ayudan a atender el negocio, con lo que pueden brindar  un mejor servicio a las personas quienes con mucho gusto regresan. Ana María espera aumentar sus ingresos y de esta forma hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Ana María is a very enterprising woman who runs a small business out of her home.  She lives with her husband and three children, for whom she works hard every day.  Ana María makes typical local snacks such as small pastries, stuffed tortillas, enchiladas, meat pies, corn drinks and fried yucca, among other things.  This type of fast food is in high demand because in most places it is the custom to eat it in the afternoon.

Ana María is requesting a loan to buy more ingredients such as corn, cheese, vegetables, oils, meat and other items to allow her to vary her menu and offer more variety.  Ana's children help her run the business, so customer service is better and people come back very willingly.  Ana María hopes to increase her income and expand her business.

loans.use: To buy corn, cheese, vegetables, oils, meat and other items.

loans.name: Dinora Margarita

texts.es: Dinora Margarita de 50 años de edad vive junto a tres hijos y su esposo. Ella trabaja en su casa de habitación en donde cuenta con un molino donde diferentes personas muelen maíz, frijoles, verduras, carnes y otros alimentos más. Este es el único molino que se encuentra en la zona que reside por lo que posee varios clientes entre ellos propietarios de tortillerías y pupuserías, quienes son clientes fijos que la visitan día con día. Este es un negocio bastante estable por lo que Dinora desea mejorarlo comprando un nuevo molino para agilizar el proceso y así atender más rápido a sus clientes. Así mismo Dinora comprara herramientas para el mantenimiento de los molinos y granos básicos para comercializarlos. Ella es una persona muy visionaria quien busca expandir su negocio para beneficio de su familia.
texts.en: Dinora Margarita, 50, lives with her three children and husband.  She works from home where she has a mill where people come to grind their corn, beans, vegetables, meats and other food stuff.  This is the only mill in the area where she lives so she has many customers who own tortilla and pupusa (stuffed tortilla) stands.  These are fixed customers who visit her everyday.  This is a considerably stable business so Dinora wants to improve it by buying a new mill to speed up the process and attend to customers more quickly.  Dinora also wants to buy tools for mill maintenance as well as basic grains to sell.  She is a visionary who wants to expand her business for her family's benefit.

loans.use: To buy a mill to improve business.

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Akossiwa 38 ans, mère de 2 enfants tous scolarisés âgés de 6 et 9 ans, est veuve. Elle lutte quotidiennement pour subvenir aux besoins de ses deux enfants en exerçant le métier de revendeuse de produits d’alimentation générale. Opérant depuis plus de 2 années avec WAGES, elle sollicite un crédit dans le but d’acheter des produits d’alimentation générale. Elle espère avec ce prêt disposer d’une boutique à l’avenir  et de veiller comme toujours à l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Akossiwa, age 38, is a widow and the mother of two school-attending children, aged 6 and 9. She struggles every day to provide for their needs, by working as a reseller of food staples.

She's been working with Kiva's partner, WAGES, for more than two years. She's seeking a loan in order to buy food products.

Thanks to this loan, she hopes to have a bigger shop in the future and, as always, take care of her children's educations.

loans.use: to buy food products

loans.name: Agbégnigan

texts.fr: Agbégnigan est jeune homme célibataire de 29 ans. Revendeur de profession il achète et revend des cartes de recharge pour gagner sa vie. Il exerce son activité en toute quiétude dans une petite baraque en bordure de route. Agbégnigan sollicite son second crédit avec  WAGES. Il compte avec cet argent acheter des cartes de recharge et utiliser les profits générés par leur vente pour effectuer un réinvestissement dans l’activité et pouvoir se marier pour fonder une famille.
texts.en:
Agbégnigan, age 29, is a young single man. He's a trained reseller who buys and resells recharge cards to earn a living.

He runs his business in complete peace, in a little shop on the side of the road. He's seeking his second loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES.

With the money, he intends to buy recharge cards and reinvest the sale profits into his business, in order to be able to marry and start a family.

loans.use: to buy recharge cards

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beans to plant and sell.

loans.name: Santa Rosa Group

texts.es: Un grupo con mucho optimismo y deseo de hacer negocio, es el grupo "Santa Rosa", formado hace ya un año y medio, cuenta con 7 integrantes los cuales dan fe que si se puede salir adelante a pesar de las adversidades. Muestra de ello es la señora Rosario de 36 años de edad, soltera y con un hijo, ella sale adelante cada día dándole empeño y esmero a la sastrería que tiene como fuente de ingresos. Ella comenzó con este negocio propio a raíz que no tenía con quien dejar al cuidado a su menor hijo, es así como surge este pequeña sastrería en su casa,  que día a día crece cada vez mas. El presente préstamo lo invertirá en compras de telas para la confección  de prendas de vestir. Rosario es solo una de las 7 integrantes que con esfuerzo y entusiasmo salen adelante para el bienestar de ellas y sus familias.
texts.en: The "Santa Rosa" group is a group that is very optimistic and wants to get ahead. It was formed a year and a half ago and has 7 members. They can attest that you can get ahead despite adversity. An example is Rosario, who is 36 years old. She is single and has a son. She gets ahead every day with hard work and dedication, working as a seamstress as a source of income. She started with this business because she didn't have anyone to leave her young son with, so she started her small seamstress shop in her home. Every day it grows more. This loan will be invested in buying fabric to make clothing. Rosario is only one of the 7 members who with hardwork and enthusiam are getting ahead for their own and thier families' wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Acuario Group

texts.es: Un grupo con buenas ideas de trabajo y muy empeñosos al realizarlos, así se caracteriza la alcancía comunal Acuario conformada por siete integrantes que viven en el distrito de Vitarte. Una historia en particular es de la Señora Nelva 61 años de edad casada y con tres hijos mayores de edad, ella se dedica al alquiler de cuartos en su casa hace más de 18 años y a su vez tiene una movilidad que renta para transporte público. Comienza en este trabajo a raíz de que tiene una casa amplia y tenía muchos cuartos desocupados es así que decide alquilarlos para así poder generar ingresos y con el tiempo y mucho esfuerzo a podido implementar su hogar y darse una estabilidad económica, como así también estudios para sus hijos. En el futuro le gustaría tener un puesto de venta de lubricantes para autos. No puedo concluir sin antes mencionar el esfuerzo y la dedicación que realiza cada integrante de este grupo para el bienestar y mejoría económica para sus familias
texts.en: The Acuario communal bank is described as being a group with good work ideas and a lot of dedication. It is made up of seven members  who live in the Vitarte district. One story in particular is that of Nelva. She is 61 years old, married and has three grown children. She has rented out rooms in her house for more than 18 years.She also has a car she rents for public transport. She started this work because she had a large house with a lot of empty rooms, so she decided to rent them out to make some income. With time and  a lot of effort she has been able to furnish her home and obtain financial stability as well as pay for her children's educations. In the future, she would like to have a place where she sells car lubricants. I cannot conclude without mentioning that the hard work and dedication that each member of this group does for the financial wellbeing of his or her family.

loans.use: to do car maintenance.

loans.name: Jassa

texts.en:
Jassa lives in the Sinkor area with her husband and two children. She is 27 years old and a high school graduate. Her children are 2 and 10 years old and they live at home with their parents and are in school. For the past five years Jassa has been operating a shop where she sells rice, sugar candy, biscuits and other items. One of the challenges she is faced with in her business is the unstable price of commodities on the market. 

Her past loan improved her life and the lives of her children. She used the profit to buy more goods. She is requesting a new loan to purchase more bags of rice, sugar, biscuits, and other items for her business. She plans to educate her children and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more bags of rice, sugar, biscuits and other items for her business.

loans.name: Kumba

texts.en: Kumba lives in West Point. She is 27 years old and a single parent with one child who is two years old and in school. Kumba's last grade attended was the 8th grade. For the past four years she has been selling chains, earrings and bracelets on the open square of the market. She will use the profit to build a place where she will be able to sit and sell. She learned this trade from her friend.  She is requesting a loan to purchase more earrings, chains and bracelets to expand her business. She plans to build a house and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase more earrings, chains and bracelets to improve her business.

loans.name: Mamie

texts.en: Mamie lives in West Point. She is a single mother with three children. She is 29 years old and her children are between the ages of 3 and 10. Mamie has been selling alcoholic drinks like stout, beer and gin, along with soft drinks for the past nine years. She has little income, and she likes this kind of trade because she makes a profit. She uses the profit to buy more drinks for the business. She is requesting a loan to purchase more beer, stout, gin and soft drinks for her business.

loans.use: to purchase more beer, stout, gin and soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet lives in West Point. She is 32 years old and married with two children between the ages of 7 to 14. They all stay at home and are in school. Her husband is a businessman. For the past 12 years Janet has been selling door locks, nails, and hinges. She has received money from her husband to help in the business. She learned to do this trade from him. She used the profit to buy more goods. 

Janet is proud to be in this business because she is able to contribute in the home. She is requesting a loan to purchase more door locks, nails, and hinges for the business. She plans to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more door locks, nails, and hinges for the business.

loans.name: Martha J
