He has been spending his income on his family's daily needs, such as commodities and food allowances which means that they are very quickly consumed. 

Now he is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides for use in his business. He hopes to yield better crops through his purchased inputs for the improvement of their living situation.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and insecticides for use in his business.

loans.name: Rolando

texts.en:
Rolando is a man with courage who is dedicated to his work. Rolando is 42 years old and is married with three grown-up children. He engages in a farming business planting crops like corn. Their village is well known as an agriculture area. 

Rolando is asking for a loan of PHP 35,000 to buy corn seeds and fertilizer for his farm. Rolando hopes that someday he can see all his children finish their studies and also he can provide for the needs of his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Prudencio

texts.en:
Born in the village of Villa Luz, in the province of Isabela, Prudencio lives with his wife and their four children. Recognized by the people of his neighborhood as a serious man, Prudencio, a farmer, would like to expand his crop production so that it becomes a viable source of income. To do that, he needs a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy seeds and fertilizer. 

The income from it will then help him to cope with the needs of his large family and give all of his children a higher education. Prudencio is very grateful to everyone who can help him achieve his dreams with this loan.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.en:
Ricardo is a 49-year-old married man living with his family. He has been working in the agricultural field for the past 16 years. In 1998, he bought a plot of land where he started to plant crops like corn according to the season. 

With his requested loan of PHP 30,000 he will be able to purchase fertilizers and seeds in order to increase his business productivity. Therefore, his sales will increase and so will his income. In the future, he plans to buy new land to expand his business for his family to have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy seed and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Sherlita

texts.en:
Sherlita is 52 years old and blessed with four children. To make a living, she sells fruits and vegetables. She has been in this business five years. Her target market is her co-villagers. Sometimes, due to the poor income of her co-villagers, she gives credit but not all the time because she is saving to develop her business.

To meet her dream faster, she is asking for a loan amount of PHP 20,000 to buy fruits and vegetables such as squash, bananas, root crops and avocados. This is to provide a good quality service to her customers as well as allow her to gain higher income. She hopes it will be a great help for developing her business as well as their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables such as squash, bananas, root crops and avocados.

loans.name: José Teodoro

texts.es: José Teodoro, es una persona que se dedica a diferentes actividades con el fin de darle lo mejor a su familia la cual está conformada por su esposa y dos hijas. José toma fotografías en diferentes eventos sociales, así mismo se dedica a la crianza de ganado para posteriormente comercializarlo, pero su actividad principal es la cosecha de frijoles y maíz que también comercializa en la zona. José solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de semillas para sembrar con la esperanza de poder duplicar sus ventas. José es muy responsable y se destaca por ser alguien que vela día con día por el bien y la estabilidad de su  familia.
texts.en:
Jose Teodoro is a person who is dedicated to different activities with the goal of better providing for his family, composed of his wife and 2 daughters. Jose takes photographs at a variety of social events and he also raises cattle to later sell them. But his principal activity is to cultivate beans and corn which he also sells in the zone. 

Jose is requesting a loan for purchasing seeds to sow in the hope of duplicating his sales. Jose is very responsible and is well known as someone who looks out, day after day, for the well-being and stability of his family.

loans.use: buy seeds to plant.

loans.name: Rowel

texts.en:
Rowel does farming for a living. He and his wife help eachother to cultivate their land. He is 39 years of age and was blessed with two children. Rowel does his best to keep their farm productive. He has been working in this kind of business for eight years and is very determined to have a better way of life. 

He is asking  for a loan of PHP 15,000 to fund their farming business. He will use the loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and other farming inputs. He knows that through this loan, his income will increase and he will be able to save for the studies of his children.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers, and other farming inputs.

loans.name: Yeng

texts.en:
Yeng is 42 years old. She is married and resides with five children in Siem Reap Province, Cambodia. She has been involved in an agricultural business for more than twenty years, has an extensive experience and is successful in her career. She is involved in cultivating rice, beans and fattening up animals. Approximately, she earns about $6 per day. Her husband is a carpenter who earns about $5 per day. Her children are still in her care. 

Yeng is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase fertilizer and pay the expenses of tilling her 5 hectares of  farmland. In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and pay the expenses of tilling her 5 hectares of farmland.

loans.name: Roberto

texts.en:
Roberto is a rice grower and lives peacefully in Carilucud with his wife. They have not had a child yet but are hoping to have a child soon. To generate an income, he raises crops, primarily planting and harvesting rice to sell. He has been doing this for over eight years now on a hectare plot of land which he inherited from his parents. 

He is now asking for a loan of PHP 33,000 to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides to use in farming. In the future, Roberto would like to keep making his crops productive and earn more funds for crops maintenance and and achieve financial stability.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides to use in farming.

loans.name: Elvira

texts.en:
Elvira is an industrious person who helps her spouse to generate income for the family. She manages a small restaurant, serving food for daily meals and snacks to the people in the village where she lives. She has been operating it for over 10 years and earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month. She uses the profits for her children's education. 

She would like to improve sales from her business so she is now borrowing a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy eggs, rice, vegetables and meat used in her small restaurant. Elvira would like to offer more delectable meals that will lead her to increased profits too. From this, she will be able to continuously pay school fees of her children.

loans.use: to buy eggs, rice, vegetables and meat to cook and sell in her small restaurant.

loans.name: Maha

texts.en:
Maha is a 44-year-old woman from Al-Hashmi, Amman, Jordan who supports four members of her family. 

She is requesting a loan of 500 JD to buy clothes. This will allow her to establish a business selling clothes. She hopes that this will help raise her family's living standards.

loans.use: to pay for clothes that she will sell.

loans.name: Nehemías Alonso

texts.es: Nehemías Alonso de treinta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a sus hijos, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le ayuda a obtener las mejores cosechas, comercia en todos los alrededores de la zona y es muy conocido por su amabilidad y por vender lo que las personas necesitan de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Nehemías es un hombre dedicado a su labor, visionario tiene grandes ideas a futuro y piensa lograrlas con esfuerzo y dedicación, empezara por acrecentar su negocio por eso invertirá en insumos para aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de frijol, maíz, fertilizante, herramienta, etc. Nehemías Alonso tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nehemías Alonso, 34, lives with his children. He farms corn and beans. He has been working in agriculture for many years and has gained invaluable experience, which has helped him to obtain the best harvests. He does business in the neighbouring areas and is well known for his kindness and selling good-quality product to his customers at accessible prices with unequal service. 

Nehemías is committed to his work, a visionary with great ideas for the future that he plans to accomplish with effort and dedication. He will start by expanding his business and will invest in agricultural inputs to increase his production, but he needs capital. The loan from INTEGRAL will allow him to purchase bean seed, corn seed, fertilizer, and tools, etc. Nehemías Alonso has good references for payment and he's very responsible. He's sure that he can pay the debt and at the same time offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bean seed, corn seed, fertilizer, and tools

loans.name: Marleny

texts.es: Marleny vive junto a sus dos hijos y su esposo, ambos trabajan en la agricultura y se destacan por ser personas muy responsables y trabajadoras. Marleny comercializa en su casa y en diferentes tiendas de la zona en que reside la cosecha de frijoles y maíz, con lo que puede sostener el negocio activo. Así mismo ella se dedica a la ganadería criando vacas y bueyes, de los cuales vende leche y así mismo a los animales para destazo o carga. Marleny solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de semilla de maíz y frijoles, así mismo para comprar alimentos, vitaminas y todo lo necesario para la crianza de vacas y bueyes. Con esto ella espera mejorar las ganancias de su negocio y poder salir adelante junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Marleny lives with her 2 children and husband. They both work in agriculture and are known to be very responsible and hard-working. Marleny sells her harvest of beans and corn from her house and in several stores in the zone where she resides. This enables her to sustain an active business. She also raises cows and oxen and sells milk plus animals to be butchered or to work in the fields.

Marleny is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL to purchase a larger quantity of corn and bean seeds, and to buy feed, vitamins, and all the necessities for raising cattle and oxen. With this loan, she expects to improve earnings from her business and to be able to get ahead together with her family.

loans.use: buy bean and corn seeds to sow plus needed supplies for raising cows and oxen.

loans.name: Roger

texts.en:
Roger is 49 years old, married, and has five children. He raises his family through his income from his farming business. Two of his children still attend school and need daily allowances. 

Roger had been planting and harvesting rice to sell for more than 10 years now. He usually earns about 15,000 PHP each harvest season, which occurs twice a year. He aspires to increase his yield, so he is borrowing a loan of 20,000 PHP to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming. 

With proper attention to his farming business, Roger is confident he will achieve good profits and earn money for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en:
Reynaldo lives with his wife and five children. His wife helps him in generating income through his hog-raising business. Reynaldo has been in the farming business for 15 years. He aspires to expand and improve his rice crop production, but he does not have enough capital to re-plant his two hectares of rice fields. For this reason, he is applying for a loan of 20,000 PHP to buy farm supplies needed for improving the growth of his rice crop.

Reynaldo hopes to keep producing good crops to be able to earn more income, which he will use to support the basic necessities of his family and the education of all five of his children.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies

loans.name: Samah

texts.en: Samah is a 40-year-old married woman from Al-Hashmi, Amman, Jordan. She has a family of four. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to make home improvements. She wants to develop her home and make it a better space for her family.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Alexander

texts.en:
Rice farming is the primary source of income on which Alexander and his spouse rely for a living. He has been managing a farming business for over 10 years now and earns about PHP 15,000 during harvest season. Alexander is now 37 years old, married, and has one child who he is sending to elementary education. 

He wanted to improve his income so he is now asking for a loan of PHP 18,000 to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming. This will help maintain healthier crops and will increase crop production. Alexander is praying that he will have an abundant harvest and will earn more funds to invest in buying hogs to raise which will serve as additional source of his income. Some day, Alexander hopes to become a successful rice grower in their village which will be good for the overall welfare of his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides used in farming.

loans.name: Armando

texts.en:
Armando has been engaged in an agricultural business for ten years. He plants and harvest rice crops for sale. Armando is a married man and is blessed with four children. Three of his children currently go to school while the other one is graduating this June 17, 2012. 

Armando’s main priority is to let his children finish their studies because it’s the only inheritance he could give to them. This situation pushes him to strive hard to be able to make this dream come true.

Armando would like to take out a loan of PHP 20,000 which will be used to buy fertilizers, pesticides and other farm inputs to improve his crop production. He hopes that he will obtain this requested loan amount in order to gain more profits and keep producing healthy crops. Through this amount, he can save some amount of money to give his children a bright future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, pesticides and other farm inputs to improve his crop production.

loans.name: Aquilino

texts.en:
Farming is Aquilino’s family's main source of income. He is happily married and has six children. Two of his children have settled and are married, one is a laborer and the remaining two are still studying. Aquilino has been a rice grower for 25 years. Due to the long period of time he has devoted to his farming business, he is able to provide for his family's  basic needs and send his two children to school. 

Aquilino would like to keep producing good cops but his capital for re-planting his farm land is no longer enough due to the increasing costs of household expenditures and allowances of his two children. In this regard, he is asking for a loan of PHP 15,000 which will allow him to buy necessary farm inputs. Aquilino hopes that he can obtain more farm land someday.

loans.use: to buy necessary farm inputs for his farming business.

loans.name: Riath

texts.en: Riath is a good person. He is 34 years old, and is married. He has five children who live together with him in Taiz, Yemen. He purchased land, and then he built a house. He would like to build the second floor, so he is requesting a loan of 100,000 YER to cover the costs of purchasing construction supplies such as iron and cement. He hopes to offer his family a better life.

loans.use: to cover the costs of purchasing construction supplies such as iron and cement for his business.

loans.name: Benard

texts.en:
Bernard is a 48-year-old business man living in Kagadi, Uganda. He trades in produce mainly maize, beans and groundnuts. He is blessed with ten children and has been in this business for a period of 12 years. He started by growing his own crops then sold them and got capital to start buying from others. He faces a problem of price fluctuation and inflation which erodes most of the profits. 

He would like to educate his children and expand his business to other new markets. Benard wants a loan to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans to sell.

loans.name: Jackline

texts.en:
Jackline is a forty five year old married woman with six children living in Kasese, Uganda.She has been in the produce business for three years. She started with 500,000 shillings and now has two million shillings as working capital. 

Jackline's hardships are inadequate capital to purchase stock, price fluctuations in produce and inflation. Her personal goals are to educate her children and to buy a car. Her business goals are to expand the business into new markets and to move the business to a more permanent location. Jackline wants money to buy maize and cassava flour to sell.

loans.use: to buy maize and cassava flour.

loans.name: Erisa

texts.en:
Erisa is a fifty two year old married man with eight children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been dealing in a retail shop business for six years, which he started with 1,000,000 shillings. He now has 2,500,000 shillings as working capital. His hardships are inadequate capital to purchase stock, price fluctuation and inflation. 

Erisa's personal goals are to educate his children,to build a permanent home and to buy a car. His business goals are to hire employees to help expand the business and to move the business to a more permanent location. Erisa wants money to buy sugar, sodas, soap and beers to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, sodas, soap and beers to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Glenda Mayela

texts.es: Glenda Mayela de  21 años de edad, cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo quien se desempeña como responsable de ventas en una Veterinaria.  Solicita su  credito para comprar una computadora portatil ya que la necesita para realizar sus trabajos de la Universidad, pues actualmente estudia  tercer año  de la carrera Licenciatura en Administración; se caracteriza por ser una joven con alto espirirtu de superación personal y profesional, su mayor sueño en la vida culminar sus estudios y construir su propia casa.
texts.en: Glenda Mayela is a 21 year old university student attending the third year of the Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration, and she can count on the support of her husband who is a sales representative for a veterinarian. She is requesting her 1st loan to buy a laptop computer she needs to prepare her University projects. She is a young woman with a great desire to progress both in her personal and in her professional life. The biggest dream of her life is to finish studying and to have her own house built.

loans.use: To buy a laptop computer.

loans.name: Alba Luz

texts.es: Alba Luz  trabaja como directora de una  Escuela, su esposo se desempeña como agricultor en la pequeña finca que ellos poseen, ambos son trabajadores que han salido adelante con sus esfuerzos, segun referencias esta docente es muy responsable con sus compromisos.   Solicita su crédito para inverirlo en compra de materiales de construcción para construir un anexo a su vivienda, su deseo en la vida es que su familia permanezca unida en las cosas de Dios y gozar de salud y trabajo.
texts.en: Alba Luz works as a school director; her husband is a farmer and he works in the small farm they posses. They are both hard-working people who have gotten ahead thanks to their efforts. According to reference this teacher is very responsible with her commitments. She is requesting her 9th loan to buy construction materials to have an annexe to her house built. What she most desires in life is that her family remains close together in every fact of life and to have good health and a good job.

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Marcelina Marta

texts.es: La Sra Marcelina es tiene mas de 25 años de laborar como Docente en Educacion Primaria, cuenta con otros ingresos como son los del Negocio de la Pulperia el cual invertiria con el financiemiento que le brindo Afodenic con Fondo Kiva. Es una mujer luchadora junto con su esposo e hijos, todo lo que poseen ha sido por esfuerzo propio. Desea contianuar trabajando para mejorar mas su negocio con el apoyo de la Institucion.
texts.en:
Sra. Marcelina has worked as an elementary school teacher for more than 25 years.  

Marcelina also has other income that is generated from a grocery business in which she will invest a Kiva loan provided by AFODENIC.  She is a determined woman who lives with her husband and children, all of whom have the quality of self-sufficiency.  She wants to continue working so that she can improve her business with the help of AFODENIC.

loans.use: to buy products for her store.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es: Manuel Antonio  de 35 años de edad, se desempeña como docente un colegio desde hace 15 años , el cuenta con el apoyo de su compañera de vida , la cual trabaja para una universidad,  ya que  son bien unidos y en la zona donde viven se pidio referencias  y es considerado responsable y de buen vivir .  solicita el  crèdito, para comprar materiales de construcción y asi poco a poco ir mejorando la infraestructura de su vivienda ubicada en la zona # 6 de Nueva Guinea, su mayor sueño en la vida es gozar de salud y mejorar sus condiciones de vida y de bella familia.
texts.en:
Manuel Antonio is 35 years old and has worked as a  High School teacher for the past 15 years.  He has the support of his life companion, who works for a university, which is very close to where they live.  The references were asked about Manuel Antonio and they consider him to be a responsible individual who earns a good living.  

He is requesting his sixth loan so that he can buy construction materials and gradually improve the infrastructure of his home, which is located in District #6 of Nueva Guinea.  His greatest dream in life is to enjoy good health and improve the living conditions for his beautiful family.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: El Trebol Group

texts.es: Un grupo de mujeres  que con entusiasmo y mucha dedicación sale adelante cada día. Así son las integrantes de la alcancía "El Trebol" conformado por 5 socias, llevan la ardua tarea de trabajar en sus negocios para poder mejorar la calidad de vida de sus familias. Tal es así el caso de la señora Luz de 56 años de edad  madre de 3 hijos de los cuales uno aun está a su cuidado por ser menor de edad y depende de ella para su educación, alimentos y vestimenta. La señora Luz cada día se dedica a la venta de Periodicos. Con los ingresos de estos negocios a podido llevar adelante a su familia y pudo comprar un terreno en el cual más adelante comenzará a construir en el segundo piso 3 cuartos que le pondra en alquiler. Con el presente préstamo implementara  en el puesto de periodicos la ventas de dulces. Como ella cada integrante tiene una historia en particular pero, si en algo coinciden es en el entusiasmo y las ganas de salir adelante para el bien y mejoría económica de sus negocios
texts.en:
This group of women strives to move forward each day with great enthusiasm and dedication. There are five members that make up the Communal Bank “El Trebol”. They have the arduous task of working in their businesses in order to improve the quality of life for their families.

Such is the case with Sra. Luz, a 56-year-old mother of three children. One child is still under her care and reliant on her for education, food, and clothing. Sra. Luz sells newspapers each day. With the income from her business, she was able to move her family forward and purchase a piece of land. Later on, she will add a second floor with three rooms that she can make available for rent.

With this current loan, Luz will be able to continue operating her newsstand where she also sells candy. Just like the other members, she has a unique story, but they all share the enthusiasm and drive to succeed for the good and economic improvement of their businesses.

loans.use: to buy newspapers and candy and to acquire construction materials for her home.

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es: Marisol de 47 años de edad, es una persona que siempre ha contado con grandes deseo de salir adelante y se ha esforzado por cumplir sus metas. Ella vive junto a su esposo e hijos, junto a los cuales se dedican por completo a la actividad de la agricultura, sembrando maíz y frijoles los cuales son destinados para el consumo personal y así mismo para la comercialización de estos. Marisol es una madre muy orgullosa ya que sus hijos son personas trabajadoras y luchadoras quienes desean mejorar las condiciones de su negocio. Por esta razón Marisol solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar todos los insumos necesarios para la siembra como: abono, semilla de maíz y frijoles, con lo que podrán cultivar mucho más de lo que han podido hasta ahora, permitiéndoles percibir más ganancias.
texts.en:
Marisol, age 47, has always been a person with a great desire to get ahead.  She has always put forth great effort to reach her goals.  She lives with her husband and children.  They completely devote themselves to agriculture.  They grow corn and beans for personal consumptions and to sell.

Marisol is a very proud mother because her children are hard-working and tenacious people who want to improve the condition of her business.  That is why Marisol is requesting a loan from Integral.  With the loan she will be able to buy all of the supplies like fertilizer and corn and bean seeds that are needed for planting.  She will use them to cultivate much more than she has been able to do so far.  This will allow them to get more income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and corn and bean seeds to plant.

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is a forty five year old married woman with six children living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been in the salon business for twenty years. She started with 500,000 shillings and now has 10,000,0000 shillings as working capital. The hardships she faces include customers not paying on time and high rent for the business premises.

Margret's personal goals are to educate her children and to buy a car. Her business goals are to hire employees to help expand the business and to expand the business into new markets. Margret wants money to buy wedding gowns for hire.

loans.use: to buy wedding gowns for hire.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is a 50 year old lady who deals in a textile business which she has run for a period of 2 years. She started as a teacher and a councillor then got capital and started this business. She says inadequate capital and price fluctuations are affecting the business. 

Rosemary would like buy a car and buy land to grow crops. She wants a loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Gilbert

texts.en:
Gilbert is a forty-eight-year-old married man living in Kamwenge, Uganda. He has a personal goal of educating his children and building a permanent house for residence. He is a farmer and is facing hardships of price fluctuations, inflation and seasonal weather changes. Besides that, he has a vision of diversifying his business to include a retail shop, hiring employees to help expand his business, and buying land to grow crops. 

Gilbert needs a loan to pay workers who are mulching his gardens.

loans.use: to pay workers who are mulching his gardens.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a thirty-seven-year-old married woman living in Kamwenge, Uganda. She has a personal goal of educating her children, building a permanent house and buying a car. She has been operating a retail shop for three years now, after starting with capital of two million and  now has five million shillings. She has hardships of price fluctuations, inflation and inadequate capital to purchase enough stock to meet the increasing demand. She has a vision of moving her business to new areas and owning a wholesale shop.

Grace needs a loan to buy general merchadise such as sugar and soap for sale.

loans.use: to buy general merchadise such as sugar and soap for sale.

loans.name: Eddie

texts.en:
Eddie is married and is a responsible father of four children. He is involved in farming, where he lives his family. He grows rice to sell and wishes to yield many crops for the next harvesting season. 

For Eddie to achieve his goal, he is requesting an additional working capital in a loan amount of PHP10,000 to buy seeds, fertilizers and pesticides. He hopes that, through this loan amount, he can grow his desired harvest. In this matter, he hopes then save for the educational needs of his children.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Artemio

texts.en: Artemio is 29 years of age, married and has no children. He is a farmer in their community and he has been operating his farming business for over 8 years. He wants to save for his future children. For this reason Artemio is in need of additional working capital to make good his farm. He is asking for a loan amount of PHP15,000 to buy seeds, pesticides and fertilizers. Hopefully, this time he can yield much so that he can save for the future of his family as well as for his business.

loans.use: to buy seeds, pesticides and fertilizers.

loans.name: Ines

texts.en:
Ines is a duck raiser in the village where she lives with her spouse and six children. She had been doing the business for almost 10 years. Whenever the ducks have reach the desired weight, she sells them at the market for profits. Her income, of about PHP4,000 each month, goes for meals and school expenses of her children. Only one of them still attends school while the rest have settled into marriage. She would like to make her business more profitable but she has insufficient funds now, so she is asking for a loan of PHP 12,000 to buy livestock feed and medicine to sell. 

With good profits from the business, she hopes to start up a piggery business for an additional source of income. This will help the family achieve economic stability.

loans.use: to buy livestock feed and medicine to sell.

loans.name: Danila Del Socorro

texts.es: Danila se desempeña como docente de una escuela primaria ubicada en la colonia los Angeles, segun referencias comerciales y laborales es una docente con alto espiritu de superación personal y profesional , muy responsable, dedicada a su labor como docente, tambien recibe la ayuda económica del padre de su hijo. Solicita crédito para comprar  600 bloques y asi poco a poc ir comprando el material y poder construir su propia vivienda,  su sueño en la vida es tener una casita bonita con mejores condiones, gozar de salud y trabajo.
texts.en:
Danila works as a teacher in a school that is located in the neighborhood of Los Angeles.  According to her business and work-related references, Danila is a spirited teacher who has the drive to excel on a personal and professional level.  She is very responsible and dedicated to her work as a teacher.  Danila also receives financial support from the father of her child.  

She is requesting a loan in order to buy 600 blocks and gradually acquire materials so that she can build a home of her own.  Her dreams in life include having a nice house with better conditions, enjoying good health, and continuing her work.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es: La profesora Rosita trabaja como docente de primaria desde hace 23 años, con gran eficiencia y honestidad ya que ama su profesión de impartir el pan de la enseñanza a niños del pre escolar en la zona urbana de Nueva Guinea.  Solicita su credito para realizarle unos pequeños arreglos a la cocina de su vivienda ubicada en la zona # 2 de Nueva Guinea , su sueño es que sus hijas culminen sus estudios y encuentren un trabajo digno y que existe el amor de Dios en su familia.
texts.en:
Rosita has been working as a school teacher for 23 years with great efficiency and honesty.  She loves her profession of imparting knowledge to pre-school children from the urban section of Nueva Guinea.  

She is requesting her eighth loan in order to make a few repairs to the kitchen in her home, which is located in District #2 in Nueva Guinea.  Her dream is for her children to finish their studies, find decent jobs, and exist with the love of God for their families.

loans.use: to repair her kitchen.

loans.name: Maricel

texts.en:
Maricel is raising hogs to fatten and breed. Whenever a hog reaches maturity, she sells it to the butcher in their village and usually earns about 3,000 PHP for each hog. She uses the income for meals and school expenses. 

She is now asking for a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy feed, medicines, and vaccines for her hogs. This will provide good nutrition for her hogs and enable her to receive a higher price for them. She hopes to keep raising healthy hogs and maintain a profitable business for the overall welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, medicine, and vaccines for hogs

loans.name: Geovany Jose

texts.es: Geovanny José se desempeña como docente de secundaria en la colonia Puerto Principe desde hace 8 años,    segun referencias comerciales , laborales y personales ha demostrado ser una joven con buen comportamiento, es soltero aun no tiene responsabilidad de una familia por lo que gana es para sus gastos y sus estudios.  Solicita su  crèdito para comprar material de construcción y asi poder mejorar la cocina de su vivienda ubicada en la comarca lo cocos, su sueño es formar su familia, gozar de salud, trabajo y seguir estudiando.
texts.en:
Geovanny José has worked as a high school teacher in the neighborhood of Puerto Principe for the past eight years. He has demonstrated that that he is a well-mannered young person, according to his business, employment, and personal references. Geovanny is single and has no family responsibilities, so what he earns goes toward his expenses and his studies.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy construction materials for improving the kitchen in his home, which is located in the region of Los Cocos. His dreams include starting a family, enjoying good health, working, and continuing his studies.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for making improvements to his kitchen.

loans.name: Yamilex Del Socorro

texts.es: Yamilex de  32 años de edad, se desempeña como responsable de Recursos Humanos desde hace 5 años en una universidad,   ella es una mujer bien trabajadora, emprendedora, que ha luchado por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y de su familia,   segun referencias comerciales laborales y personales es bien dedicada a su trabajo y a su familia. solicita su credito para pagar la mano de obra de la construcción de una habitación con mejoras condiciones y asi gozar de un mejor ambiente en el hogar, su deseo en la vida es que sus hijos crezcan sanos y fuerte y que no le falte lo basico en el hogar y gozar de estabilidad laboral para seguir ayudando a su familia.
texts.en:
Yamilex is 32 years old and has worked the last five years as the head of Human Resources for a university.  She is a hardworking and enterprising woman who has strived to improve her living conditions and that of her family.  Yamilex is dedicated to her work and to her family according to her business, work-related, and personal references.  

She is requesting a loan in order to pay for labor in the construction of her home, which will provide better conditions and an improved living environment that she can enjoy.  Her desire in life is for her children to grow up healthy and strong and not lack basic necessities at home.  Yamilex also wants to enjoy job stability so that she can continue helping her family.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs in the construction of her home.

loans.name: Yolidia Esther

texts.es: La profesora Yolidia de  30 años de edad, se desempeña como docente de primaria desde hace 10 años, posee estabilidad laboral,  segun referencias comerciales y personales es una joven muy responsable con muchos deseos de superaciòn  profesional  y personal. Solicita su  8vo  credito para comprar materiales de construcción y asi poder mejorar la infraestructura de su casita ubicada en la zona # 6 de Nueva Guinea, su compañero de vida trabaja ambos reciben ingresos familiares ycomparten con los gastos familiares y del hogar,su sueño es mejorar poco a poco la infraestructura de su vivienda y que su familia permanezca unida.
texts.en:
Yolidia is 30 years old and has worked as an elementary school teacher for 10 years. She has a stable work history. According to her work and personal references, she is a very responsible young woman.

Yolidia is requesting her eighth loan to buy construction materials so that she can improve the infrastructure of her house located in District #6 of New Guinea. Her partner in life works, so both of them earn income for their family and share in the family and household expenses. Her dream is to gradually improve the infrastructure of her home and have her family remain together.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for home improvements.

loans.name: Anielka Yakarelys

texts.es: La sra. Anielka de 27 años de edad, es casada, tiene 1 hujo que depende economicamente de ella. Trabaja como ejecutiva de ventas en Dollar Store desde hace 1 año. Solicita el credito para invertirlos en cambio de zinc del area de la cocina ya que se encuentra en muy mal estado.
texts.en: Anielka is 27 years old, married and has one child who is financially dependent on her.  She has been working as a sales executive in Dollar Store for one year.  She is requesting this loan to invest in replacing the metal roof above her kitchen as it is in a very bad state of repair.

loans.use: to replace her roof

loans.name: Shamsullo

texts.ru: Шамсулло очень любить  заниматься скотоводством. С самого детства он любил наблюдать за ними и считал это ремесло своим предназначением. Куплей продажей КРС он занимается уже год. На Гончинскый рынок  со своим скотам он ходит раз в месяц. Своим бизнесом он доволен и хотел бы в дальнейшим  его расширить. Шамсулло хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота. В надежде на вашу помощь он обратился к нам.
texts.en: Shamsullo really enjoys raising livestock. From his childhood on, he loved watching animals and thought that he is meant for this trade. He has been buying and reselling cattle for a year. He brings his cattle to the Gnonchin market once a month. He is satisfied with his business, and would like to expand it in the future. Shamsullo would like to obtain a loan to buy cattle. Hoping for your help, he has applied to our organization.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is a twenty-five-year-old married man with one child living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been dealing in clothes for eight years now. His hardships are rain, inadequate capital to purchase stock, price fluctuations and inflation. Personal goals are educating his children and buying a car, while his business goal is moving his business to a more permanent location and owning a boutique.

Richard wants money to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie runs a small store at General Balao. She has been selling grocery items to the people in her village for almost two years now and earns just enough profit to sustain their needs. She would like to increase her income so she is now borrowing a loan of PHP 6,000 to buy sardines, breads, biscuits and eggs to sell in her store. This will help increase sales capacity.

She is now 25 years old and has three young children.

Extending friendly service and affordable prices will allow her to gain more customers, leading to additional profits for her children's education.

loans.use: to buy sardines, breads, biscuits and eggs to sell in her store

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es: Miguel de 34 años de edad es casado, tiene 5 hijos pequeños en edad escolar.  Esta solicitando su 1er credito con el objetivo de comprar semilla para siembra y manejo de pasto, el cual le servira para alimentacion de verano a su hato ganadero, asi como para comercializar y obtener ingresos para el consumo familiar. Cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa y de un hermano que le ayuda a realizar la labores diarias. Su mayor sueño es poder consolidar su hato y contar con las condiciones basicas para su familia ademas desea que sus hijos estudien para que sean hombres de bien.
texts.en: Miguel is 34 years old. He is married and has five small children who are all school aged. He is requesting his first loan with the objective of buying seeds to plant and care for hay, which will allow him to feed his herd for the summer. This will allow him to sell and have profits for his family's needs. He receives help from his wife and brother to complete his daily work.  His biggest dream is to grow his herd and provide for the basic needs of his family, and he also hopes that his children will continue to study so they can grow up to be good men.

loans.use: to buy seeds to grow hay.

loans.name: Estela Guadalupe

texts.es: Estela Guadalupe de 37 años de edad, vive junto a sus dos hijas las cuales se dedican a estudiar. Desde hace 10 años que Estela se dedica a elaborar tortillas para comercializar, para poder aprovechar al máximo su negocio, ella elabora tortillas al mediodía y por la tarde, lo que le resulta muy positivo ya que cuenta con varios clientes. Estela solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de maíz y de esta forma elaborar más tortillas y así atender a más clientes, así mismo con el dinero obtenido por el préstamo comprará cilindros extras de gas propano para contar con provisión. Estela es una madre muy responsable y trabajadora quien vela por el bienestar de sus hijas, por lo que desea mejorar su negocio y así contar con una vida mejor.
texts.en:
Estela Guadalupe, age 37, lives with her two daughters, who attend school.

Estela has been making tortillas to sell for ten years.  In order to be able to make the most of her business, she makes the tortillas at noon and in the evening.  This brings her very positive results because she has many customers.

Estela is requesting a loan to be able to buy a greater quantity of corn.  This way she will make more tortillas and tend to more customers.  She will also use the money from the loan to buy extra cylinders of propane gas in order to have a supply.

Estela is a very responsible and hard-working mother who watches out for her daughters’ well-being.  Therefore, she wishes to improve her business in order to have a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Ana Luz

texts.es: Ana Luz de cincuenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos; ella se dedica a la agricultura, específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en este rubro, le gusta mucho su labor y está orgullosa de todo lo que ha emprendido en el ámbito y de la experiencia que ha ganado para obtener siempre cosechas de calidad, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a su vivienda, comercia en las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela fija pues la gente la prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan a precio realmente accesible; Ana es una mujer decidida, quiere alcanzar su sueños y está trabajando duro para lograrlo, sabe que con su esfuerzo llegara al éxito, en esta temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción para maximizar sus ganancias pero no posee de suficiente capital para la compra de insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herramienta, herbicida etc. Ana Luz tiene capacidad de pago y está segura que cancelara a tiempo el financiamiento y a la vez le dará a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Ana Luz, 51, lives with her life partner and their children.  She works in agriculture, specifically growing corn and beans; she has been working in this line of work for several years.  She likes her work very much and is proud of everything she’s taken on and of the experience she’s gained in order to always produce quality crops.  

Her parcel of farmland is located in an area of intense agricultural activity that’s very near her house.  She sells in areas adjacent to her and has quite a few regular customers because people prefer her because she always has what they need at accessible prices.

Ana is a very determined woman who wants to reach her dreams and is working very hard to attain them.  She knows that she will attain success with her effort.

In this planting season she wants to increase production in order to maximize profits but she does not have enough capital to buy the supplies she needs which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to be able to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, tools, herbicide, etc.

Ana Luz has the capacity to repay and is sure that she will pay off the loan on time and at the same time give her family a fulfilled life.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farm supplies.

loans.name: Roque

texts.en:
Roque is a farmer who lives in Lanna with his spouse and two children. Income from the farming business goes for meals and allowances for his children. Roque's wife is his partner in planting and harvesting rice to sell. They have been doing it for over 10 years now. 

Roque is now 47 years old and still wants to improve his farming practices and keep ensuring an abundant harvest. He is now taking out a loan of PHP 48,000 to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers, pesticides and molluscicides to use in farming. This will help maintain good profits from the business.

Roque is also praying for good health so he can continuously manage his business and pay for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizers, pesticides and molluscicides to use in farming

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.en:
Aurelio is 37 years old. He is a father of two children and married to a housekeeper. He engages in a farming business in the Philippines. He has been in the business for 27 years.

At present, Aurelio is encountering financial difficulties. He is having a crisis in providing for his needs in farming. Thus, Aurelio is asking for a loan of PHP 40,000 to buy fertilizers, seeds, and herbicides for his farm. He hopes to manage the business well and get better yields for higher income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds, and herbicides for his farm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to cover his wedding costs

loans.name: Rodrigo

texts.es: Rodrigo, se ha dedicado desde  muy joven al oficio de la agricultura, su padre le enseño todo lo necesario para hacer este trabajo de la mejor manera. Rodrigo vive junto a su esposa y dos hijas en una casa muy humilde la cual está ubicada en el mismo terreno en el que se dedica a la siembra. Él se encarga de sembrar maíz, un grano básico que tiene gran demanda en el país por lo que es un negocio muy estable. Rodrigo solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar maíz para sembrar y abono, con esto él aprovechara al máximo sus recursos y sembrar mucho más para esta temporada y así obtener más ganancias y hacer crecer la cantidad de cultivo, aprovechando al máximo su parcela.
texts.en: Rodrigo has been farming since he was very young.  His father taught him everything he needed to know in order to carry out his work in the best way possible.  Rodrigo lives together with his wife and two daughters in a very humble home which is located on the same plot of land as his crops.  Rodrigo grows corn, a basic grain for which there exists a lot of demand nationwide.  This makes his a stable business.  Rodrigo is requesting a loan so that he can buy corn to sow.  He will also buy fertilizer.  This will allow him to make the most of his resources, sow much more this season, increase his quantity of crops and increase his profits.  He will take full advantage of his plot of land.

loans.use: to buy seeds

loans.name: Berta Alicia

texts.es: Berta Alicia de 65 años de edad, es una persona que ha trabajado muy duro por salir adelante, ella vive junto a su única hija la cual aporta para el hogar, y por quien se esforzó día con día vendiendo carne en el mercado, trabajo el cual tuvo que dejar debido a que al pasar del tiempo se convirtió muy pesado para ella. Actualmente Berta se dedica a la elaboración de tortillas, trabajo el cual realiza en su casa de habitación y que afortunadamente le brinda grandes beneficios. Ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar maíz por mayor, ya que de este modo es un poco más barato, y así mismo cal para colocarle al maíz, con esto Berta no solo espera ahorrarse un poco de dinero sino también hacer más tortillas y de este modo aumentar sus ventas lo cual es primordial para ella.
texts.en:
Berta Alicia, 65, is a person who has worked very hard in order to get ahead.  She lives with her only daughter who shares in household expenses and for whom she strove daily selling meat in the market, a job she had to leave because in time it became too demanding for her.

Currently, Berta works making tortillas, work she does at home and that fortunately produces great benefits.

She’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn at wholesale because it’s a little less expensive this way and also to buy lime powder to add to the corn.  With this Berta expects not only to save some money but also to make more tortillas thus increasing sales which is her main concern.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make tortillas.

loans.name: Vanessa

texts.en:
Vanessa runs a small store in front of her house at Cataggaman. She has been operating it for four years and earns P5,000 each month selling grocery items to her neighborhood. Vanessa is now 26 years old and had one child attending school. She would like to increase sales capacity in her store and that requires her to expand her merchandise, too. For this reason, she is borrowing P7,000 to buy milk, sugar, coffee, soft drinks and bread to sell in her store.

Vanessa would like to stock up on more merchandise to sell in order to meet all her customers' demand due to the affordable prices she offers.

She hopes to keep acquiring good sales from her business to pay for her child's education expenses.

loans.use: to buy milk, sugar, coffee, soft drinks and bread to sell in her store

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en: Running a small store is the business of Marilou that she relies on for income for the daily allowance of her child. She started to operate her store eight years ago. Now, Marilou is asking for a loan of P7,000 to stock up on more grocery items for her store. This will help increase sales capacity and boost her profits, too. She will buy canned goods, soft drinks, bread and eggs to sell. She promises to pay back her loan in full. Someday, she hopes to make the business profitable for the overall welfare of the family.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, soft drinks, bread and eggs to sell

loans.name: Amalia

texts.en:
Rice farming is the primary source of income from Lanna. Amalia and her family peacefully live here and they plant and harvest rice from their two-hectare rice field. They have been in the farming business for almost 10 years and earn about PHP 20,000 each harvest season (twice a year). 

Amalia is now 35 years old and had four children attending school. Her income from the business goes for their meals and school expenses. She is now asking for a loan of PHP 43,000 to further improve her business. She will buy rice seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides for crop maintenance. This will help ensure healthier crops to harvest. 

Amalia would like to achieve abundant yields every harvest season to continuously pay matriculation fees of her children. She will be very happy and proud to see her children as professionals in their chosen career someday.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds, fertilizers, and insecticides for crop maintenance.

loans.name: Ayat

texts.en:
Ayat is a conservative woman who is unwilling to upload her photo on the Internet, so the photo is of her brother.

Ayat is an 18-year-old single woman who lives in Irbid, Jordan

Ayat is seeking a loan of 500 JOD si she can buy more clothes for trading purposes.

Ayat is under 30 years old so her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy clothes for trading purposes

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 27-year-old married woman. She is a mother of 3 children and she lives in Nao'or, Jordan

Fatima is seeking a loan of 500 JOD so she can fix her home and improve her home living conditions.

Fatima is under 30 years old so her loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to fix her home and improve her home living conditions

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es: Cristina es una persona muy responsable quien vive junto a sus padres mayores de 80 años y una hija menor de edad, quienes dependen por completo de Cristina. Desde hace 17 años que ella posee un puesto de comida en donde elabora desayunos y almuerzos y también vende jugos, sodas, agua, golosinas, entre otros más. Su negocio se encuentra en un lugar muy estratégico debido a que está rodeado por fábricas. Cristina solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar: verduras, granos  básicos, frutas, bebidas, carnes y toda la materia prima necesaria para la elaboración de desayunos y almuerzos y así también ofrecer más variedad. Con esto Cristina pretende dar el mejor servicio y precios accesibles para que sus clientes puedan incrementarse lo cual es fundamental para ella, ya que es la única persona que labora en su casa y es quien debe salir adelante por su familia.
texts.en:
Cristina is a very responsible person living with her elderly parents who are in their 80s and with a minor daughter who all depend entirely upon Cristina.

She’s had a food stand for 17 years where she makes breakfast and lunch and also sells juice, sodas, water and snacks, among others.  Her business is located in a very strategic place because it’s surrounded by factories.

Cristina is asking INTEGRAL for a loan in order to have the money needed to buy vegetables, basic grains, fruit, beverages, meat and all the raw materials needed to make the breakfasts and lunches and also to offer more variety.

With this Cristina intends to provide better service and accessible prices so that her customers will increase which is fundamental for her since she’s the only one who works in her household and who must get ahead for her family.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, vegetables and others.

loans.name: Cecilia Yaneth

texts.es: Cecilia Yaneth de 28 años de edad, es una madre muy responsable y dedicada que vive junto a sus dos hijos y su esposo. Cecilia se dedica a la venta de camisas, suéteres  para hombres y mujeres como también stickers para automóviles. Su negocio está ubicado en  el Centro de su ciudad de vivienda, una zona de mucho comercio debido a la gran afluencia de personas que transitan por el lugar. Debido a que la ropa que vende es con estampados juveniles y temas de moda, muchos jóvenes visitan su negocio aprovechando también los precios bajos. Cecilia solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda invertir en la compra de stickers,  camisas y suéteres con temas de moda para que pueda atraer la atención de más personas y de esta manera incrementar sus ventas  y brindarle toda la ayuda necesaria a su esposo para sostener su hogar.
texts.en:
Cecilia Yaneth, 28, is a very responsible, devoted mother living with her children and her husband.  Cecilia sells shirts and sweaters for men and women and also stickers for cars.  Her business is located in the center of the city she lives in, a zone that’s very commercial because many people pass through the place.

Due to the fact that the clothes she sells have youthful prints and themes that are in style, many young people visit her store taking advantage of the low prices too.

Cecilia is asking for a loan to invest in stickers, shirts and sweaters that are in style in order to attract more people thus increasing her sales and providing all the help needed for husband to be able to support their home.

loans.use: to buy shirts to sell.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es: Alfredo de 55 años de edad, es una persona muy trabajadora y proactiva, vive junto a su esposa en casa propia. Él cuenta con un negocio de productos perecederos como: sodas, embutidos, carnes, detergente y productos plásticos, el negocio esta ubicado en un mercado, por lo que posee clientes fijos y constantes. Alfredo y su esposa son muy conocidos en el lugar ya que brindan excelentes precios y muy  buenos productos además que el servicio al cliente es excelente. Con el enorme deseo de surtir su negocio Alfredo solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de productos  que ya posee e incluir otros nuevos como más variedad de refrescos, leche en polvo, huevos, depósitos plásticos, detergentes, lejías y otros más. Alfredo es una persona muy positiva quien tiene toda la confianza que su negocio mejorará gracias al préstamo otorgado.
texts.en: Alfredo is 55 years old.  He is a very hard-working, pro-active person who lives together with his wife in his own home.  He has a business selling perishable foodstuffs such as soda, cold cuts, meats, detergents and plastic products.  His business is located in a market and he has regular customers.  Alfredo and his wife are very well known in their town because they offer excellent prices and very good products.  In addition, their customer service is excellent.  Alfredo really wants to stock his business and is requesting a loan to buy a larger quantity of products.  He will buy some products that he already stocks as well as some new ones.  He will buy a greater variety of soft drinks, powdered milk, eggs, plastic containers, detergents, bleach, etc.  Alfredo is a very positive person who is very confident that his business will improve as a result of the loan he is receiving.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, powdered milk, eggs and plastic containers

loans.name: Eman

texts.en: Eman is a 38-year-old married woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan. She is supporting three members of her family. Eman sells clothes and she is requesting a loan of 600 Jordanian dinars to purchase larger quantities for trading purposes. Eman is looking to establish her own shop.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for trading purposes

loans.name: Leonardo

texts.en:
Leonardo lives in their community with his wife and three children. He is 53 years old, a productive husband managing their farming business for more than 15 years. This is their source of income where he usually gets the expenses used for daily necessities such as food allowances, electricity and medicine. So he wants to improve his business. 

For this reason, he is asking for a loan in the amount of P15,000 to purchase seeds, pesticides, and fertilizers that will be used in his field in order to yield a better crop by the next season. He hopes to have a big harvest to provide for the needs of his family. Through his hard work and patience to work every day in his business, he knows that there is hope for him to obtain a better living.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, pesticides, and fertilizers

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en: Mohammad is a 25-year-old single man. He lives in Sahab, Jordan. Mohammad is looking to take a loan of 500 JOD to buy more machines and electrical tools to make electrical extensions. Mohammad is under 30 years old, so his loan is a youth loan.

loans.use: to buy machines and elecrical tools to make electrical extensions

loans.name: Gladys Marily

texts.es: Gladys Marily de 37 años de edad,  vive únicamente junto a sus padres en casa propia.  Gladys es comerciante de productos perecederos y de primera necesidad para el hogar como: granos básicos, jabones, papel higiénico, pasta dental, aderezos para alimentos y otros más. Gladys depende por completo de su negocio por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda invertir en el, ampliando  la cantidad de productos que ofrece, ella desea comprar sopas instantáneas, pastas, golosinas y más. Lo que Gladys espera es obtener nuevos clientes y así aprovechar al máximo la ubicación que posee ya que se encuentra en el interior de un mercado, lugar que es muy concurrido, lo que es de mucho beneficio ya que día con día la cantidad de personas que llegan al lugar es bastante grande.
texts.en:
Gladys Marily, 37, lives only with her parents in a house of her own. Gladys is a merchant; she sells perishables and basic staple items for the home like basic grains, soap, toilet paper, toothpaste, spices for food and others.  

Gladys depends on her business totally which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to invest in it expanding the amount of products she offers.  She wants to buy instant soup, pasta, snacks and more.

What Gladys expects is to attract new customers taking full advantage of the location she has which is inside a market, a place that’s very busy which is very beneficial because every day large numbers of people come to this place which is quite large

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 22-year-old man from Al Khaledieh, Al Mafraq, Jordan. He is requesting a loan of 1,200 Jordanian dinars to cover his wedding expenses.

Because Mahmoud is less than 30 years old, his loan is considered a youth loan.

loans.use: to cover part of his wedding expenses

loans.name: Alicia Miguel

texts.es: Alicia Miguel de cincuenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su hijo en casa propia; ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, huevos, leche, jabón entre otros, tiene varios años de tener el negocio y le ha dado muy buenos resultados, está ubicado en una zona muy estratégica donde circulan muchas personas, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues las personas prefieren su tienda porque es la más surtida siempre tiene los que ellos necesitan con producto de calidad y a precios accesibles además se caracteriza por su amabilidad siempre está a la orden de la clientela; Alicia es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre está en búsqueda de oportunidades que le den el paso al éxito, en esta ocasión quiere acrecentar el negocio pero necesita de capital para invertir en los insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, productos instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, jabones etc. Alicia Miguel tiene capacidad de pago y es muy responsable asegura el pago de la deuda y a la vez confía en que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Alicia Miguel is 56 years old and lives together with her son in her own home.  She owns a store where she sells basic household products such as beans, eggs, milk, soap, etc.  She has owned her business for a number of years and has had very good results.  Her store is located in a very strategic area where there are a lot of people passing by.  She has gained a lot of customers and people prefer to shop in her store because it is the best stocked.  She always has what people need and sells good-quality products at affordable prices.  She is also noted for her kindness.  She is always at her customers' disposal.

Alicia is an entrepreneurial woman who has a great desire to do well in life.  She is always looking for opportunities to achieve success.  Right now she would like to grow her business but she needs capital to invest in buying supplies.  For this reason, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy basic grains, instant products, candies, drinks, soaps, etc.  Alicia Miguel has the ability to repay her loan and is very responsible.  She is certain that she will repay her loan and, at the same time, provide her household with financial security.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant products, candies, drinks and soap

loans.name: Rogie

texts.en:
Rogie is a hardworking and responsible husband and father to his four children. He is happily married and is raising rice crops. According to him, he has been in his farming business since he was 14 years old.

Rogie would like to take out a loan amount of PHP 20,000, which he will use to purchase of sacks of rice seed and fertilizer to improve his farming business. He hopes that he could supply all the necessary farm supplies in his 1.8 hectares of rice fields to be able to obtain greater profit, which will enable him to sustain their daily needs and to save some amount for their emergency purposes when he gets weak.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice seed and fertilizer to improve his farming business

loans.name: Azmi

texts.en:
Azmi is a 60-year-old farmer who is married with no children. The income he gets from agriculture isn't enough to cover all of his needs, so for the past 15 years, he has been raising and selling sheep and sheep products. This project has been profitable, but still leaves him short financially. 

Azmi is requesting a $3,000 loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing more sheep and expanding and improving the herd's condition. This will increase sales and improve the family's income. Azmi is pictured here with his herd of sheep.

loans.use: to purchase more sheep and expand and improve his herd's condition.

loans.name: Salam

texts.en:
Salam is a 42 year-old single woman who, for the past eight years, has been sewing and selling clothes to her loyal customers. She has a good reputation amongst her customers, and her work has been profitable, but she needs addition funds to cover her costs. 

Salam is requesting a $3,000 loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing an additional sewing machine. This will enable Salam to expand her work, increase sales, and grow her income. In this picture, Salam is photographed in her workshop.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Tierra Group

texts.es:
Ellas son el grupo Tierra. Su nombre tiene raíz en que confían que la tierra es de quien la trabaja.
Maria Magdalena, integrante del grupo Tierra, esta muy agradecida por formar parte de un grupo de crédito solidario pues con ello, ha podido invertir en su tienda de abarrotes y proveerlo de mercancía. 
Ella es mujer, esposa y madre de dos hijos, y decidió poner este negocio en casa, para ofrecer productos básicos para el hogar ya que lo vio prometedor al ser de las primeras familias en llegar a la colonia.
María Magdalena esta muy comprometida con el préstamo, pues mediante estas inversiones a mejorado su negocio y con ello, la calidad de vida propia y de los suyos.
texts.en:
The women above belong to the Tierra (Earth) group. They chose this name because they trust in the earth which gives them succor. 

Maria Magdalena is a member of this group. She is very grateful to be part of a group that can obtain loans as the money has enabled her to invest in her grocery store by buying more stock.

Maria is married and has two children. She decided to open this business in her house in order to sell household basics. Since her family was one of the first to settle in the district, it seemed like a promising opportunity.
Her friends say that Elena is very pleased to have a loan because with these purchases she has improved her business which in turn has led to a better standard of living for herself and her family.

loans.use: buy more merchandise for her grocery store

loans.name: Manis

texts.en:
Manis  is a 30-year-old businessman  who lives in Juba. He is married, and has 2 children between the ages of 2 and 5. 1 goes to school. 

Manis  runs a general store, and has been in business for 3 years. He has one  employee, and he heard about Finance Sudan through the loan officers  and he is taking a loan of 3000 SDG to purchase more items like shoes, women's dresses, and many other items. He benefits a lot from the previous loans by making profits.

In 5 years, he wants to build a permanent house and send his children to school. His  major challenges include high taxes levied on him in the market. 

He is happy with Kiva loans.

loans.use: to purchase more items like shoes, women's dresses, and many other items.

loans.name: María Justina

texts.es: María Justina de cuarenta y siete años de edad vive junto a sus dos hijas una de dieciséis años y otra de once en casa propia, ella posee una venta de tortillas, ya tiene varios años de tener el negocio y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia, cada día las elabora más rápido y de mejor calidad, el negocio está ubicado en la zona donde vive,  tiene ya mucha clientela fija pues las personas la prefieren por la calidad, higiene, buenos precios pero sobre todo porque es el servicio más rápido; María es una mujer emprendedora siempre dispuesta a superarse, quiere alcanzar el éxito por eso se esfuerza día con día, en las últimas semanas ha aumentado la demanda por lo que María quiere aumentar la producción  pero necesita de la compra de insumos y no posee el capital suficiente por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor. María Justina tiene buen record de pago y tiene una moral intachable, asegura que podrá cancelar el financiamiento y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Justina, 47, lives with her two daughters, a 16-year-old and an 11-year-old, in her own house.  She sells tortillas; she’s had the business for several years and she’s acquired much experience.  Every day she works faster and produces better quality.  The business is located in the zone where she lives and she has a large, regular clientele because people prefer her for the quality, hygiene and good prices and above all because her service is faster.

María is an enterprising person who is always ready to improve; she wants to attain success which is what she strives for day to day.  In the last few weeks demand has increased which is why María wants to increase production but she needs to buy ingredients and does not have enough capital so is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn at wholesale.

María Justina has good payment history and faultless morals.  She is sure that she will be able to repay the loan and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale.

loans.name: Rosa Amelia

texts.es: Rosa Amelia es una señora muy humilde y trabajadora, vive junto a su esposo, dos sobrinos y un nieto, su compañero de vida se dedica al trabajo de la agricultura de frijoles y yuca. Por su lado Rosa vende frescos naturales, hielo, sodas  y hot dog, los cuales elabora y comercializa en su casa de habitación. Con la intención de incrementar sus ganancias Rosa desea poner una venta de pupusas, las cuales son elaboradas de masa de maíz, rellena de frijoles, queso y chicharrón, este es el platillo típico salvadoreño más vendido, por lo que es muy rentable. Es por esta razón que ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para contar con el capital necesario para invertir en las compra de maíz, queso, chicharrón, verduras y todo lo necesario para iniciar con la pupusería y así mismo comprar mayor cantidad de sodas, frutas para elaborar los frescos y la materia prima para los hot dog. Todo esto llena de mucha ilusión a Rosa que tiene la fe que su negocio mejorará.
texts.en: Rosa Amelia is a very humble, hard-working lady who lives together with her husband, two nephews and one grandson.  Her husband is a farmer who grows beans and cassava.  Rosa sells natural fruit drinks, ice, soda and hot dogs which she makes and sells in her home.  With the aim of increasing her profits, Rosa would like to start a business selling pupusas, which are made from corn dough and filled with beans, cheese and chicharrón (ground cooked pork).  This is a popular, traditional Salvadoran dish and so it is very profitable.  Rosa is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL so that she will have the capital she needs to invest in buying corn, cheese, chicharrón, vegetables and everything else she needs to start her pupuseria.  She will also buy a larger quantity of sodas, fruit for making her drinks and supplies for making hot dogs.  This fills Rosa with a lot of hope as she believes that her business will improve.

loans.use: to buy corn, cheese and ground cooked pork for making pupusas

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en: Cecelia is 49 years old and lives in Buchanan with her four children. They are in school. She did not go to school and she has been involved in business for the past 24 years. Currently she is operating a cook shop (restaurant.) She has a lot of customers, since her food is always on time and has a good taste. She says she has not much income and she has to cook different kinds of food every day to  meet the taste of  her customers. She is requesting a  loan to purchase more rice, oil, meat, charcoal and fish for her business. Her future plan is to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, meat, charcoal and fish for her business

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah  lives in Buchanan. She is 44 years old and married with three children, aged 10 to 25, that live at home. For the past twenty-seven  years, she has been selling palm oil in the local market. She established the business with small loans from her mother. She is requesting a loan to purchase more  palm oil to expand her business. In the future she wants to build a house  and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more  palm oil to expand her business

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en: Cynthia, 43, lives in Buchanan, and she is married with four children between the ages of 4 and 27. Two of them are in school and live at home, while the others are living on their own. Her husband is a supervisor of a local entity. Her priority is to have more inventory for her business.  She has been selling pans, spoons, plates, bowls, cups for the past 10 years. She started with a small amount of capital which she received from her husband. She is requesting a loan to purchase more pans, plates, bowls, spoons, cups, and buckest for her business. Her plans are to educate her two younger children and build a house.

loans.use: to purchase more pans, plates, bowls, spoons, cups, and buckets for her business

loans.name: Dalal

texts.en:
Dalal is a 33 years old, married, and a mother to four sons and three daughters. Her husband's work earns a low salary that is not enough to cover the family's needs.

For the past four years, Dalal has been raising and selling sheep and sheep products, which has been a profitable project to the family, but she needs more support to cover these costs.

Dalal wants to expand and improve her sheep business, so she is requesting a $900 JOD loan from FATEN to help her purchase more sheep and improve the herd's condition. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

In this image, Dalal is photographed with part of her herd.

loans.use: to purchase sheep and improve her herd's condition.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Rana

texts.en:
Rana is a young woman of 35 years, who is married to her husband Morad, with no children yet. Rana prefers not to have her photo published online, so Morad appears in her Kiva profile photo, pictured next to their house. 

Rana wants to live with her husband in better home conditions, such as paint and new windows. Both Rana and her husband are employed but get low salaries, which are not enough to cover these repairs, so she is requesting a $3,000 USD loan from FATEN. This loan will offer to Rana and her husband comfortable and suitable home condition and so they can enjoy living in the house.

loans.use: to repair and improve the condition of her house.

loans.name: Erling Alexander

texts.es: Erling labora para una empresa de transporte desde hace varios años como conductor, es un joven trabajador,  responsable, con mucho deseo de superacion, Solicita 2do refinanciamiento para la compra de un solar que venden junto a su casa, espera aprovechar la oportunidad de mejorar su propiedad,  y asi brindar a su esposa y su hijo mejores condiciones de vida.  Su mayor sueño es que su hijo crezca sano y que estudie para ser una persona de bien.
texts.en: Erling is an employee of a transportation company, where he has been working as a driver form nay years. He is a responsible and hard-working young man with a great desire to get ahead in life. He is requesting his 2nd loan to buy a building lot close to his house, taking advantage of this opportunity to improve his property, thus granting better living conditions to his wife and child. His biggest dream is son enjoys and healthy growth and that he studies to become a respectable person.

loans.use: To buy some building land.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es: Miguel Ángel de treinta y seis años de edad vive junto a su mama, su hermana y dos sobrinos; el posee un taller de enderezado y pintura  en el cual tiene diez años de experiencia, está orgulloso de su labor siempre trata que sea de la mejor calidad tiene mucha clientela pues los precios bajos y el servicio son excelentes; Miguel Ángel es un hombre dedicado a su labor pero sobre todo a su hogar, pues sabe que su familia es muy importante, sus tiempos de descanso los aprovecha en su vivienda, pues no hay como el hogar para disfrutar. Desde hace ya algún tiempo su casa necesita reparaciones como cambiar el techo, realizar pequeños repellos y poner balcones, por la época de lluvia quiere reparar lo más rápido posible para que su familia no tenga incomodidad, necesita de un capital de apoyo para invertir en los materiales por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar duralita, cemento, balcones, polines, etc. Miguel Ángel tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel, 36, lives with his mother, her sister and two nephews.  He has a car repair and paint shop; he has ten years’ experience and is proud of his work because he always tries to provide the best service.  He has a large clientele because prices are low and services are excellent.

Miguel Ángel is a man who is devoted to his work but above all to his home because he knows that his family is very important.  He uses his time off to make home improvements because there’s no place like home to enjoy.

For some time his house has needed some repairs like to have the roof replaced, to do some small plastering jobs and install balconies.  Because of the rains, he’d like to repair as soon as possible so that his family won’t be inconvenienced.
