He needs support funds in order to buy the materials he needs so is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy Duralita [cardboard reinforced cement roofing], cement, balconies, metal roof beams, etc.

Miguel Ángel has good payment references and is very responsible; he assures that he’ll be able to repay the loan and at the same time provide his family with better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy building supplies.

loans.name: Mario Javier

texts.es: Mario Javier de cuarenta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañera de  vida y su hijo; él se dedica a la compra y venta de lámina de hierro, tiene varios años con el negocio y le ha dejado buenos resultados, lo realiza de forma ambulante en su vehículo, tiene mucha clientela pues siempre quedan satisfechos  con los precios y con su gran amabilidad;  Mario es un hombre visionario  con muchas ganas de salir adelante, siempre aprovecha las oportunidades que se le presentan para poder alcanzar el éxito, quiere acrecentar el negocio y se dedicó a solicitarle  a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar lamina de hierro por mayor. Mario Javier tiene buenas referencias  de pago y es muy responsable tiene la certeza que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a la familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mario Javier, 46, lives with his life companion and their son.  He buys and sells sheet metal; he’s been in business several years and it’s been quite profitable.  He does his work from place to place in his vehicle.  He has many customers because they are always satisfied with his prices and his great kindness.

Mario is a forward-looking man who very much wants to get ahead.  He always takes advantage of opportunities that arise to attain success.  He wants to enlarge the business so has asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy sheet metal at wholesale.

Mario Javier has good payment references and is very responsible; he’s sure that he will be able to repay the loan and at the same time give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sheet metal, cans and plastics to recycle.

loans.name: Anita

texts.en:
Anita is a farmer who lives in Lanna. She is married to a farmer, and they have a child in college. To support their family, Anita and her husband plant and harvest rice in their two-hectare field, which generates about PHP 20,000 twice a year (during harvest season). Anita would like to improve her income so she is now asking for a loan of PHP 48,000 to buy fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming.

Someday, Anita hopes to achieve more plentiful harvests in order to save funds for her child's school fees and to buy hogs to raise as an additional source of income. This will help boost her profits for the overall welfare of the family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and insecticides to use in farming

loans.name: Rasha

texts.en:
Rasha is 35 years old and a married woman. Her husband serves in the military as he works in the public security directorate. They have a baby girl.

Rasha does a small business at home selling  blankets in winter only, but now she is working on expanding the business to include lighter bed sheets and covers that would suit spring and summer seasons. For that reason, she has applied to this loan to buy those products.

loans.use: to include selling lighter bed sheets and covers for summer

loans.name: Nosa Group

texts.en:
This group, called Nosa, consists of 4 women: Fathia, Amal, Sabah and Nosah. They live in Sana`a, Yemen. They took a loan of 180000 YER.
Sabah, pictured second from the left, is 38 years old and married with 6 children. She is hardworking and dedicated to her family, and through effort and dedication has managed to overcome adversity and get ahead. Sabah has a business selling perfumes, which she has been doing for 10 years. She applied for a loan of 50000 YER from AMB to buy perfumes for her business. Sabah is working toward increasing her income and hopes to one day own a big perfume store.

loans.use: to buy perfumes for her business.

loans.name: Benebe

texts.en: Benebe is 19 years old and lives in Buchanan, Liberia. She is a high school student and sells cosmetics in the local market so that she can afford to stay in school. Benebe started the business three years ago with the help of her oldest sister. She is requesting a loan to purchase more cosmetics for her business, and she plans to become a big business woman in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics to sell in the market.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en: Ruth is 28 years old, married, and has four children between the ages of 3 and 11. All of her children attend school. Ruth works by selling items such as buckets, dish pans, slippers, blouses, and tubs. Her mother taught her to sell, and she has been doing this business for the past seven years. The biggest challenge Ruth faces is transporting the goods from Monrovia to Buchanan. She is requesting this loan to purchase more blouses, slippers, dish pans, and buckets to sell. Her business dream is to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchased more blouses, slippers, dish pans and buckets for her business.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
victoria  is a 30-year-old businessman  who lives in Juba. she is married, and has 2 children between the ages of 2and 5. 1 goes to school. 
victoria  runs a general store, and she has been in business for 3 years. she heard about Finance Sudan through the loan officers promotion and she  is taking a loan of 3000
 SDG to purchase more goods.  

In 5 years, she wanted to open a big shop.
her  major challenges include high prices in the market. 

she is happy with kiva loans given to finance sudan.

loans.use: to purchase more items like sorghum, maize, dried cassava, and millet.

loans.name: Lili Siama

texts.en:
Lili siama is a 35-year-old business woman who lives in Juba. She is married and has three children between the ages of 4 and 15 years old. Two of the  children go to school. 

Siama runs a general store and has been in business for five years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients. She is taking a loan of 1500 SDG to purchase more goods.   

In 5 years, she wants to open many branches. 
Her major challenge includes inflation in the market.

loans.use: to buy beans , flour, onions etc.

loans.name: Olga Carmita

texts.es:
Olga Carmita tiene 34 años de edad es soltera tiene dos hijos,  vive con los padres en San Miguel de Bolívar.

Es integrante de la VRC PATRON SAN MIGUEL se encuentra ubicada en la comunidad Paila Loma Cantón San Miguel, a una distancia de 40 minutos a la oficina de la Cooperativa San José Agencia Chillanes, los socios se dedican a la agricultura y crianza de animales.

Olga Carmita se dedica a ala agricultura a la siembra de maíz, fréjol, mora además se dedica a la cría de ganado, cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar, semillas, urea, insecticidas, fertilizantes. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes que le hacen falta para los cultivos. Las compras y las ventas lo hace en San Pablo.

El sueño es poder ayudarles a los hijos a culminar los estudios. El sueño es poder ver televisión, salir de viaje, fiestas del patrón san Miguel, y las festividades del carnaval.
texts.en:
Olga Carmita is 34 years old, single, and has two children.  She lives with her parents in San Miguel de Bolívar.

Olga is a member of the Communal Bank “Patron San Miguel”, which is located in the community of Paila Loma in the canton of San Miguel.  This community is 40 minutes away from the Chillanes branch office of Cooperativa San José.  The members of this Communal Bank engage in agriculture and livestock breeding.  

Olga Carmita is a farmer who grows corn, beans, and blackberries.  In addition, she raises cattle and pigs.  Olga is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, urea, insecticides, and fertilizers.  With the help of this loan, she will be able to buy the seeds and fertilizer that she needs.  Her purchases and sales are conducted in San Pablo.  Olga’s dream is to help her children finish their studies.  

In her free time, Olga enjoys watching television, traveling, celebrating the patron saint festivals of San Miguel, and celebrating the Carnival festivities.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, urea, insecticides, and fertilizers

loans.name: Joaquín

texts.es: Joaquín de cincuenta y tres años de edad  vive junto a sus tres hijos, él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz, adicional a esto siembra chile, tomate, papaya trabaja en este rubro desde hace ya veintiséis años, tiene mucha experiencia  y para cada cultivo tiene la visión de una nueva siembra, está muy orgulloso de lo que ha logrado pues gracias a sus excelentes cosechas se ha hecho de mucha clientela, la gente lo  prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad a precios accesibles además con un buen servicio; Joaquín es un hombre dedicado a su trabajo, busca las mejores oportunidades para así llegar al éxito; en esta temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción necesita invertir en insumos pero no posee de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, y el pago de mano de obra. Joaquín tiene buenas referencias de credito y buena moral asegura que pagara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Joaquín, 53, lives with his three children.  He works in agriculture, specifically growing corn; he also grows chilies, tomatoes and papaya.  He’s been in this line of work for 26 years and has much experience.  He has a plan for each new crop and is very proud of what he’s accomplished because thanks to his excellent harvests he’s acquired many customers.  People prefer him because he always has what they need: quality products at accessible prices with good service.

Joaquín is a man who is dedicated to his work; he looks for the best opportunities to attain success.  This planting season he wants to increase production and needs to invest in supplies but lacks the capital to do so which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer and to pay labor costs.  Joaquín has good credit references and good morals; he assures that he will repay the loan and give his family a better life at the same time.

loans.use: to buy seeds, farm supplies and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Felipe  Adan

texts.es: Felipe  Adán, vive junto a su esposa y sus tres hijos quienes se dedican a estudiar. Felipe como todo padre de familia responsable se dedica al trabajo que aprendió de sus padres, ya que él trabaja como agricultor, sembrando maíz y frijoles, los cuales con mucho entusiasmo e ilusión lleva a vender al mercado de pueblo en el que reside. Así mismo se dedica a la crianza de pollos, trabajo en el que su esposa y sus hijos le ayudan con actividades como alimentar a los animales y ver que estén en un lugar adecuado para su sano crecimiento. Felipe solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de semillas y de frijoles y maíz y así aumentar el porcentaje de ganancias, también invertirá en la compra de gallos y gallinas para reproducir la cantidad de pollos que cría y hacer crecer su granja de aves. Esto llena de mucha alegría a Felipe  ya que le permitirá contar con un mejor futuro.
texts.en: Felipe Adán lives together with his wife and his three children who are all in school.  Felipe is a responsible father who carries out work he learned from his parents.  He works as a farmer, growing corn and beans which he sells in the town market with a great deal of enthusiasm.  He also raises chickens.  His wife and children help him with his tasks such as feeding the animals and making sure that they are in a suitable place for their healthy growth.  Felipe is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy a larger quantity of bean and corn seeds so that he can increase his profits.  He will also invest in buying chickens and hens so that he can increase the number of chickens that he raises and thereby grow his farm.  This fills Felipe with a lot of happiness as it will allow him to enjoy a better future.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seed

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
Mario is 44 years old. He lives in the small village of San Sebastian. He is married to Norma, and they have been blessed with three children. Mario's youngest child is the only one who goes to school, while the other two are married and living with them. 

Mario has cultivated his two hectares of rice fields for 20 years. He is glad because his wife is supportive in performing some easy farming activities, enabling them to economize their expenses by not hiring laborers to do these tasks.

Mario requested a loan of PHP 20,000, which he will use to buy farm supplies to improve his farmland. The couple hopes to get a larger harvest this next crop season. Mario believes that this loan will increase his sales of rice and provide for all the needs of his family. Most especially, he wants to educate his youngest child because it's the only inheritance Mario can give him.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies to improve his farmland

loans.name: Nelson

texts.en:
Nelson is 48 years old and has one infant child. He is a hard-working man, growing rice crops in his community of San Sebastian. He has been in this business for ten years.

Nelson would like to take out for a loan of PHP 20,000 to purchase a sack of rice seed and manure for fertilizer. With this loan, he would be able to improve his crop production. He hopes that he can expand his farming business to be able to earn more income to save for the education of his only child. In addition, he hopes to improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of rice seed and manure for fertilizer

loans.name: Dani

texts.en:
Dani, 33 years old and a single guy, has five brothers and sisters. 

Dani has an office supplies shop where he sells what you need whether you are an employee or a student.

Dani has applied for this loan in order to buy more stationery items for the shop.

loans.use: to buy more stationery items for the shop.

loans.name: Alia

texts.en:
Alia is 50 years old and a married woman. Her husband is a driver; they both are caring for two daughters and one son.

To help her husband in supporting the family and improve their living conditions, Alia does two types of business, both at home; one is making yogurt while the other is selling clothes and blankets and sometimes accessories (depending on the availability of the products).

Now Alia wants to support her second business as she has found out that there is more demand for it, so she has applied for this loan in order to expand and get more variety of goods such as clothes and accessories to increase her revenue that will allow her to expand more in the future.

loans.use: to expand and get more variety of goods such as clothes and accessories

loans.name: Neomi

texts.en: Noemi lives in Compound #3, Liberia, and is 37 years old. She is married and has three children: two are in school and the oldest is out of high school. For the past 10 years she has been selling rice and oil in the market. She makes a profit because she has many customers, and she uses the profit to buy more rice and oil to improve the business and to help sustain her family. Neomi is requesting a loan to purchase more rice and oil for the business. Her future plans are to educate her children and to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase rice and oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy maize flour, millet, cooking oil and other items

loans.name: Zoila Mirian

texts.es: Zoila Mirian de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive junto a sus hijos, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, granos básicos, pan, leche, jabón, entre otros, adicional a esto vende tamales dos días a las semana, tiene varios años de trabajar en su negocio y le ha dado muy buenos resultados, está ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad y aprecios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Zoila es una mujer emprendedora con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan demostrarse a sí mismo que puede llegar al éxito con trabajo duro y dedicación; la demanda ha aumentado por eso necesita invertir más en productos para no decepcionar a los clientes por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, pan, golosinas, producto instantáneo, jabones etc. Zoila tiene buenas referencias  de pago y es muy responsable tiene la certeza que podrá pagar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Zoila Mirian, 43, lives with her children. She has a store where she sells basic staple items, basic grains, bread, milk and soap, among others.  In addition to this she also sells tamales two days a week.  She’s been working in her business many years and it’s given her good results.  She’s located in a very strategic spot and has acquired a good clientele that prefer her because she always meets their needs with quality products and accessible prices, besides service is excellent.

Zoila is an enterprising woman who very much wants to get ahead and is always alert to new opportunities that will prove to her that she’s able to attain success with hard work and dedication.

Demand has increased so she needs to invest in more products in order not to disappoint her customers which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy basic grains, bread, snacks, instant products, soap, etc.

Zoila has good payment references and is very responsible.  She is sure that she will be able to repay the loan while at the same time giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: María Herminia

texts.es: María Herminia vive con su compañero de vida que trabaja como taxista y sus dos hijos mayores de edad uno de 21 y otro de 30 años, éste último colabora con los gastos del hogar ya que es empleado. María es una persona alegre comprometida con su trabajo, desde hace 3 años posee una tienda ubicada en su casa gracias a la que contribuye con los gastos de la misma, el menor de sus hijos le ayuda en su negocio, ella es muy emprendedora. Necesita más producto para surtir la tienda como huevos, leche, cereales, pastas dentales y llegar hacer una de las mas grandes tiendas de la zona es por eso que solicita la ayuda a INTEGRAL  para llegar a concretar su sueño de surtir la tienda con productos de primera necesidad y está segura que las ventas aumentarán, así logrará pagar el prestamo acordado y espera darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.-
texts.en:
María Herminia lives with her life companion who works as a taxi driver and their two adult children, a 21-year-old and a 30-year-old the latter of which is employed and helps with household expenses.

María is a cheerful person who is committed to her work.  She’s had a home-based grocery store for the last three years thanks to which she contributes to household expenses.  Her youngest child helps her with the store; she is very enterprising.  

She needs more products with which to stock her store like eggs, milk, cereal and toothpaste in order to become one of the area’s largest stores which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to make her dream of stocking her store with basic staple items a reality.  

She is sure that sales will increase so she’ll be able to repay the loan; she also hopes to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Ikhlas

texts.en:
Ikhlas, 42 years old and a single lady, has three younger brothers but she lives by herself.

Ikhlas started a small trading business at home to be able to support herself financially, so she went to the wholesale market and free zone market to bring in different types of goods such as cosmetic products, clothes, lingerie and make up products. 

She is now looking to add selling home products mainly kitchenware to have a variety of goods that will satisfy most of her female customers, and for that she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to add selling home products, mainly kitchenware

loans.name: Manahi

texts.en:
Manahi is 45 years old and a conservative married woman. For that reason, she has asked her husband to take her place in the photo.

After his retirement, Manahi’s husband started working in a private company to be able to continue supporting the family. Manahi, on the other hand, decided to help him to support their six children, so she established a small barn where she has rabbits, chickens, and other types of animals that are not available for sale elsewhere in her neighborhood. 

Manahi has applied to this loan to improve the barn rooms that she has so she can include a larger number of animals of each type and buy more food for the animals.

loans.use: to improve the barn rooms

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
Hanan, 47 years old, is a housewife caring for three sons and two daughters. 

To help in improving their living conditions, Hanan started buying and selling home products at her house. She recently added selling clothes, too. Now she has applied for this loan to get more goods to increase her inventory.

loans.use: to get more goods to sell: home products and clothes

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is 50 years old and a housewife; her husband is a private distributer. They still have five sons and daughters living with them.

Amal is starting a clothing sales business at home. She got a few pieces of clothing and sold them, and now she wants to increase the quantity of clothes. For that reason, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: to bring in more clothes to sell

loans.name: Al-Raja Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Raja and consists of 5 members: Royda, Arzag, Saly, Raja and Rina. They live in Aden, Yemen. They are working hard so that they can achieve their goals. 

Raja is 43 years old and is the president of the group. (She is the woman who has a handbag in this photo.) She sells clothes, perfumes and other items. She says that she began with a small business and, thanks to sacrifice and daily hard work, has been able to grow and continually improve her business. 

Raja is asking for a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to purchase ladies' clothes such as pants, blouses, and skirts, as well as perfumes and incenses in order to be able to continue her business. She hopes to one day run a clothing shop.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, incense, and ladies clothes such as pants, blouses, and skirts.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is 45 and lives in Compound #3, Liberia, with her husband and four children, all of whom are in school. For the past seven years, Sarah has sold rice in her community. She makes a good profit because the nearest market is far away. Sarah started her business with financial help from her husband and learned to sell from her mother. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice for her business. Sarah's future plans are to expand her business and eventually build a house.

loans.use: to purchase rice.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy iron sheets, cement, nails, etc

loans.name: Otim John

texts.en:
Otim is a 35-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has four children between the ages of 4 and 12 years old. Otim runs a general store and has been in business for five years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through promotion by the loan officers  and she is taking a loan of 700 SDG to purchase more goods.

In five years, she wants to open a big shop. She hopes to employ more people.

Her major challenges include inflation in the market and high prices.
 
She is happy that Finance Sudan is giving her a loan.

loans.use: to buy water, soda, soap  etc

loans.name: Gulbahor

texts.ru: Гулбахор молодая и  независимая девушка. В протяжении пяти лет она работает в ботаническом  саду.  Она всегда  любила ухаживать за цветами  и деревьями. Можно сказать, что это больше её хобби, а не работа. После работы, когда она возвращается домой, она мечтает увидеть свой дом таким же красивым. К сожалению,  сейчас она видеть только то,  что  срочно нужно проводит косметические работы и оживить дом. Гулбахор  хочет,  взять  займ с вашей  помощью, чтобы осуществить свои давние мечты.
texts.en: Gulbahor is a young and independent woman.  She has been working at a botanical garden for five years.  She has always loved to take care of flowers and trees.  It can be said that this is more of her hobby than work.  After work, when she returns home, she dreams of seeing her home just as beautiful.  Unfortunately, now she can see only the things that need immediate renovation work, and that the home needs be brought to life.  Gulbahor wants to obtain a loan with your help to make her dreams come true.

loans.use: to renovate her house

loans.name: Efrén De Jesus

texts.es:
Efrén anteriormente trabajaba en las labores del campo en un municipio, donde tenía organizada toda su vida con su familia y así podían tener una buena calidad de vida, pero por circunstancias de la violencia se vio en la obligación de dejar todo a un lado y así llegó a la ciudad en busca de mejores oportunidades económicas y sociales para progresar con su familia. Hace 25 años que dejó su municipio y llego a la ciudad comenzó vendiendo frutas de manera ambulante, después comenzó a vender mercancía y por último, desde hace unos 12 años aproximadamente, montó un local de venta de calzado con el que ha podido generar ingresos para su hogar y así poder tener una buena calidad de vida con su familia. El negocio lo ha logrado sacar adelante y poco a poco ha venido incrementando sus ventas; y ahora que se acerca la temporada donde sus ventas se aumentan considerablemente, Efrén requiere de un préstamo para comprar algunas referencias de calzado que ya se han ido agotando.

De esta manera podrá tener bien abastecido su negocio para la temporada y podrá ofrecer una buena variedad de productos a sus clientes, lo que le garantizará tener muy buenas ventas en su negocio y así ingresos para su hogar. Su mayor sueño es llegar a tener un gran negocio donde pueda generar empleo para las personas que han tenido que atravesar por sus mismas circunstancias y que también este negocio le permita vivir más tranquilamente, con mejores oportunidades económicas y una mejor calidad de vida en su hogar.
texts.en:
Efren was previously a farmworker in his town, where he organized his whole family life and had a good quality of life.  But because of violence in the area, he saw the need to leave all of this and so he arrived in the city to seek better economic and social opportunities for progress with his family.  He left that town 25 years ago, and when he arrived in the city he began selling fruit in an itinerant manner.  Later, he began to sell merchandise, and lately, for the past 12 years, he has had his own business selling shoes.  With this business, he has been able to generate income for his household and have a better quality of life with his family.  He has managed to make progress with his business, gradually increasing his sales.  Now the season is approaching when his sales tend to increase considerably.  He needs a loan to buy some models of footwear that he has been running out of.

In this way, he can have a well-stocked business for the upcoming season, and he will be able to offer a good variety of products to his customers.  This will guarantee him very good sales in his business, and a good income for his household.  His main dream is to develop his business into a big business where he could generate employment for the people who have had to go through similar circumstances.  He also dreams that this business
 will allow him to live more tranquilly, with better economic opportunities and a better quality of life in his home.

loans.use: to buy some models of shoes that he has been running out of

loans.name: Juan Alberto

texts.es: Juan Alberto vive con su esposa en una casa muy humilde propia, es una persona emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante, con su esposa poseen un negocio de venta de quesadillas y productos helados como, sorbete, choco bananos, paletas y charamuscas. Pero Juan se dedica a la sastrería confecciona pantalones, camisas para hombre en la zona donde reside es muy conocido por alegre, optimista y trabajador, El necesita complementar todos los insumos que se necesitan para la costura hacer cambios en su máquina de coser entre otros es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un prestamos en el cual lo invertirá en su negocio comprando telas al costo, agujas, algunos repuestos como carretes, cuchillas entre otros para perfeccionar las costuras y así ayudar a su esposa en el negocio y los dos salir adelante como personas emprendedoras.
texts.en:
Juan Alberto lives with his wife in a very humble abode of his own.  He is an enterprising person who very much wants to get ahead.  He and his wife have a business selling quesadillas and frozen treats like popsicles, chocolate-covered bananas, sorbets and ‘charamuscas’ [frozen fruit juice].  

However, Juan is also a tailor; he makes men’s pants and shirts.  He’s well-known in the area where he lives for being very cheerful, optimistic and hardworking.

He needs to stock up on the sewing supplies he needs and to make some changes on his sewing machine among other things which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to invest in his business buying such things as fabric at cost, needles and some spare parts like bobbins and blades among others to fine-tune his work thus helping his wife in the business and both of them in order to get ahead as entrepreneurs.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Adriano

texts.en:
With his determination to succeed and easily provide for his family needs, Adriano has engaged himself in the retailing business. He sells a variety of accessories like sunglasses, flashlights, hats and mirrors in the public market. 

Adriano is married and blessed with six children. His children are all in school. His wife is his partner in managing their business. Adriano dreams of maintaining and developing the business to gain a higher income. He plans to sell other products for an additional source of income.

Adriano decided to take out a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy school supplies, radio cassettes and "radio bass". He hopes to proceed with his plan and earn additional income.

loans.use: to buy school supplies, radio cassettes and "radio bass".

location.town: San Pedro San Pablo, Aurora, Isabela

loans.name: Nadiah Group

texts.en:
This group is called Nadiah and it is made up of four women: Saeedh, Afrah, Nadiah and Nour,  who are natives of Aden, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 180,000 YER.

One of the members of this group is Nadiah, who is 38 years old. She has had a business selling incense, perfumes and ladies' clothes. She is a married woman and has five children who live in Aden, Yemen.  She says that she started her business by making incense at home till she was able to sell it to her customers around her area. She realized that her business was profitable and she set out to invest more in it. Now she is applying for a loan of 30,000 YER from AMB to buy perfumes and incense for her business. She hopes to have a clothing shop to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy perfumes and incense for her business

loans.name: Noel Soka

texts.en:
Noel is a 35-year-old businessman who lives in Juba. He is married and has three children between the ages of 4 and 12. One of his children goes to school. 

Noel runs a dressing making supply business and has been in business for six years. He has no employees. He heard about Finance Sudan through other clients and he is taking a loan of 2,000 SDG to purchase more goods.   

In five years, he wants to open a manufacturing service. He hopes to employ more people.

His major challenges include inflation in the market.

loans.use: to buy more dressmaking materials

loans.name: Aryemo Otti

texts.en:
Aryemo Otti is a 35-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has four children between the ages of 4 and 12, two of whom go to school. 

Aryemo runs a general store and has been in business for three years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients  and she is taking a loan of 700 SDG to purchase more goods.  

In five years, she wants to send all her children to school.  She hopes to expand her business.

Her major challenges include inflation in the market. 

She is happy to have the Finance Sudan service.

loans.use: to buy soda, water, soap. etc

loans.name: Comelio Simon

texts.en:
Comelio Simon is a 38-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has two children between the ages of 9 and 12 years old, two of whom go to school. 

Comelio runs a general store and has been in business for two years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients and she is taking a loan of 700 SDG to purchase more goods. 

In five years, she wants to build a house. She hopes to expand her business.

Her major challenges include inflation in the market. 

She is happy for Finance Sudan's service.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts, soda, water, etc

loans.name: Blelin Otoo

texts.en:
Blelin Otoo is a 36-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has three children between the ages of 4 and 12 years old, two of whom go to school. 

Blelin runs a general store and has been in business for three years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients and she is taking a loan of 700 SDG to purchase more goods.

In five years, she wants to build a house.

Her major challenges include inflation in the market. 

She is happy for Finance Sudan's service.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts, water, soda, and bananas

loans.name: Anek Tom

texts.en:
AnekmTom is a 37-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has three children between the ages of 3 and 10, two of whom go to school. 

Anek runs a general store and has been in business for three years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients and she is taking a loan of 700 SDG to purchase more goods.  

In five years, she wants to build a house.

Her major challenges include high prices in the market.

loans.use: to buy soda, water, soap etc

loans.name: Afa Margret

texts.en:
Afa Margret is a 38-year-old businesswoman who lives in Juba. She is married and has three children between the ages of 4 and 11, two of whom go to school. 

Afa runs a general store and has been in business for three years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients and she is taking a loan of 700 SDG to purchase more goods. 

In five years, she wants to build a house and expand her business.

Her major challenges include high prices in the market.

loans.use: to buy soda, water, soap, etc

loans.name: Zamira

texts.ru: Замира женщина в возрасте 30 лет.Она мать 3 детей.Ее вид деятельности заключается в том что она продает национальные лепешки и хлебобулочные изделия на рынке.Этот бизнес дает хороший доход.Занимаясь этим она решила сама тоже печь лепешки.Рано утром сама печет лепешки  затем идет на хлебобулочный цех за свежими булочками.Свои лепешки она сдает в местные столовые а хлебобулочные изделия продает на рынке.Эти виды деятельности ей очень нравятся.На полученный кредит она хочет приобрести несколько мешков муки.
texts.en: Zamira is a 30 year-old woman.  She is a mother of three children.  Her type of business is selling national flatbread and baked goods at a market.  This business brings in a good income.  Being involved in this business for a while, Zamira decided to bake flatbread herself.  She bakes flatbread early in the mornings and then goes to a bakery for other fresh baked goods.  She sells her flatbread to the local cafes and sells other baked goods at a market.  She likes this type of business very much.  Zamira wants to use this loan to purchase several bags of flour.

loans.use: to buy several bags of flour

loans.name: Dite Dama Group

texts.fr: Agé de 43ans, Mr Ibrahim est  jardinier de profession. Il est marié à une revendeuse, ils sont bénis de Dieu et ont 08 enfants dont 04 scolarisés. Le premier a 19ans et le dernier 2ans 5mois. Depuis 2000, il exerce son activité de jardinier en REGION CENTRALE et s’approvisionne dans les villes environnantes. Il est à son troisième  crédit de WAGES et sollicite ce prêt pour acheter des outils de travail. Il a été nommé par les autres membres du groupe pour être responsable de leur association qui a pour nom « DITE-DAMA » c’est un groupement constitué que d’hommes qui ont consacré leur vie à la culture du sol et tous cultivent du piment et des tomates. Ils veulent épargner, construire un logement pour rendre leurs familles dans de bonnes conditions. Ils souhaitent augmenter leurs superficies afin d’avoir de bons rendements et dans l’avenir  exporter leurs produits à l’étranger.
texts.en: At 43 years old, Mr. Ibrahim is a professional gardener. He is married to a retailer. They are blessed by God and have 8 children, 4 of whom attend school. The oldest is 19 years old, and the youngest is 2 years and 5 months old. Since 2000, he has been in gardening in the central region and stocks up in neighboring cities. He is on his third loan from WAGES and is seeking a loan to buy tools. He was named by the other members of his group to be the leader of their association named DITE-DAMA, which is a group consisting of men who have devoted their lives to cultivating the soil, all of whom grow peppers and tomatoes. They would like to save up and build housing to put their families in better conditions. They hope to increase their acreage in order to have good yields, and in the future, they would like to export their products abroad.

loans.use: to buy tools

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer and herbicide.

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es: Juan José es apicultor y posee una venta de miel, tiene experiencia en el rubro  y siempre obtiene la mejor miel de gran calidad, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas a localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela pues todo lo que vende es a buenos precios y con un servicio inigualable; Juan José es un hombre emprendedor dispuestos a superarse y a buscar todas las oportunidades que le permitan llegar al éxito, su más grande secreto son la constancia y el amor a su labor;  quiere acrecentar el negocio pero necesita de apoyo de capital para invertir por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar materia prima: laminas, madera, rejilla para el mantenimiento del apiario. Juan José tiene muy buen record crediticio es muy responsable pero sobre todo honesto y confiable, asegura que podrá saldar el financiamiento en el periodo establecido y a la vez podrá ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Juan Jose is a beekeeper and he has a business selling honey.  He has experience in this line of work, and he always gets the best quality honey.  He sells in all of the areas surrounding his town, and he already has a lot of customers, because he sells everything at good prices with unparalleled service.  Juan Jose is an enterprising man who is ready to succeed, and who is on the lookout for all opportunities that will allow him to become successful.  His biggest secret is his perseverance and love of his work.  He wants to expand his business, but he needs support with capital to invest, and so he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow him to buy supplies and materials (sheets of corrugated metal, wood and racks) to maintain his apiary.  Juan Jose has a very good credit record; he is responsible, but above all, is honest and reliable.  He is certain that he will be able to pay off the loan over the established schedule, and at the same time offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy sheets of corrugated metal, wood and racks for his apiary

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en:
Merlita is a married mother of three children, two of whom are already married, while the third is working. Merlita, who has been growing and selling rice since 1986, is requesting a loan of PHP 27,000 to purchase sacks of fertilizers and insecticides to improve her rice crop production. She believes that she can keep producing good crops that will enable her to earn larger profits. In this way, she will improve their standard of living and save some money for emergency purposes.

Merlita hopes to have more farmland someday.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizers and insecticides to improve her rice crop production.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.en:
Dolores, age 46, runs a store selling a variety of merchandise. She and her husband Jaime have four children. She is a happy, enthusiastic and hard-working person who makes every effort to provide for the family's needs. Dolores did not finish her studies due to lack of financial resources.Her experiences push her to strive hard in order to secure the well-being and future of her four children.

Dolores has been running her store for 20 years. Aside from this business, she is also engaged in a livestock and farming business. According to her, the profit gained from her farming and livestock was used to secure the education of two of her children who have just finished their degree courses. She is really blessed and thankful to God because she has been given the knowledge, skills, and strength to face trials in life.

Dolores repaid her previous loan and is now asking for a new loan in the amount of PhP 30,000. She will use this loan to buy a variety of items to offer for sale in her store.She believes that she can continue to improve her business through continuous access to financial services from Kiva lenders through ASKI. She is hopeful that children will complete their education and strives to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her general store

loans.name: Lucena

texts.en:
Lucena, age 58 and widowed, raises hogs to earn a living. She lives in the village of Luzon. Being a single parent is very difficult, but Lucena brings her best efforts to lifting up her children from poor living conditions. This what what motivated Lucena to involve herself in managing a hog-raising business. 

As of now, Lucena is requesting a loan in the amount of PhP 15,000 in order to buy feed, vaccines, and vitamins to ensure the proper growth of her hogs. She is confident that through her loan, she will be able to sustain the needs of her hogs.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccine and vitamins for the proper growth of her hogs

loans.name: Khushvakht

texts.ru: Хушвахт трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет шестерых детей. Более 6 лет он занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. Он содержит скот дома и имеет все условия для откорма и выращивания скота. Его заботливая жена помогает ему в бизнесе, и они усердно работают ради светлого будущего своих детей. Хушвахт хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота с целью пополнения оборотного капитала с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу доброту и помощь.
texts.en: Khushvakht is a hardworking and kind person.  He is married and raising six children.  He has been involved in buying and selling cattle for over six years.  He keeps livestock at home and has all of the necessary conditions for feeding and raising livestock.  His caring wife helps him with the business, and they work hard to provide a bright future for their children.  Khushvakht wants to obtain this loan to buy livestock in order to refill his working capital and expand his business.  He relies on your kindness and help.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Suzan Steven

texts.en:
Suzan is a 28-year-old businesswoman who lives in Nimule. She is married and has two children between the ages of two and six, one of whom goes to school. 

Suzan runs a beauty salon and has been in business for two years. She has one employee. She heard about Finance Sudan through other clients and she is taking a loan of 1,600 SDG to purchase more goods.  

In five years, she wants to increase her stock.

Her major challenges include high prices in the market.

She is happy to take a loan from Finance Sudan.
The next person sitting down is her client in the salon.

loans.use: to buy weaves, hair oil, chemicals, etc

loans.name: Bovochon

texts.ru: Бовочон молодой энергичный человек, который занимается оптовой продажей арбузов и помидоров.Товар привозит из города Душанбе на грузовом автомобиле и продаёт оптом торговцам рынка.Он женат и имеет шестерых детей, жена конечно же домохозяйка и занимается воспитанием детей.Бовочон текущий кредит хочет использовать на увеличение завоза товара, в данный момент арбузов и дыни. А полученную прибыль хочет потратить на ремонт дома, установку пластиковых окон, перед наступлением холодной зимы. На снимке Бовочон в день выдачи, а т.к. он оптовик , то около товара его запечатлеть не возможно из-за быстрого отъезда в Душанбе за товаром.
texts.en: Bovochon is a young and energetic person, who is involved in a wholesale sale of watermelons and tomatoes.  He brings the products from the city of Dushanbe on a truck and sells them wholesale to sellers at a market.  Bovochon is married and has six children, and his wife is obviously a homemaker, who takes care of the children.  He wants to use this loan to increase the volume of products that he brings in, which at this time would be watermelons and cantaloupes.  And he wants to use the resulting profit to repair his home by installing plastic windows prior to the onset of a cold winter.  The photograph shows Bovochon on the day of loan disbursement, but because he is a wholesaler, he could not be captured in front of his products due to his necessity to quickly depart to Dushanbe for products.

loans.use: to purchase more products

loans.name: Djiguène Bakhna 13 Group

texts.fr:
Djiguène  Bakhna 13 est une association de développement regroupant 5 membres s’activant dans la vente de fruits et de produits halieutiques.Elle est située à environ 22 km de la ville principale et est dirigée par Mme Djieynaba maiée et mère de famille.
Mme Djieynaba achète et revende des fruits selon les périodes depuis plus de 10 ans, elle demande ce crédit pour acheter et revendre ces fruits (mangue, clémentine, orange).Ce crédit lui permettra aussi de diversifier les produits en faisant l’achat et la revente de l’huile de palme.
Les bénéfices qu’elle aura  lui permettront d’aider son mari aux besoins de la maison.Ell a l’ambition d’avoir as propre boutique pour élargir son activité.
texts.en: Djiguène  Bakhna 13 is a development group with five members who sell fruits and fishing products. It is about 22 km from the main city and is led by Mrs. Djieynaba, who is a married mother. Mrs. Djieynaba has been buying and reselling seasonal fruits for more than 10 years. She is seeking this loan to buy and resell these fruits (mangoes, tangerines, oranges). This loan will also allow her to diversify her products by buying and reselling palm oil. The profits that she will gain will allow her to help her husband with household expenses. She hopes to one day have her own shop to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruit (mangoes, watermelon, tangerines) and fishing products

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es: Nelson de treinta y ocho años de edad  vive  junto a su compañera de vida, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo y tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura tiene mucha experiencia y eso le ha permitido obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas a la localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela fiel que la prefiere porque siempre tiene lo que necesitan con producto de calidad y a precio accesible además el servicio es excelente; Nelson es un hombre dedicado a su labor siempre dispuesto a buscar oportunidades para alcanzar el éxito, quiere aumentar la producción e invertir en insumos pero necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, insecticida, herramienta, etc. Nelson tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar el financiamiento y a la vez darle una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nelson, 38, lives with his life companion.  He grows corn and sorghum.  He’s been working in agriculture for several years and has much experience which has allowed him to obtain better harvests.  His parcel of land is located in a zone with intense agricultural activity.  He sells in adjoining areas and has a regular clientele that prefers him because he always has what they need: quality products at affordable prices and service is excellent besides.

Nelson is a person who is committed to his work; he’s always ready to seek opportunities to attain success.  He wants to increase production and invest in supplies but needs capital which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, etc.  Nelson has good payment references and is very responsible.  He’s sure he will be able to repay the loan at the same time as giving his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, farm supplies and tools.

loans.name: Nojod

texts.en: Nojod is a 38-year-old woman who is married and a mother to two sons and two daughters. Her husband is a blacksmith, but the income he earns isn't enough to cover the family's needs. For the past six years, Nojod has been raising and selling poultry, which has been a profitable project, but she also needs more support to cover the costs. Nojod wants to purchase new pan feeding and nipple drinking systems, but the amount of money she has isn't enough to pay, so she is requesting a 3,000 USD loan from FATEN. When Nojod gets the loan, she will be able to pay for purchasing new pan feeding and nipple drinking systems for the poultry she is raising. In this way she will improve her project and increase her income to provide better living conditions for the family. Nojod is photographed in the place where she is raising poultry.

loans.use: To purchase new pan feeding and nipple drinking systems for poultry

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine, age 48, raises hogs to be fattened and eventually offered for sale. She manages her business while her husband is busy in their rice field. Between the two of them, they are able to support her two children in their studies. With the help and support of her husband, Josephine has become confident in running her business successfully. From the profits she earns from her business, Josephine is able to help provide for the family's daily necessities and strives to improve their standard of living. 

Josephine has paid back her previous loan and is now requesting another loan in the amount of PhP 20,000, which she will use to buy hog feed and vitamins for her three hogs. She is hopeful that her requested loan funds will help her meet her life goals. In addition, she is grateful for the continuous access of financial services available to her from Kiva lenders through ASKI so that she can continue to ensure the proper growth of her hogs. As a result, she is able to offer her hogs to buyers at higher prices.

Through the generated income from her business, she intends to build savings toward ensuring a bright future of her children.

loans.use: to buy hog feed and vitamins for her three hogs

loans.name: Margret

texts.en:
Margret is a 41-year-old married woman with three children living in Kasese, Uganda. For the past seven years she has sold poultry; she also sells clothes on the side. With her profits she has been able to pay school fees for her children. A shortage of money for chicken feed, price fluctuations and inflation challenge her.

Margret is requesting a 1,200,000 UGX loan from HOFOKAM to buy feed for her poultry. Her goals include educating her children and building a permanent home while expanding her poultry business into new markets.

loans.use: to buy feed for her poultry.

loans.name: Kision

texts.en: Kision is a 32-year-old married man with four children living in Kasese, Uganda. He has been running a retail shop for four years. His hardships are not having enough money to purchase inventory and encountering price fluctuations and inflation. His personal goal is educating his children, and his business goal is expanding his business into new markets. Kision wants money to buy sugar and salt to sell.

loans.use: To buy sugar and salt to sell

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Anna, age 23, is a beekeeper. She has been involved in this business for four years and now keeps 15 bee colonies. She sells the honey in Kapan city, where this product is in big demand.
 
Anna would like to purchase more bee colonies and expand her farm. She also wants to purchase hives in which to keep the bees, but currently does not have enough funds. This loan will help Anna to purchase more bee colonies and hives, which will mean more gathered honey and additional income from its sale.

Anna lives in Kapan city with her uncle. The house where they live needs to be renovated. Developing her beekeeping business is important for Anna, allowing her to earn more income, complete the house renovation, and foster better living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for 10 bee colonies and 11 hives

loans.name: Martin Lokube

texts.en:
Martin Lokube is a 30-year-old businessman who lives in Juba. He is married and has two children between the ages of 2 and 5. One of the children goes to school. 

Martin runs general stores  and has been in business for three years. He has one employee. He heard about Finance Sudan through promotions by the loan officers. He is taking a loan of 1400 SDG to purchase more goods. 

In five years, he wants to build a permanent house and send his children to school. 

His major challenges include transportation of goods.

loans.use: to buy iron sheets, timbers, nails, etc

loans.name: Yusuf J

texts.en:
yusuf is a 30-year-old businesswoman who lives in Nimule. She is married and has two children between the ages of four and seven, one of whom goes to school. 

yusuf runs a general store and has been in business for two years. She has no employees. She heard about Finance Sudan through promotions and she is taking a loan of 1,500 SDG to purchase more goods.  

In five years, she wants to open a big shop.

Her major challenges include the high cost of transporting her goods. 

She is happy to take a loan from Finance Sudan.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, onions, green peppers, sugar etc

loans.name: Gulsara

texts.ru: Гулсара – 37 лет, вдова, имеет 3 детей. Занимается торговлей детской одежды в центральном рынке. Опыт в этой деятельности более 4 лет. Её занятие является основным доходом для семьи. Она хочет накопить денег, чтобы дети ни в чем не нуждались и дать им хорошее образование. С каждого дохода она откладывает необходимую сумму. Этот кредит Гулсары второй по счету. Она не нарушала условия кредитования, а также доказала свою пунктуальность. На полученный кредит планирует увеличить свой товарооборот, закупить сезонную детскую одежду. Гулсара выражает свою благодарность нашей организации за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Gulsara is 37 years old, a widow and has three children.  She is involved in selling children's clothing at the central market.  She has over four years of experience in this business.  This business is the primary source of income for her family.  Gulsara wants to save money to make sure that her children are not in need for anything and to provide them with a good education.  She sets aside a necessary amount from each of her income earnings.  This is Gulsara's second loan.  She did not violate the financing terms and also proved her punctuality.  She plans to increase her goods turnover with this loan by buying seasonal children's clothing.  Gulsara expresses her gratitude to our organization for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy seasonal children's clothing

loans.name: Djiguéne Bakhna 34 Group

texts.fr:
Djiguène bakhna 34 est un groupement mixte composé de 5 membres et est situé à environ 22 km de la ville principale.Ce groupement s’active sur la vente de fruits, il est dirigé par Mme Fatou marié et mère de famille.
Mme Fatou achète et revend des fruits et légumes depuis plus de 10 ans. Elle demande ce crédit pour acheter et revendre ces mêmes produits. 
Les bénéfices qu’elle aura lui permettront d’aider son mari à la scolarisation de leurs enfants et à la dépense quotidienne.
Mme Fatou veut un jour avoir son propre magasin de vente.
texts.en: Djiguène Bakhna 34 is a mixed group with 5 members located about 22 km from the main city. This group sells fruits and is led by Mrs. Fatou, a married mother. Mrs. Fatou has been buying and reselling fruit and vegetables for more than 10 years. She is seeking a loan to buy and resell more of these products. The profits that she will have will allow her to help her husband to send their children to school and with daily expenses. Mrs. Fatou would one day like to have her own store.

loans.use: to buy various food products (palm oil, dried fish) and fruit to resell

loans.name: Genaro

texts.es: Genaro de cuarenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz tiene varios años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, para cada cosecha mejora la calidad de su trabajo, el terreno de cultivo está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola, comercia en todos los alrededores del lugar y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Genaro es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, siempre buscando las mejores oportunidades para superarse y alcanzar el éxito, en esta temporada de siembra desea aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital para invertir en los insumos por eso le solicita  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, insecticida, herramientas, etc. Genaro tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Genaro, 45, lives in his own home with his common-law wife and his children. He makes his living through farming; specifically he grows corn. He has been working in agriculture for many years and has gained valuable experience which has allowed him to increase his income.  He works to make every harvest better than the last. 

His land is located in an area with a great deal of commerce and agricultural activity.  He has many customers, since it is well-known that his crops are of high quality, and his prices are affordable.  Further, his service is impeccable.

Genaro his an enterprising and hardworking man.   He is always looking for opportunities to better himself and be successful.  In this planting season he wishes to increase his production, but he needs working capital to invest in the supplies he needs.  Thus he is seeking this loan in order to buy corn, fertilizer, insecticide, tools and other items. He has good credit references and is very responsible.  He promises to repay this loan while at the same time providing his family with a better life.

loans.use: to buy corn, fertilizer, insecticide and tools.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es: Salvador de 62 años de edad, es un hombre muy emprendedor, el cual posee 25 años de experiencia en trabajar como agricultor. Él vive junto a su esposa la cual se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y tres hijos, los cuales le ayudan a su padre a sembrar la semilla, y así mismo a darle todos los cuidados necesarios para una excelente cosecha. Salvador posee una parcela en la cual cultiva diferentes tipos de granos básicos, los cuales coloca en unos graneros de forma cilíndricas hechos de acero inoxidable, estos granos son los que luego comercializa  con sus diferentes clientes los cuales le compran por mayor, este es un negocio el cual le ha permitido contar con todo lo necesario durante 25 años. Él solicita  un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para comprar mayor cantidad de abono, maíz, pesticidas, y así mismo pagar la mano de obra para desgranas el elote, esto le permite elaborar un mejor trabajo y obtener mayores ganancias, así mismo le permite brindarle fuentes de trabajo a otras personas lo cual es muy importante para Salvador.
texts.en:
Salvador, 62, is a very enterprising man.  He has 25 years’ experience working in agriculture.  He lives with his wife who does household chores and their three children who help their father plant the seeds and to provide all necessary care to produce an excellent harvest.

Salvador has a parcel of land where he grows various basic grains that he stores in cylindrical stainless steel silos.  He subsequently sells the grain to various customers who buy at wholesale.  This is a business that has allowed him to have everything necessary for 25 years.

He’s asking for a loan to have the money needed to buy larger amounts of manure, corn and pesticides as well as to pay labor costs to hull the corn.  
This will allow him to do better work and obtain higher profits while providing a source of employment for others which is very important to Salvador.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Jaime Oliverio

texts.es: Jaime Oliverio de 23 años de edad, es un joven lleno de muchos sueños todos con vista al bienestar de su amada familia la cual está conformada por su esposa y un pequeño hijo. Jaime trabaja sembrando granos básicos, a los cuales también les da todo los cuidados necesarios para realizar un excelente trabajo. Este oficio lo aprendió de su familia por lo que está muy agradecido ya que es el que hasta ahora le permite sostener a su hogar. Jaime solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para la compra de graneros para depositar el maíz y los frijoles que posteriormente comercializara. Así mismo comprará abono, palas, más arados y pesticidas para controlar cualquier tipo de plaga que quiera dañar su cultivo. Jaime se destaca por ser muy trabajador y responsable, características muy positiva.
texts.en:
At the age of 23, Jaime Oliverio is a young man who is full of dreams aimed at his beloved family’s wellbeing.   His family consists of his wife and a little son.  Jaime works planting basic grains and giving them all the care they need in order to do an excellent job.  He learned this occupation from his family which he’s very grateful for because to date it allows him to support his home.

Jaime is asking for a loan to have the money needed to buy silos to store the corn and beans that he’ll subsequently sell.  He’ll also buy manure, shovels, more plows and pesticide to control any type of infestation that might damage his crops.  Jaime stands out for being very hardworking and responsible-very positive characteristics.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and tools.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 45 years old and has three school-aged children. He is a hardworking father who owns and manages a rice farm in his community. His aim is to increase his yields and income so as to enable him to finance the education of his children and satisfy their daily basic needs. Despite problems and difficulties in life, he is determined to uplift his family’s standard of living and give them a better life.

To improve his farm, Samuel is asking for a 20,000 PHP loan from ASKI to buy fertilizer and pesticides and pay for the expenses incurred in transplanting rice. He believes that this loan will enable him to improve his farm and lead to a large harvest this coming season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides and pay for the expenses incurred in transplanting rice.

location.town: Brgy. Mangayang, Dupax del Sur, Nueva Vizcaya

loans.name: Bart

texts.en:
Bart, a 38-year-old divorced man and sole caregiver of his four children living in Kasese, Uganda, has been operating a retail shop for the past year. It was purchased with capital saved from his previous work which involved carpentry.

Bart's business hardship is inadequate capital to purchase enough store stock, and so he is requesting this loan to buy sugar, flour and cooking oil for his store. His business goal is to expand into new markets, and his personal goals are educating his children and building a permanent house.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour and cooking oil to sell.

loans.name: Geoffrey

texts.en:
Geoffrey, age 35, is a farmer in the Litein area of South Rift Kenya. He has been engaged in farming for 12 years, producing mainly milk and tea for the local market. He and his wife have four children. The youngest is a one-year-old baby and the eldest is 10 years old. 

Geoffrey has requested a loan of 30,000 KES from Kiva partner Juhudi Kilimo to help him venture into poultry farming. He will use the loan funds to buy poultry birds. He believes this endeavor will help to uplift his family's living standards through the generation of more income. He adds that the loan will also help him improve the family dairy business. His future plan is to venture into transport business, since he says transport remains the major challenge for farmers in the area.

loans.use: to buy poultry birds

loans.name: Musyenene Women Group

texts.en:
Selestine is a 50-year-old married man with three children living who lives in Kasese, Uganda. For the past four years, he has been operating a pharmacy. Selestine's major business hardships are customers not paying on time and inadequate capital to purchase stock. 

Selestine is requesting a loan to buy drugs and medicines to sell. In the future, his personal goal is to educate his children and his business goal is to buy land to grow crops.

loans.use: to buy drugs and medicine

loans.name: Naji

texts.en:
Naji, age 31, supports a family of five in Al Zarqa, Amman, Jordan. He is requesting a loan in the amount of 500 JD in order to improve and expand his home. 

His future dream is to purchase and own a house that his family can live in.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Miriam Estela

texts.es: Miriam Estela de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo mayor en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio en un lugar estratégico porque por ahí circulan muchas personas, es muy conocida en la zona pues sus tortillas son las más ricas y calientitas y tiene mucha clientela pues saben que son elaboradas con material de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es el más rápido; Miriam es una mujer emprendedora, con muchas metas por alcanzar, trabaja a diario para ganarse el pan de cada día y sabe que con esfuerzo y dedicación logrará el éxito, en los últimos meses aumento la demanda el doble y eso la impulso para hacer crecer el negocio;  necesita invertir en insumos pero no posee de capital suficiente por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, leña etc. Miriam Estela tiene capacidad crediticia y una moral impecable asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Miriam Estela, 52, lives with her long term partner and their son in their own home, from where she runs her business selling tortillas. Her home is strategically located as many people pass by, and she is well known in the area for her freshly-made, tasty tortillas. She has won over many customers who know that she uses the finest ingredients in her tortillas and sells them at an affordable price, as well as offering the fastest service. Miriam is a hard-working lady and has many dreams that she wishes to achieve. She works every day in order to earn her living and she knows that her hard work and dedication will bring her success. In recent months her orders have doubled and, consequently, she decided to grow her business. She needs to invest money in her supplies but she does not have sufficient capital, so she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan which will allow her to buy more wholesale corn and firewood etc. Miriam Estela has a good credit history and impeccable principles; she is certain that she will be able to settle her debt and offer her family a better standard of living at the same time.

loans.use: to buy wholesale corn and firewood

loans.name: Mario Joel

texts.es: Mario Joel de 29 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos, él se destaca por ser muy trabajador, y se esfuerza día con día para salir adelante y dar lo mejor de sí.  Mario se dedica a sembrar frijoles, maíz y maicillo, los cuales comercializa en diferentes agencias distribuidoras de granos básicos de su pueblo. Él solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de semilla de maíz, frijoles y maicillo para sembrar, de esta forma él espera incrementar su cosecha y así incrementar al máximo sus ventas, de este mismo modo desea comercializar en su casa, por lo que necesita invertir en más siembra, lo que podrá alcanzar gracias a dicho préstamo.
texts.en:
Mario Joel, 29, lives with his wife and children.  He stands out for being very hardworking.  He strives daily to get ahead and give his best.

Mario works planting corn, beans and sorghum that he sells to various basic grain distributing agencies in his town.  He’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to have the money needed to buy corn and bean seeds and sorghum to plant.  

He expects this way to increase his harvest thus increasing his sales to the maximum.  In this way he also wants to sell from home so he needs to invest more in the crops which he’ll be able to do thanks to said loan.

loans.use: to buy sorghum.

loans.name: Sandra Estela

texts.es: Sandra Estela de 22 años de edad, es una joven muy trabajadora la cual se dedica a la agricultura, a pesar de su corta edad, ella ya posee varios años de experiencia en este trabajo. Ella vive junto a sus padres y hermanos quienes también trabajan como agricultores. Sandra junto a su familia siembran maíz y frijoles, los cuales posteriormente comercializan por mayor a diferentes en tiendas y mercados. Sandra solicita un préstamo con el deseo de comprar todos los productos necesarios para el cuidado de sus semillas, tales como abono, pesticidas y otros instrumentos muy necesarios para realizar este trabajo.  Ella es una persona muy alegre y amable que se dedica de lleno al bienestar de su hogar y su familia, por lo que espera obtener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Sandra Estela, 22, is a very hardworking young woman who works in agriculture.  Despite her young age she already has several years’ experience in this work.

She lives with her parents and siblings who also work as farmers.  Sandra and her family grow corn and beans which they subsequently sell at wholesale to various stores and markets.

Sandra is asking for a loan wanting to buy all the products needed for the care of her seeds like manure, pesticide and other tools that are very necessary to do this work.

She’s a very cheerful, kind person who is totally committed to her home’s and her family’s wellbeing which is why she’s hoping to obtain higher profits.

loans.use: to buy manure.

loans.name: Om Nassim Group

texts.en:
This group is called Om Nassim and it is made up of four members Thakra, Monirh, Najibh, and Nahla  who joined together because they are friends. They live in Aden, Yemen. They took out a loan of 180,000 YER.

Monirh is the president of this group. She is 39 years old, a married woman, and has five children who live together in Aden, Yemen. (She is the second woman from the right.)   She has been selling incense and ladies' fabrics for three years. She works hard to provide for her family. Because of  her desire to work  she has obtained  the satisfaction of her clients. 

Currently, she has applied for a loan of  60,000 YER from AMB to buy incense, fabrics and perfumes for her business. She hopes to expand her business to sell all types of clothes in order to offer a good life to her family. She would like to enroll her children in the best private schools.

loans.use: to buy incense, fabrics and perfumes for her business

loans.name: Al-Asala Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Asala and consists of Habibh, Azizh, Wardh and Aziza. They took out a loan of 250,000 YER.

Azizh is the president of her group. She is 42 years old, a married woman, and has three children. (She is the woman wearing a green and brown scarf.) She lives in Sana`a, Yemen. She has been selling all kinds of spices. She started her business several years ago with a small amount of capital. She did this because she needed a way to support her family. She says she offers her clients good service. This has earned her a very good reputation, as well as allowing her to increase her sales. 

Azizh is requesting this loan of 60,000 YER to buy products such as chili peppers, etc. for her business. She hopes to have many stores in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy products such as chili peppers, etc. for her business

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine has a dairy farm. She has successfully been managing her dairy farm with her one cow in Kitale, Western Kenya, and has also been actively engaged in farming for 10 successive years. Her farm produces milk and maize, which she sells to the local market. She runs her farm with the help of one farmhand. She supplements her farming income by running a tailoring business in the local market. She and her husband have two grown children, aged 23 and 26.

Josephine has requested a loan in the amount of 50,000 KES from Juhudi Kilimo to help her buy poultry birds for a new venture into poultry farming. She is confident that expanding into this endeavor will help her build a good capital base for her family business. She hopes to expand her dairy farming as well.

Josephine points out that animal diseases, high cost of feed, and lack of capital are the major challenges for local farming businesses.

loans.use: to buy poultry birds

loans.name: Ireneo

texts.en:
Ireneo, age 59, manages a farming business. He lives in Gonzaga, and he and his wife have three children. He has been working in his field for 18 years and he knows from experience that it is not easy. He pursues his work for sake of improving his family's standard of living. 

He is requesting a loan in the amount of PhP 15,000 in order to buy the seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides required for executing a successful farming venture. He hopes to increase his income through his loan, allowing him to provide a better life for his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides for his farm

loans.name: Manal

texts.en:
Manal, age 43, is a conservative woman who prefers not to display her photo on the Internet, so her husband is pictured here. She lives with her family of four in Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan. 

She is requesting a loan in the amount of 600 JD so that she can pay for home improvements and make her house into a better living environment for her family.

loans.use: to pay for house improvements

loans.name: José Santana

texts.es: José Santana de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su hija en casa propia; Él se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras tiene en variedad plátanos, cebollas, papa, tomate, chile, entre otros el negocio está ubicado en su vivienda además manda en su vehículo otra parte de la venta para que comercie ambulante, su negocio es el más surtido del lugar y el más conocido ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo el producto de excelente calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; José es un hombre emprendedor con muchas ganas de salir adelante siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan alcanzar el éxito, quiere acrecentar el negocio pero necesita de capital para poder invertir por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito y comprar verdura y fruta por mayor; José Santana es muy responsable y tiene excelentes referencias de pago asegura que podrá pagar el financiamiento y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: José Santana, 43 years old, lives with his daughter in their own home. He runs his business selling fruit and vegetables from his home, offering a range of bananas, onions, potatoes, tomatoes and chilies among other items.He also uses his vehicle to deliver goods as part of a mobile service. His business is the best stocked in the area and the best known as he now has many clients who know that all his produce is of excellent quality and at affordable prices, as well as which his business is unrivalled. Jose is a hard-working man with a great desire to progress; he is always on the look out for new opportunities which will offer him the chance of success. He wants to grow his business but he needs capital in order to invest, so he is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan to buy wholesale fruit and vegetables. Jose Santana is a responsible person with excellent credit references, and he is certain that he will be able to repay his loan and offer his family a better standard of living at the same time.

loans.use: wholesale fruit and vegetables

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es: Jorge, es una persona muy conocida en su lugar de vivienda por ser responsable, amable y trabajador, vive junto a su esposa y dos hijos quienes le ayudan en el negocio. Jorge se dedica a la agricultura sembrando maíz y frijoles, debido a su amplia experiencia y a la excelente tierra de su parcela obtiene muy buenas cosechas. Para poder obtener ganancias extras Jorge también trabaja como albañil, realizando diferentes trabajos como construcción de muros, baños sanitarios y otros más, los cuales son temporales pero son de mucho beneficio para su economía. Jorge solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de maíz y frijoles para sembrar, de modo que pueda duplicar la cantidad de granos básicos y así venderlos con más clientes.
texts.en:
Jorge is a very well-known person where he lives for being very responsible, kind and hardworking.  He lives with his wife and two children who help him with his business.

Jorge works in agriculture planting corn and beans.  Thanks to his vast experience and the excellent soil in his parcel he gets good harvests.
In order to earn extra profits, Jorge also works in construction doing various construction jobs like erecting walls, building bathrooms and others, which are seasonal but of great benefit for his economy.

Jorge is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy larger amounts of corn and seed to plant so that he can double the amount of basic grains to sell to more customers.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds.

loans.name: Fatu

texts.en: Fatu lives in Buchanan with her husband and five children. Her children are between the ages of 14 and 27.  Fatu's husband is a contractor.
