As demand has increased, she wants to take advantage of the opportunity to invest in supplies. As such, she is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that allows her to purchase wholesale chickens and chicken feed, etc. Zonia has very good payment references and is very responsible. She is certain that she will be able to pay her debt and at the same time offer her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale chickens and feed.

loans.name: Patricia Del Carmen

texts.es: Patricia del Carmen de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hija, ella posee una librería, donde comercia todo tipo de artículos cuadernos, lapiceros, papel, calcomanías entre otros, el negocio está  ubicado en su residencia y tiene varios años de poseerlo, se siente feliz y orgullosa que pudo lograr que le diera los resultados esperados, tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles y con un servicio inigualable; Patricia es una mujer dedicada a su labor, siempre está buscando cumplir sus sueños, para ella la vida es cuesta arriba, pero cuando se llega a la cima todo es felicidad, quiere invertir en su negocio porque aumento la demanda y no quiere decepcionar  a sus clientes necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cuadernos, papel, lapicero, etc. Patricia del Carmen es muy responsable y tiene buenas referencias de pago, tiene la certeza que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Patricia del Carmen, 29, lives with her life companion and their daughter.  She has a stationery shop where she sells all sorts of articles like notebooks, mechanical pencils, paper and decals, among others.  The business is located at home and she’s had it for several years.  She feels happy and proud that it’s had the desired results.  She has a large clientele because people know that what she sells is top quality, her prices are affordable and her service is second to none.

Patricia is a woman who is very committed to her work; she’s always looking for ways to make her dreams a reality.  For her, life is an uphill climb but when one reaches the top everything is happiness.  

She wants to invest in her business because demand has increased and she does not want to disappoint her customers.  She needs capital so has asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy notebooks, paper, mechanical pencils, etc.  

Patricia del Carmen is very responsible and has good payment references.  She is sure that she’ll be able to repay the loan and at the same time give her family a fulfilled life.

loans.use: to buy notebooks, paper and pencils.

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es: Marcos de veintinueve años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo; ella se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener siempre las mejores cosechas, está feliz porque ama su trabajo y le deja buenas ganancias, el terreno está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a su residencia, comercia  en todos los alrededores y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de calidad, a buen precio pero sobre todo con un servicio excelente; Marcos es una mujer emprendedora dispuesta a trabajar duro para alcanzar su sueños, aprovecha cada oportunidad que se le presenta porque sabe que así alcanzara el éxito, en la última cosecha tuvo pérdidas debido al clima de lluvia por eso en este periodo de siembra quiere recuperarse y necesita de capital para invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, abono, insecticida, herramienta; Marcos es responsable y tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que saldara la de deuda y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Marcos, 29, lives with her life companion and their son.  She works in agriculture, specifically growing corn and beans.  She’s been in this line of work for several years and has acquired valuable experience that allows her to obtain good harvests.  She’s happy because she loves her work and it produces good profits.  Her field is located in a zone of intense agricultural activity very near her house.  She sells in her surrounding areas and has many customers because they know that everything she sells is top quality at a good price and above all service is excellent.

Marcos is an enterprising woman who’s willing to work hard to reach her dreams.  She takes advantage of every opportunity that presents itself because she knows that that’s the way to be successful.  She had losses due to weather the previous season and she needs to recuperate and needs capital to invest in supplies which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, manure, insecticide and tools.  Marcos is responsible and has good payment references; she’s sure that she’ll repay the loan and trusts that she’ll bring economic security to her home.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, manure, insecticide and tools.

loans.name: María De La Cruz

texts.es: María de la Cruz de 46 años de edad vive junto a su esposo y cinco hijos, los cuales le ayudan en el negocio. María se dedica a la agricultura de maíz y frijoles, a la crianza de ganado y cerdos. Con todo esto María y su esposo logran darles todo lo necesario a sus hijos, quienes son muy responsables y colaboradores en el hogar. Como toda madre María vela por el bienestar de su hogar, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para la compra de pesticidas, abono, semillas de maíz y frijoles, así mismo de cerdos para críar y posteriormente comercializar. Tanto María como su esposo son muy conocidos en la zona ya que realizan un excelente trabajo y venden productos de primera calidad.
texts.en:
María de la Cruz, 46, lives with her husband and five children, who help her in her business activities.  She grows corn and beans, and also raises cattle and pigs.  Through all of this work, she and her husband manage to give their children everything that they need.  The children are very responsible and help in the household chores.  Like every mother, María looks after the well-being of their household.  

She is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL so that she can buy pesticide, fertilizer, seed corn and beans.  She will also buy pigs to raise and later sell. Both María and her husband are very well-known in the area, since they do excellent work and sell top-quality products.

loans.use: to buy pesticides for her crops.

loans.name: Ana Dilia

texts.es: Ana Dilia vive junto a su familia la cual está conformada por su esposo quien trabaja como motorista y junto a dos pequeños hijos. Ana se dedica a la venta de frutas, y su puesto está ubicado a las afueras del mercado del  municipio en el que vive, un lugar en el cual existe gran afluencia de personas ya que es un muy céntrico en el cual existen diferentes paradas de buses y diferentes tipos de ventas. Ella es una persona muy inteligente, que desea introducir otros tipos de frutas como: mango, zapote, fresas y manzanas. Ana solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de frutas para invertir en su negocio y de esta manera poder ofrecer mayor variedad de productos, ella cuenta con la gran ventaja de estar ubicada sobre calle principal, por lo que cuenta con muy buenas ganancias, y es por esto que ella espera poder contar con más frutas y así aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Ana Dilia lives with her family which is composed of her husband who works as a driver and their two small children.  Ana sells fruit.  Her stand is located outside the market in the town she lives in, a place with lots of traffic since it’s a very centrally-located site where several bus lines converge and where many types of sales take place.

She’s a very intelligent person who wants to introduce other types of fruit like mangoes, sapodilla plums, strawberries and apples.  Ana is asking for a loan to be able to buy larger amounts of fruit to invest in her business thus having a wider variety of products on hand to offer.  She has a big advantage in that she’s located on the main street so she earns good profits and this is why she wants to have more fruit available to increase sales.

loans.use: to buy seasonal fruit to sell.

loans.name: Dolores

texts.es: Dolores de 36 años de edad, posee un pequeño negocio en su hogar, en el cual comercializa productos de primera necesidad como: pasta dental, pan, pegamentos, bolsas para basura y mucho más, su negocio es el único ubicado alrededor de su colonia, y sus dos hijos de 11 y 12 años de edad le ayudan a Dolores atendiendo la tienda. Gracias a las ganancias generadas en su negocio Dolores le brinda una ayuda económica a su esposo, quien se dedica a trabajar fuera del hogar. Dolores solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para que de este modo pueda  hacer crecer su tienda y surtirla con todo los productos necesarios para aumentar sus ingresos con: Jugos, sodas y pan dulce, es en lo que ella desea invertir, pues es lo que posee más demanda en el lugar.
texts.en: Dolores is 36 years old and she has a small business in her home where she sells essential goods, such as toothpaste, bread, glue, trash bags, and much more.  Her business is the only one around her neighborhood and her two children, who are 11 and 12 years old, help her tend to the store.  Thanks to the earnings she has generated from her business, Dolores can offer financial support to her husband, who works outside their home.  Dolores is asking INTEGRAL for this loan so that she can make her store grow and so she can stock it with the products she needs to increase her earnings, such as juices, sodas, and sweet bread.  She wants to invest in these things because they are what is most in demand in the area.

loans.use: to buy essential goods, such as juices, sodas, and sweet bread

loans.name: Juan Antonio

texts.es: Juan Antonio de 47 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa quien se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y junto a dos hijos menores de edad. Juan Antonio se destaca por ser  una persona muy laboriosa quien realiza diferentes actividades todo con el fin de dar lo mejor para su familia. El posee una pequeña tienda de productos de primera necesidad, la cual junto a su esposa e hijos la atienden, así mismo posee un pick up en el cual transporta personas día con día a diferentes destino, y  también se dedica a la siembra de maicillo, frijoles y maíz lo cual no solo destina para el consumo de él y su familia, sino también para comercializarlo en su tienda. Juan Antonio solicita un préstamo para poder contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de más semillas para sembrar y hacer crecer la cantidad de sus cultivos, también comprar pesticidas para el cuidado de las semillas y de esta forma garantizar un buen producto de consumo. Con lo anterior Juan Antonio desea aumentar en gran manera sus ingresos lo cual sería de mucho beneficio para él y su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Antonio is 47 years old and lives together with his wife, who takes care of the household chores, and their two dependent children.  Juan Antonio is a very hard-working person who carries out a number of different business activities in order to provide his family with the best in life.  He owns a small grocery store in which he serves together with his wife and children.  He also owns a pick-up truck which he uses every day to transport people to different destinations.  In addition, he grows sorghum, beans and corn, some of which his family consumes and some of which he sells in his store.  

Juan Antonio is requesting a loan so that he has the money he needs to invest in buying more seeds to sow.  This will enable him to increase the quantity of crops he grows.  He will also buy pesticides so that he can care for his seeds and thereby guarantee a good harvest.  Juan Antonio hopes that this will enable him to greatly increase his income, which will be of great benefit to him and his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and pesticides

loans.name: Sergio

texts.es: Sergio de 61 años,  vive muy feliz con su familia, su esposa es ama de casa y sus hijos son muy colaboradores con él. Cada mañana Sergio se levanta con los ánimos y las ganas de salir adelante. Actualmente es agricultor cultiva granos básicos como frijol, maíz, maicillo, arroz entre otros. En los tiempos donde no hay mucha cosecha o ya término con éxito su trabajo también se dedica a la construcción y trata la manera de  siempre trabajar duro para darle lo mejor  a su familia. Sergio ha visto la necesidad de solicitar la ayuda a INTEGRAL para comprar insumos agrícolas  como semillas, abonos, insecticidas, para mejorar la cosecha y así obtener mayores beneficios y darles un mejor futuro a su familia.
texts.en:
Sergio is 61, and lives very happily with his family. His spouse is a a housewife, and his children work alongside him.

Each morning, Sergio gets up with the spirit and desire to succeed. Currently he is a farmer and grows staple grains such as beans, corn, sorghum, rice and other crops. At the times when there is not a lot of harvesting, and he has successfully completed his work, he also works in construction, and tries to always work hard to provide the best for his family. 

But Sergio has found it necessary to request help from Integral in order to buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilizers and insecticides. This is so that he can improve the harvest, obtain better profits and give his family a better future.

loans.use: To buy agricultural supplies such as seeds, fertilizers and insecticides.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es: María del Carmen, es una madre de familia muy responsable y trabajadora, vive únicamente junto a sus tres hijos todos menores de edad y que se dedican a estudiar. María  se dedica a la venta de ropa interior femenina, blusas y camisetas, las cuales comercializa sobre la calle principal del centro de su municipio, un lugar muy bueno para su venta ya que muchas personas transitan el lugar y pueden observar su venta. María   solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar ropa por mayor, en diferentes colores, tallas y estilos, de manera que su venta sea más vistosa para las personas. Todo esto lo hace con el deseo de poder mejorar su venta, ofreciendo mayor cantidad de productos de manera que abarque mayor cantidad de gustos y necesidades. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y es una madre emprendedora muy responsable con sus hijos que a pesar que no cuenta con la ayuda de los padres de sus hijos ha logrado salir adelante.
texts.en:
María del Carmen is a responsible, hardworking mother.  She only lives with her three minor children who attend school.  María sells women’s underwear, blouses and t-shirts on the main street of her town, a site that’s very good for sales because lots of people pass by there and can see what she has for sale.

María is asking for a loan to buy more clothes at wholesale in a variety of colors, sizes and styles so that her merchandise will be more eye-catching.  
She does all of this in hopes of improving her sales offering better quality products in order to satisfy a wider gamut of taste and needs.

She’s a very hardworking woman and an enterprising mother who is very responsible with her children who despite not having any help from her children’s fathers has managed to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy blouses and underwear to sell.

loans.name: Remberto

texts.es: Remberto, vive junto a dos hijos menores de edad, quienes le ayudan con el trabajo. Él se dedica a sembrar frijoles y maíz en su propia parcela, desde hace muchos años atrás que Remberto realiza este trabajo por lo que es un experto, lo que le permite contar con muchos clientes ya que cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales. Remberto solicita un préstamo por medio del cual cuente con el dinero necesario para la compra de mayor cantidad de semilla de frijoles y maíz para sembrar y así aprovechar al máximo su parcela. Remberto es padre soltero y se dedica de lleno al bienestar de su familia, razón principal para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Remberto lives with his two minor children who help him with the work.  He grows beans and corn in his own fields.  Remberto has done this work for many years so he’s quite expert at it which allows him to have many customers since he has good personal references.

Remberto is asking for a loan to have money needed to buy larger amounts of bean and corn seeds to plant and take maximum advantage of his farmland.  Remberto is a single father and totally committed to his family’s wellbeing, his main reason for getting ahead.

loans.use: to buy seeds to plant.

loans.name: Irene

texts.es: Irene se dedica a cosechar frijoles y maíz, este es un trabajo que se ha realizado durante generaciones en su familia y es el que les ha permitido salir adelante y contar con todo lo necesario para vivir dignamente. Irene vive junto a su esposa y tres hijos, todos colaboran con el negocio de granos básicos y legumbres como repollos, rábanos, berro y otros más los cuales también ellos cosechan. Irene solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda invertir en la compra de mayor cantidad de maíz y frijoles para sembrar, así mismo para adquirir semillas de legumbres y de esta forma incrementar la variedad, lo cual le permitirá contar con más clientes. Irene deposita todas sus esperanzas a dicho préstamo ya que es su oportunidad de mejorar y seguir adelante.
texts.en:
Irene grows beans and corn.  His family has been doing this work for generations, and this has allowed him to make economic progress and to live with dignity.  He lives with his wife and three children.  They all work together in the farming business.  They grow grains as well as vegetables such as cabbage, radishes, watercress and more.

He is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL so that he can buy a larger quantity of corn and beans to plant.  He also wishes to purchase seeds for vegetables so he can increase the variety of his crops, which will allow him to reach more customers.  He has high hopes for this loan, since it is his opportunity improve his business and continue moving forward.

loans.use: to buy corn for planting.

loans.name: José Santos

texts.es: José Santos de cincuenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus siete hijos en casa propia; el posee un taller de estructura metálica elabora portones, balcones, puertas entre otros, el negocio está ubicado en su residencia y tiene varios años de tenerlo, se siente orgulloso de los resultados que ha logrado con su trabajo y planea seguir así, tiene mucha clientela  labora al gusto de las personas, lo prefieren porque todo es de buena calidad, a buenos precios y sobre todo el mejor servicio; José es un hombre dedicado asu labor siempre con toda la disposición de superarse y alcanzar al éxito, en estos últimos meses ha aumentado la demanda y no quiere decepcionar a los clientes, necesita de capital para invertir en materia prima por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar hierro, compresor, pinzas, etc. José Santos es muy responsable y tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José Santos is 41 years old and lives with his life partner and their 7 children in their own house. He owns a metal workshop where he makes gates, balconies and doors, among other things. The business is located in his house and he has had it for several years. He feels proud of the results that he has achieved with his work and plans to continue. He has many customers and works to please them. They prefer him because all he makes is of good quality, at good prices and above all the best service. 

Jose is a man who is dedicated to his work and is always disposed to better himself and reach success. In this last months the demand has increased and does not want to disappoint his clients. He needs capital to invest in raw materials and is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL that allows him to buy iron, a compressor, and clips, etc. José Santos is very responsible and has good payment references. He is certain that he will be able to pay his debt and at the same time give his family a better quality life.

loans.use: to buy iron, a compressor and and clips.

loans.name: Rowaida

texts.en:
Rowaida is a 51-year-old married woman. Her husband is a barber who supports six sons and daughters.

To help her husband in paying some of the household bills, Rowaida has a small business sewing and embroidering. 

She has applied for this loan to buy more raw materials to expand her sewing business.

loans.use: to buy more raw materials for sewing.

loans.name: Julio Alfonso

texts.es: Julio Alfonso, es una persona muy conocida en su lugar de residencia por ser muy responsable y trabajador, el se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijoles, lo que realiza en unas pequeñas parcelas, así mismo posee un pequeño ganado, siendo la agricultura la actividad principal. Julio  junto a su esposa e hijos realiza la actividad de arar la tierra, sembrar y cuidar de los cultivos, que posteriormente comercializan. Con la aspiración de hacer crecer su negocio y aumentar la cantidad de clientes y así mismo sus ventas, Julio solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, esto con el enorme deseo de comprar mayor cantidad de semillas para sembrar, así mismo para adquirir algunos compartimientos para conservar los granos frescos, y también para comprar pesticidas. Julio desea realizar lo mejor posible su trabajo, ya que de esta forma podrá contar con clientes satisfechos que regresarán nuevamente a comprar sus productos lo que es muy positivo para el crecimiento de su negocio y la economía de su hogar.
texts.en:
Julio  Alfonso is a very well-known person where he lives for being very responsible and hardworking.  He grows corn and beans on small parcels of land; he also has a few heads of cattle but agriculture is his main activity.

Julio, his wife and children work together tilling the soil, planting and caring for the crops that they subsequently sell.  Hoping to make his business grow and to increase his customer base and thus his sales, Julio is asking INTEGRAL for a loan with the enormous wish to buy larger amounts of seeds to plant as well as to buy some storage bins to keep the grains fresh; he will also buy pesticide.

Julio wants to do his work as soon as possible so that he can keep his customers satisfied so that they will return once again to buy his products which is very positive for his business’ growth and for his family’s economy.

loans.use: to buy seeds to plant.

loans.name: Irma Yolanda

texts.es: Irma Yolanda de cincuenta y cinco años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y su hijo, ella se dedica a la venta de tamales de pollo, tiene varios años de trabajar con este negocio pues le ha dado muy buenos resultados y a la vez le ayudo a  adquirir una gran experiencia para prepararlos, es muy conocida en la zona donde comercia porque vende los tamales más deliciosos de forma ambulante, ya tiene muchísima clientela porque la comida que elabora es de primera calidad, con un sabor exquisito y a precios accesibles además el servicio es muy rápido; Irma es una mujer con muchas metas por alcanzar, labora día con día para  lograr un futuro próspero, desde que aumento la clientela ella desea aumentar la producción para así obtener mejores ganancias, necesita invertir en insumos pero ocupa de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pollo, maíz, hojas, verdura, leña, etc. Irma Yolanda es muy responsable con una moral impecable asegura el pago de la deuda y a la vez confía que podrá darle a  su familia una mejor vida.
texts.en: Irma Yolanda is 55 years old. She lives with her life companion and their son. Her work is selling chicken tamales. She has worked in this business for a number of years since it has given her very good results, and at the same time it helped her acquire great experience in preparing them. She is very well known in the district where she sells because as a walking vendor she sells the most delicious tamales. She already has an extensive clientele because the food that she makes is of the highest quality, with an exquisite flavor and at affordable prices. In addition, her service is very rapid. Irma is a woman with many goals to achieve. She works day after day to have a prosperous future. Since she has increased her clientele, she wants to increase her production to thus obtain better earnings. She needs to invest in ingredients, but it is a question of capital. For this reason she is applying to INTEGRAL for a loan that will permit her to buy chicken, corn, corn husks, vegetables, firewood, etc. Irma Yolanda is very responsible and has impeccable morals. She guarantees the payment of the debt and at the same time is confident that she will be able to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy chicken, corn, corn husks, vegetables, and firewood.

loans.name: Gerardo De Jesús

texts.es: Gerardo de Jesús de 32 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa quien se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar y le ayuda con el negocio. Gerardo  posee una venta de pupusas, tortillas, bebidas gaseosas, golosinas, pan, galletas y otros productos alimenticios más. El negocio está ubicado en una zona muy estratégica ya que en el lugar hay escuelas públicas y negocios varios. Sus ventas son muy buenas ya que es una zona muy transitada, es por esta razón que él desea invertir en el negocio, comprando mayor cantidad de productos comestibles como: pan, materia prima para elaboración de pupusas, jugos y otros más, de manera que sus ventas se puedan ver incrementadas, lo cual es lo principal para Gerardo ya que esto le permitirá brindarle una vida mejor a su esposa e hijos quienes son la principal razón para salir adelante y esforzarse.
texts.en: Gerardo de Jesús, 32, lives with his wife, who attends to the household chores and helps him in his business. He has a stall that sells pupusas, tortillas, sodas, bread, cookies, candy and other types of food. The business is located in a very strategic spot, since in the area there are public schools and various businesses. His sales are very good since there is a lot of foot traffic. It is for this reason that he wishes to invest in the business, buying a greater variety of products such as bread, juice, ingredients for making pupusas and other items. This will lead to an increase in sales. This is important for Gerardo since it will allow him to provide a better life for his wife and children, who are the main reason for all his efforts.

loans.use: to buy bread, juice, soda and corn for resale.

loans.name: Joel

texts.es: Joel de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto  a su compañera de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; él se dedica al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en este rubro y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le ayuda a obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a la localidad donde vive, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela que le ha permitido mantenerse delante de la competencia, la gente lo prefiere porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es excelente; Joel es muy dedicado a su labor, es responsable, honesto y sobre todo muy humilde, quiere alcanzar el éxito y hacer crecer su negocio,  por eso aumentara la producción y necesita de capital para invertir por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herbicidas, herramientas; Joel tiene buen record crediticio y su moral es intachable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Joel is 35 years old and lives together with his life partner and children in his own home.  He is a farmer who grows corn and beans.  He has been in this line of work for a number of years and has gained a lot of experience that helps him to obtain the best harvests.  His plot of land is located in a highly agricultural area which is very close to his town.  He sells his produce in neighboring areas and already has a lot of customers which has allowed him to stay ahead of the competition.  People prefer to buy from him because they know that everything he sells is good quality and affordable.  In addition, he provides excellent service.  Joel is very committed to his work.  He is responsible, honest and, above all, very humble.  He would like to achieve success and grow his business.  He would like to increase his production and needs capital to invest.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, herbicides and tools.  Joel has a good credit record and impeccable morals.  He assures us that he will be able to repay his loan and, at the same time, offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, herbicides and tools

loans.name: Anaam

texts.en:
Anaam is a 45-year-old housewife caring for seven sons and daughters. Her husband has recently retired from the military.

Having one source of income, which is the retirement salary, is not enough to support the whole family. That’s why Anaam started to make fresh cheese and yogurt to sell. 

Now she wants to increase her productivity of cheese, so she has applied for this loan to buy more milk and a new machine for making yogurt and cheese.

loans.use: to buy more milk and a new machine for making yogurt and cheese.

loans.name: Salam

texts.en:
Salam is a 29-year-old married woman. Her husband owns a fruit and vegetables store. 

Salam has recently started her own business buying and selling clothes at home. She is still looking for a good retailer that she can get the clothes from at a good price.

Now Salam has applied for a youth loan to bring in a new collection of summer clothes.

loans.use: to bring in a new collection of summer clothes.

loans.name: María Luisa

texts.es: María Luisa de sesenta y uno años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hija; ella posee  una venta de comida, en variedad, antojitos empanadas, pastelitos, yuca entre otros,  tiene varios años de dedicarse a vender y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite cada día tener muchos más clientes, pues todos saben que lo  que produce es de primera calidad y lo vende a precios realmente accesibles además el servicio es excelente; María es una mujer emprendedora siempre dispuesta a aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se le presenten, quiere ver crecer el negocio y para eso necesita invertir en materia prima que le permita aumentar la producción de comida y antojitos, es así como se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, frijol, verduras, carne, plátanos, leche, etc.  María Luisa tiene muy buenas referencias de pago además es muy responsable está segura que podrá saldar el financiamiento en el tiempo establecido y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María Luisa, 61, lives with her life companion and their daughter.  She sells a variety of food: snacks, turnovers, little cakes and manioc, among others.  She’s been selling for several years and has attained valuable experience that allows her to have many more customers every day because they all know that what she produces is top quality, she sells at really accessible prices and besides the service is excellent.

María is an enterprising person who is always ready to take advantage of all opportunities that present themselves.  She wants to see her business grow and for that needs to invest in raw materials that will allow her to produce food and snacks which is why she’s asked INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn, beans, vegetables, meat, bananas, milk, etc.

María Luisa has many good payment references and she’s also very responsible; she’s sure that she’ll be able to repay the loan in the established time frame while at the same time providing her family with better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, vegetables, meat, bananas and milk.

loans.name: Carmen De Jesús

texts.es: Carmen de Jesús vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la cría de cerdos y adicional a esa actividad tiene una venta de pupusas, los negocios están ubicados en el lugar de su residencia y tiene varios años de tenerlos, le ha dado muy buenos resultados, tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren por la calidad, los buenos precios, y el servicio excelente; Carmen de Jesús es una mujer visionaria que busca alcanzar el éxito, cada día se esfuerza el doble pues sabe que al final del camino será grande la recompensa, desde hace algún tiempo quiere aumentar las ventas en su negocio pero para eso necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cerdos, maíz, quesillo, frijol, verdura etc. Carmen de Jesús tiene buen record crediticio y muy buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carmen de Jesús lives with her life companion and their children in her own house.  She raises pigs and in addition to this activity sells ‘pupusas’ [Salvadoran stuffed corn griddle cakes].  The businesses are located at home and she’s had them for several years; they have given her good results.  She has a large clientele because people prefer her because of the quality, good prices and excellent service.

Carmen de Jesús is a forward-looking person who seeks to attain success.  Every day she works twice as hard because she knows that her reward awaits her at the end of the road.  For some time now she’s wanted to increase her sales but needs capital to do so which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy pigs, corn, cheese, beans, vegetables, etc.  

Carmen de Jesús has a very good credit history and very good payment references.  She is sure that she’ll be able to repay the debt while at the same time giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy pigs, corn, cheese, beans and vegetables.

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en:
Asmaa is a 37-year-old widow. She lives in Al Zarqa’. 

She makes baskets from straws, and sells them to support her six children. Her future plans are to expand her project and open a small shop to sell her products.

Now she has applied for this loan in order to bring in more raw materials to make other items other than baskets, such as trays and frames.

loans.use: to bring in more raw materials to make baskets and other items.

loans.name: Fawzia

texts.en:
Fawzia is 32 years old. Her husband works in the military and they have five children. 

She has opened a mini market and she wants to purchase goods to increase her sales so that her children have a better life.

loans.use: to purchase goods for her mini market.

loans.name: Tarkiah

texts.en:
Tarkiah is a 54-year-old woman from Irbid, Jordan, who has six family members. 

She is requesting a loan of 1,000 JOD so that she can buy new furniture and paint her home. This will better her family's living space.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements.

loans.name: Dignora

texts.es:
Con 10,600 pesos Dignora podrá reabastecer sus negocios. Dignora vende café, caramelos, coockies and crackers, frutas, cabellos para extensión de pelo, y artículos de cuidado personal. You name it, she sells it!
Dignora enviudó hace dos años cuando su hijo mayor tenía 14 y el menos 2 años, tiene cuatro hijos en total. De repente se vio sin esposo, sin empleo y con una familia larga que mantener. Así que comenzó a incorporar nuevos artículos en una mesa que improvisó al frente de su casa, donde sus vecinos vienen a comprarle.
Dignora quiere que todos sus hijos estudien, en este moemnto tienen 16, 10, 8 y 4 años y todos asisten a la escuela. No ha sido fácil salir adente ella sola, pero el deseo de darle un mejor futuro a sus hijos la mantine de pie y con una actitud positiva a fin de ser un buen ejemplo para sus pequeños.
texts.en:
With 10,600 DOP Dignora would be able to restock her businesses.  Dignora sells coffee, sweets, cookies, crackers, fruit, hair extensions, and personal care products.  You name it, she sells it!

Dignora was widowed two years ago when her oldest child was 14 and her youngest was 2.  She has four children.  She was suddenly left without a husband, without work, and with a large family to support.  This is how she started to bring new items to a table that she improvised in front of her house.  This is where her neighbors come to buy from her.

Dignora wants all of her children to get an education.  They are now 16, 10, 8, and 4, and they all go to school.  It has not been easy to get ahead alone.  However, the desire to give her children a better future keeps her on her toes with a positive attitude.  She does this in order to be a good example for her little ones.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her businesses.

loans.name: Eliezar

texts.es: Eliezar de veinte años de edad vive junto a su padre y su hermano en casa propia; el posee un molino, está ubicado en su vivienda, en una esquina muy transitada, muele maíz, chicharrón, tomate, entre otros, es muy conocido en la zona es especialmente por las tortilleras que llegan todos los días a moler maíz, tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que su trabajo es de calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable, se siente muy orgulloso por su negocio porque le ha dado muy buenos resultados; Eliezar es dedicado a su labor, responsable, confiable pero sobre todo humilde, se está esforzando por alcanzar un futuro más próspero por eso en esta ocasión le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar discos de molino que son los que procesan los productos que se depositan en ellos, además del mantenimiento del molino; Eliezar tiene buenas referencias de pago y tiene la capacidad de cancelar la deuda además tiene la confianza que podrá darle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Eliezar, 20, lives with his father and brother in their own house.  He owns a mill that’s located at home which is on a very busy corner.  He grinds corn, fried pork rinds and tomatoes, among others.  He’s very well known in the area especially by the tortilla makers who come by daily to grind their corn.  He has a large clientele because people know that his work is quality and his prices are accessible; in addition service is second to none.

He feels very proud of his business because it’s given him very good results.  Eliezar is committed to his work, responsible and trustworthy but above all humble.  He’s striving to reach a more prosperous future which is why on this occasion he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy discs for his mill which are what process the products placed in it.  He also wants to service the mill.

Eliezar has good payment references and the capacity to repay the loan.  He’s also confident that he will be able to give his family a fulfilled life.

loans.use: to buy parts for his mill.

loans.name: Imad

texts.en:
Imad is a university student majoring in accounting. He is 22 years old, and he has three younger siblings.

Imad has applied for this loan to pay for his semester fees so he can graduate as soon as possible and work in the same field.

loans.use: to pay for his semester fees.

loans.name: Rorng

texts.en:
Rorng is 45 years old. She is married and resides with ten children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. 

She has been involved in the agricultural business for more than twenty years, has extensive experience, and is successful in her career. She is involved in growing rice and fattening up animals. 

She earns approximately $5 per day. Her husband helps her run the business. Three of her children are employed in a garment factory. They earn about $9 per day. 

In order to improve her farm work, Rorng is requesting a loan of $1,500 to purchase cattle to use for tilling her farmland. 

In the future, she would like to expand her business and help her children earn bachelor’s degrees. Moreover, she hopes to rebuild her present house to make it bigger and more convenient for her family.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to use for tilling her farm land.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Con 10,600 pesos Elizabeth podrá comprar mercancía para incrementar el inventario de su puesto de frutas y verduras. Elizabeth además tiene una tienda de comestibles y con este préstamo también compraría algo de mercancia para la tienda. Elizabeth nunca ha tomado un préstamo en la industria financiera formal, sino que hasta ahora había recurrido a los loan sharks. Este préstamo le ayudará a librarse de los altos intereses cobrados por los loan sharks.
Elizabeth es madre soltera, tiene dos hijos de 10 y 4 años, ambos asisten a la escuela. 
"Quiero ser económicamente sostenible para poder comprar una casa donde vivir con mis dos niños, por esto me levanta todos los días de madrugada para trabajar en las pimeras horas de la mañana en el puesto de frutas y vegetales que está en el mercado local y luego que he vendido la mercancía en el mercado, voy a mi tienda de comestibles donde trabajo hasta la noche".
texts.en:
With 10,600 DOP Elizabeth would be able to buy merchandise to increase her inventory at her fruit and vegetable stand.  Elizabeth also has a food store.  With this loan she will also buy some merchandise for the store.

Elizabeth has never taken a loan in the formal financial industry.  Until now she has turned to loan sharks.  This loan will help free her from the high interest rates charged by loan sharks.

Elizabeth is a single mother, and she has two children, ages ten and four.  Both children go to school.  Elizabeth tells us that she wants to be financially stable in order to be able to buy a house where she and her two children can live.

That is why she gets up at dawn every day in order to work in the early hours of the morning at her fruit and vegetable stand.  Her stand is at the local market.  After selling her merchandise at the market, she goes to her food store, where she works until the evening.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her fruit and vegetable stand.

loans.name: Salvador Ernesto

texts.es: Salvador Ernesto vive junto a su familia, él se dedica a la crianza de ganado desde hace ya varios años, tiene mucha experiencia en el rubro, por lo que siempre obtiene la mejor leche, el terreno donde mantiene a las vacas está cerca de su vivienda y eso le ayuda a mantener vigilado el ganado, comercia en todas las zonas aledañas y ya tiene mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles  además el servicio es excelente; Salvador es un hombre emprendedor dispuesto a superarse, quiere poner todo de su parte para alcanzar el éxito, desea hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita de capital para inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar dos vacas lecheras. Salvador Ernesto posee excelente referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que saldara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Salvador Ernesto lives with his family.  He has been raising cattle for several years now and has much experience in this line of work which is why he always obtains the best milk.  The field where he keeps his cows is near his house which helps him guard his cattle.  He sells in all the areas nearby and has many customers because they know that everything he sells is top quality and at affordable prices; in addition service is excellent.

Salvador is an enterprising man who is willing to improve.  He wants to put his best effort into attaining success.  He wants to make the business grow but needs investment capital which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy two dairy cows.

Salvador Ernesto has excellent payment references and is very responsible.  He assures that he’ll repay the loan and at the same time give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Juan Alfredo

texts.es: Juan Alfredo de 65 años de edad, es una persona que ha trabajado muy duro por salir adelante y poder contar con todo lo necesario para vivir dignamente. Él vive junto a su esposa  e hijos quienes le ayudan al negocio. Juan Alfredo se dedica a la cosecha de frijol y maíz un oficio muy antiguo y de muchas generaciones el cual es muy rentable. Él solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de semillas de frijoles y maíz para sembrar, así mismo para comprar pesticidas, depósitos plásticos para poder rociarlo, abono, sacos, arados y todo los materiales necesario para poder realizar una excelente cosecha. Con lo anterior Juan espera mejorar en gran manera sus ganancias y así poder ahorrar para cuando se encuentre en edad avanzada junto a su esposa y siempre poder contar con todo lo necesario para vivir.
texts.en:
Juan Alfredo is 65 years old.  He is a person who has worked very hard in order to get ahead in life and have everything he needs to lead a decent life.  He lives together with his wife and children who help him in his business.  Juan Alfredo's business is growing beans and corn.  This is a very ancient trade which has passed down through many generations.  It is very profitable.

Juan Alfredo is requesting a loan to buy a larger quantity of corn and bean seeds to sow.  He will also buy pesticides, plastic tanks with which to spray them, fertilizers, bags, plows and all the materials he needs to enjoy an excellent harvest.  Juan hopes to use his loan to improve his profits and save up so that when he is older he and his wife will have everything they need to live well.

loans.use: to buy tanks for spraying his crops with pesticides

loans.name: Ludovina

texts.es:
Con 51,750 pesos Ludovina podrá remodelar y colacar más tramos (shelves) en su tienda de ropa y accesorios. A Ludovina siempre le han gustado las ventas y hacer negocios, nunca se ha visualizado como empleada. Por esto hace 6 años abrió las puertas de su tienda de ropas, donde le vende a clientes muy satisfechos por la variedad del inventario.
Ludovina es casada, su esposo es un maestro retirado; tienen tres hijos adultos, dos hembras y un varón, los que ya se han casado.
Ludovina no tiene casa propia, su mayor deseo es comprar una casa donde ella y su esposo puedan tener un retiro tranquilo y cómodo
texts.en:
With this loan of 51,750 DOP, Ludovina will be able to remodel her clothing and accessories shop and install more shelves.  Ludovina has always enjoyed sales and conducting business, but she never pictured herself as an employee.  For this reason, she opened the doors of her clothing store six years ago.  It is here that she sells to her customers, who are very satisfied because of the variety of her inventory.  

Ludovina is married and has three grown children, two daughters and a son, who are already married.  Her husband is a retired teacher.  Ludovina does not have a house of her own, so her greatest wish is to buy a house where she and her husband can retire peacefully and comfortably.

loans.use: to remodel her shop and install more shelves.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es: Javier vive junto a su familia en casa propia, él se dedica al cultivo de maíz, frijol y ayote ya tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener siempre las mejores cosechas se siente muy orgulloso porque su negocio le ha dado muy buenos resultados, su terreno está ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y está muy cercano a su residencia, comercia en todos los lugares aledaños y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad, a precios accesibles, y con el mejor servicio; Javier es un hombre dedicado a su labor siempre dispuesto a aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se le presentan pues sabe que solo así lograra el éxito, quiere aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital para invertir en insumo por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, fertilizante, herbicida, herramienta etc. Javier es muy responsable y tiene buenas referencias pago, tiene la certeza que cancelara la deuda y  a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Javier lives with his family in his own house.  He grows corn, beans and pumpkins.  He’s been working in agriculture for several years now and has gained much experience that allows him to always produce the best harvests.  He feels proud because his business has had good results.  His field is located in an area of intense agricultural activity very near his house.  He sells in all the nearby areas and has many customers because people know that everything he sells is top quality at affordable prices with the best service.

Javier is a man who is committed to his work always ready to take advantage of all the opportunities that arise because he knows that’s the only way to attain success.  He wants to increase production but needs capital to invest in supplies which is why he’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy corn and bean seeds, fertilizer, herbicide, tools, etc.

Javier is very responsible and has good payment references.  He is sure that he’ll repay the loan and at the same time give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy seeds, farm supplies and tools.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco vive junto a su compañera de vida, ambos son personas que cuentan con muy buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos, ya que son conocidos como personas muy responsables y trabajadoras. Francisco se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijoles, los cuales también comercializa por mayor en diferentes lugares de la zona, también vende café el cual planta junto a su esposa. Francisco solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar semilla de frijoles y maíz para sembrar, esto debido a al fenómeno tropical llamado E12 que se dio el año pasado y que destruyo todos sus cultivos, lo que obligó a Francisco a iniciar de cero, unas de las principales razones por las que solicita el préstamo ya que él no cuenta con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de semillas, arados, palas y abono, con esto Francisco contará con todo lo necesario para levantar su negocio.
texts.en:
Francisco lives with his life companion; they are both people who have very good references from their neighbors since they are known to be very responsible, hardworking people. Francisco works growing corn and beans which he sells at wholesale in various places in the zone; he also sells coffee that he grows with his wife.

Francisco is asking INTEGRAL for a loan to buy bean and corn seeds to plant because a phenomenon called E12 last year destroyed his crops which forced Francisco to start over from zero.  One of the main reasons for his requesting the loan is that he does not have money necessary to invest in seeds, plows, shovels and manure.  With it, Francisco will have everything he needs to lift up his business.

loans.use: to buy basic grains.

loans.name: Germán

texts.es: Germán de 42 años de edad, vive en casa propia junto a su esposa y seis hijos todos dependientes de él.  Son muy conocidos por su laboriosidad y responsabilidad, ya que incluso los hijos mayores  contribuyen con el trabajo. Germán se dedica a la venta de granos básicos, los cuales también siembra y cosecha. La venta de granos básicos es un negocio muy importante para Germán y su familia ya que todos dependen de este, razón por la que  solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar todos los insumos necesarios como: palas, arados, tanques para rociar pesticidas y otros, los cuales son fundamentales para obtener buenas cosechas, con lo que él espera mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Germán, 42, lives in his own house with his wife and six children; all depend on him.  They are very well-known for being very hardworking and responsible since even the older children share the work.

Germán sells basic grains that he plants and harvests himself.  The sale of basic grains is a very important business for Germán and his family since they all depend on it which is why he’s asking for a loan to buy all the necessary supplies like shovels, plows and tanks used to sprinkle pesticides and others which are fundamental in order to obtain good harvests that he hopes he’ll be able to improve his sales with.

loans.use: to buy pesticide and manure.

loans.name: María Irma

texts.es: María Irma de 55 años de edad vive junto a sus  hijos, quienes  le ayudan en el trabajo familiar. María se dedica a la agricultura de maíz y frijoles, con lo que logra darles todo lo necesario a sus hijos, quienes son muy responsables y colaboradores en el hogar. María es madre soltera y siempre se ha esforzado mucho por salir adelante y contar con todo lo necesario para tener una vida estable, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para la compra de pesticidas, abono, semillas de maíz y frijoles y todo lo necesario para realizar una excelente cosecha  y posteriormente comercializar. Esto llena de mucha ilusión a María ya que con mucho esfuerzo podrá tener una vida mejor.
texts.en:
María Irma, 55, lives with her children who help her with the family work.  María is a corn and bean farmer.  With this she’s able to give everything necessary to her children who are very responsible and cooperative at home.

María is a single mother and has always striven very much to get ahead and to have everything necessary to have a stable life which is why she’s asking INTEGRAL for a loan to have the money needed to buy pesticide, manure, corn and bean seeds and everything needed to obtain an excellent harvest to subsequently sell.  This fills María with much hope because with much effort she’ll be able to have a better life.

loans.use: to buy manure for her crops.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials to plant corn.

loans.name: José Salvador

texts.es: José Salvador, vive junto a su esposa quien se dedica a los quehaceres del hogar, y junto a su hijo. José se dedica a la siembra de maíz y frijoles, negocio en el  cual trabaja desde hace más de 10 años. Para mantener su cosecha libre de plagas José debe tener todos los cuidados necesarios desde el momento de la siembra hasta la hora de cosecharla, por lo que solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar más semillas para sembrar, de manera que pueda producir mayor cantidad de granos básicos, así mismo para comprar pesticidas, los cuales le garanticen la calidad de sus productos, con lo que sus clientes estén satisfechos de tal manera aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en:
José Salvador lives with his wife who does household chores and with their son.  José works growing corn and beans, a business he’s had for more than ten years.  

In order to keep his crops free of infestations he must exert every care necessary from the moment of planting until the hour of harvesting which is why he’s asking for a loan through which he will be able to buy more seeds to plant in order to produce a larger amount of basic grains.  He will also buy pesticides that will guarantee the quality of his products that will keep his customers satisfied thus increasing his sales.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Héctor Antonio

texts.es: Héctor Antonio  se dedica al oficio de la agricultura sembrando frijoles y maíz, así mismo comercializa ganado vacuno con lo que obtiene otras ganancias extras y también trabaja como motorista, transportando personas a diferentes lugares del pueblo como: mercados, iglesias, escuelas y otros lugares más, él tiene 31 años de edad y se destaca por ser muy trabajador y responsable con su familia, la cual está conformada por su esposa, dos hijos y sus padres quienes le ayudan con el negocio de la agricultura y ganadería. Héctor solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de semillas, lo que le permita sembrar el doble de lo que ha hecho siembre y así poder aprovechar al máximo su parcela, así mismo desea comprar una vaca más para incrementar  su ganado el cual es de mucha ayuda para el sostenimiento de su hogar, ya que de este obtienen leche para comercializar y para el consumo personal. Héctor desea aumentar sus ventas lo cual podrá lograr por medio de dicho préstamo.
texts.en:
Héctor Antonio is in the agricultural business of growing beans and corn, and also selling cattle with which he earns extra income. He also works as a driver, transporting people to different places of the city such as markets, churches, schools, and other places. He is 31 years old and is known to be hardworking and a responsible family man. His family is made of of his wife, 2 children and his parents who help him in agriculture and cattle raising.

Héctor is asking for a loan from Integral so that he can buy more seeds which will permit him to grow twice what he has planted and thus be able to take advantage to the maximum his plot of land, and he wants to buy another cow in order to increase his livestock which is a great help in the support of his home, as it provides milk to sell and for personal consumption. Héctor wants to increase sales which can be achieved through this loan.

loans.use: to buy beans for planting and selling

loans.name: Gladys Haydee

texts.es: Gladys Haydee  de treinta y tres años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, ya tiene varios años de trabajar en este negocio, adicional a esto tienen una tienda donde vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, pan entre otros, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues todas las personas la prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además de un servicio inigualable; Gladis es una mujer decidida siempre está en toda la disposición de alcanzar un futuro más próspero, últimamente ha aumentado la demanda en su negocio, por eso se decidió invertir en insumos para aumentar el negocio, necesita de capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ganado, granos básicos, pan, golosinas, etc. Gladys es una mujer dedicada al trabajo siempre, está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan cancelar la deuda a tiempo, y a la vez ofrecer a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: 33-year-old Gladys Haydee lives with her life partner and her children. She buys and sells cattle, and she has already been in this line of work for many years. In addition, they own a store where they sell essential goods such as basic grains, milk, eggs, bread, etc. She has gotten a lot of customers because everyone prefers to go to her, since everything she sells is high quality at affordable prices, and the service is unmatched. Gladys is a determined woman who's always fully willing to reach a more prosperous future. Lately her business has seen a rise in demand, which is why she decided to invest in supplies in order to increase her sales. She needs working capital, so she requests a loan from INTEGRAL which allows her to purchase cattle, basic grains, bread, candy, etc. Gladys is a woman who's always dedicated to her work, and she's expecting to get new opportunities that allow her to repay the debt timely and also improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase cattle, basic grains, bread and candy.

loans.name: Teresa De Jesús

texts.es: Teresa de Jesús de 41 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y dos hijos menores de edad. Desde hace mucho  años que Teresa  posee una venta de tortillas, en la cual se encarga de elaborarlas y venderlas. Este  negocio  ha  nacido con el deseo de poder mejorar la economía familiar, ya que en muchas ocasiones no contaba con el dinero necesario para solventar todos los gastos del hogar. Es por esta razón que Teresa desea poder seguir creciendo  con el negocio que le ha brindado estabilidad económica a su familia. Ella solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar maíz por mayor, de manera que pueda obtenerlo a precios más accesible, así mismo comprar cilindros de gas propano con el fin de contar con una reserva de este último, ya que en muchas ocasiones escasea y de esta manera no se verá afectada como en otros años. Esto será de mucho ayuda para ella, ya que podrá mejorar las condiciones de su negocio y así contar con más clientela.
texts.en: Teresa de Jesús is 41 years old. She lives with her husband and 2 young children. For many years Teresa has been selling tortillas, and she is in charge of making and selling them. This business was born from the desire of being able to improve her family finances as on many occasions she did not have the necessary funds to cover the household expenses. This is why Teresa wants to be able to continue growing the business that has provided financial stability for her family. She is asking for a loan to be able to buy corn at wholesale, in order to get it at a more affordable price, and also to buy propane gas cylinders to be a reserve of the latter, as it is often scarce, and in this way not to be affected as she was in other years. This will be a big help to her because it can improve her business conditions and thus she will have more customers.

loans.use: to buy corn in order to make her tortillas

loans.name: Shazia's Group

texts.en:
Shazia is requesting a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her father’s fruit-selling business. With the loan investment he will buy fresh seasonal fruits to sell to his clients. He is very professional in his dealings and offers good quality produce. Shazia is hopeful that the loan will help him to further improve his business and increase his profits.

Shazia is a very good housewife and working lady who sews clothes for her neighboring clients to financially support her husband. She has a seven-year-old daughter who has not yet started her education.

Note: In the photo, she is sitting in front of her sewing machine.

loans.use: To buy fruits for fruit selling business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer for his bean crop.

loans.name: Manuel Vicente

texts.es: Manuel Vicente vive junto a su compañera de vida, sus hijos y sus nietos; él se dedica a la agricultura específicamente al cultivo de maíz, tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, se siente orgulloso porque su labor le ha dado buenos resultados, el terreno de cultivo es muy favorable y está en una zona con alta incidencia agrícola, comercia en todos los alrededores y ya tiene mucha clientela pues saben que todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable; Manuel es muy entregado a su labor siempre está a la disposición de nuevas oportunidades que le permiten alcanzar el éxito; debido a las lluvias del año pasado tuvo grandes pérdidas por eso en esta temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción y necesita de capital para la inversión por eso le solicita a  INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, abono, insecticida, herramienta etc. Manuel Vicente tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Manuel Vicente lives with his life partner, his children, and his grandchildren.  He is a farmer, and he grows corn.  He has worked in this trade for many years, and he has a lot of experience, which allows him to get the best income.

He feels proud because his work has given him good results.  The land is favorable for farming, and there is a lot of agriculture in the area.  He sells in all of the outlying areas, and he has a lot of clientele.  They know that everything he sells is of the best quality at affordable prices with unparalleled service.

Manuel is very devoted to his work.  He is always ready for new opportunities that will allow him to be successful.  Due to the rains last year, he had big losses.  That is why he wants to increase his production during this planting season.

He needs the capital to invest, and that is why he is requesting a loan from Integral.  A loan would allow him to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools, etc.  Manuel Vicente has good payment history.  He is sure that he will be able to repay the debt and provide his family with a full life.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools, etc.

loans.name: Eman

texts.en:
Eman is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her husband appears in her Kiva profile photo.
Eman is a 40-year-old woman and the mother to four sons and four daughters.  Her husband is employed, but his salary is not enough to cover the family's needs.

For the past five years, Eman has operated a public services office, offering printing, copying and translating services to clients.  It has been a profitable project, but it needs more support to cover the costs.

Eman is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from FATEN to help cover the costs of purchasing a new printer and copier machine to improve the project's offerings. This will increase the quantity and the quality of her work and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase new printer and copier machine to her project

loans.name: Concepción Del Carmen

texts.es: Concepción Del Carmen se dedica a la siembra de frijol y maíz desde hace más de 15 años, negocio gracias al cual ha podido salir adelante junto a su familia. Concepción posee  una pequeña parcela la cual desea aprovecharla al máximo lo que ha sido muy difícil hasta el momento ya que no cuenta con los ingresos necesarios  para hacerlo.  Concepción es muy responsable y dedicada a su hogar, vive junto a su esposo  y dos hijos quienes le ayudan a sembrar y a desgranar el elote para obtener los granos de maíz que posteriormente comercializan. Concepción  solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda comprar todos los insumos necesarios para la siembra como semilla, palas, arados y más, con lo que ella espera obtener mayor cantidad de cosecha. Concepción desea mucho salir adelante y mejorar su estabilidad económica por lo que trabaja muy duro para obtenerlo.
texts.en: Concepción Del Carmen has been growing beans and corn for over 15 years, and thanks to this business she has been able to get herself and her family ahead. Concepción owns a small plot of land and she wishes to make the most of it, which has been very difficult so far, since she doesn't dispose of the earnings she needs to do that. Concepción is very responsible and dedicated to her household. She lives with her husband and two children who help her to sow and to separate the kernels from the corncobs, so they can obtain the corn grains that they later sell. Concepción requests a loan in order to purchase the supplies she needs for sowing, such as seeds, shovels, plows, etc., and with this she hopes to get a larger harvest. Concepción very much wishes to get ahead and improve her financial stability, and she works very hard to achieve that.

loans.use: to purchase plows and shovels in order to sow basic grains.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es: Carlos Alberto vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos; él se dedica al cultivo  de granos básicos, como el maíz, tiene varios años de trabajar en la agricultura y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener siempre las cosechas de mejor  calidad, él es muy trabajador y ama lo que hace, el terreno de siembra está ubicado cerca de su residencia, comercia en todos los alrededores de la zona y ya tiene mucha clientela porque las personas saben que todo lo que comercia es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además el servicio es inigualable siempre está a la orden de la gente que lo visita, adicional a lo anterior Carlos posee un empleo de soldador en un ingenio esto le ayuda a complementar los gastos del hogar ; es un hombre visionario con varios objetivos a futuro, quiere aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se le presenten para esforzarse y alcanzar el éxito, en esta temporada de siembra quiere aumentar la producción y necesita de capital para invertir en insumos por eso se decidió a solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, fertilizante, insecticida, herramienta, etc. Carlos Alberto tiene buenas referencias de pago y una buena moral asegura que podrá pagar la deuda y a la vez darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto lives with his life partner and his children. He cultivates basic grains such as corn. He has been working several years in agriculture and has gained valuable experience that permits him to always obtain crops of better quality. He is very hardworking and he loves what he does. 

The planting area is located near his home. He sells to all the surrounding areas and he has many customers because people know that all that he sells is of top quality and at affordable prices and also the service is always unique to the requests of the people who visit. 

In addition to the above, Carlos has a job as a welder, a talent that helps him supplement the household expenses. He is a visionary man with several future goals. He wants to take advantage of all the opportunities accorded him in order to try and succeed in this planting season and he wants to increase his production and needs capital in order to invest in supplies and this is why he decided to ask for a loan through Integral which will permit him to buy corn seed, fertilizer, insecticide, tools, etc. Carlos Alberto has a good payment history and is trustworthy assuring that he will pay the debt and at the same time give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn seed, fertilizer, insecticide, and tools

loans.name: Izdihar

texts.en:
Izdihar is a 24 year old woman from Ashrafia, Amman, Jordan whose family owns a small food store.  She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to buy extra goods for the store to help further develop the store.  Since she is under 30 years old, her loan is considered to be a youth loan. 

* As Izdihar is a conservative woman, she prefers not to have her photo on the internet.  The above photo is of her husband in their store.

loans.use: to pay for food goods to sell at her shop.

loans.name: Salaha

texts.en: Salaha is a woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan, who supports one other family member. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to help make home improvements, buying new furniture, and thus upgrade her home for her family.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements

loans.name: Samar

texts.en:
Samar is a 40-year-old woman; she is married and the mother of two sons and four daughters.  Her husband is a worker who is paid a low salary. He also raises and sells sheep and sheep products.  That business has been a profitable project, but he and Samar need more support to cover the family's needs.

Samar has her own project.  She purchases clothes to resell.  That has also been a profitable project, but from time to time she needs support to cover her project's costs.

Samar is requesting a 1,500 USD loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing a new collection of summer clothes to satisfy her customers and compete with other sellers. This will increase sales and improve the family's income.

loans.use: To purchase a new collection of summer clothes to resell

loans.name: Nidal

texts.en:
Nidal is a 23-year-old single young man. He is a construction worker who enjoys a good reputation among people. He gets a salary, but not enough to cover his needs and to complete finishing his house.
Nidal is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of completing his house from painting and installing tiles to improving the house's condition. This will ensure a suitable home for Nidal to live in with his family in the coming future.
Nidal is photographed in his house.

loans.use: To complete finishing his house from painting and installing tiles to improving the house's condition

loans.name: Ruth M.

texts.en: Ruth lives in Sanniquelle along with her husband and two children aged 9 and 14, who are in school. Ruth is aged 38 and a high school graduate. For the past five years she and her husband have been managing their business to improve their living condition. Ruth says she enjoys the movement of her customers (the in and out, the buying, and goods on credit). Her customers always purchase huge quantity of goods since she sells quality products, and sometimes gives them goods on credit. One of the problems she faces is the number of her commodities. She is requesting a loan to purchase more for her business inventory (bowls, glasses, clothes, spoons, cups, etc.). Her dream is to establish another site to help her customers with quality supplies, and to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase more for her business inventory (bowls, glasses, clothes, spoons, cups, etc.)

loans.name: Amal

texts.en:
Amal is a 42-year-old married woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan, who supports 6 family members. She is requesting a loan of 500 JOD to make home improvements and buy new furniture. This will help her update her home for her large family. 

Amal is a conservative woman who prefers not to post her photo on the Internet. The above photo is of her husband.

loans.use: to pay for home improvements and furniture

loans.name: Aysha

texts.en:
Aysha is a 44-year-old wife caring for two sons and two daughters. Her husband works in the governmental sector.
Aysha has applied for this loan to support her small food store with more goods, in order to turn it into a mini market. This will bring her more revenue to help in paying the household bills.

loans.use: to support her small food store with more goods

loans.name: Hanadi

texts.en:
Hanadi, a 36-year-old conservative woman, has asked her husband to take her place in the photo.
Hanadi is a housewife caring for four children. She has recently started a small business at home selling clothes to help her husband in providing their kids with a better life. Now she has applied for this loan in order to bring in more clothes to sell.

loans.use: to bring in more clothes to sell

loans.name: Faryal

texts.en: Faryal is a 42-year-old woman from Al Karak, Jordan who supports 6 members of her family. She is requesting a loan of 400 JOD to buy clothes which she will then sell so that she can expand her business. Her future plans are to open her own shop to sell them from.

loans.use: to pay for clothes that she will sell

loans.name: Lerma

texts.en:
Lerma is a hog raiser in the village where she lives. She is 42 years old, married, with three children. She has been raising hogs to fatten and sell to butchers when the hogs achieve the desired weight. She wants to make sure her hogs become healthier so she can offer them at good price upon disposal, but she needs additional capital of PHP 10,000 to buy feed, medicines, and vitamins to sustain them. This will help maintain good income from her small business. 

She hopes to make her business profitable enough that she can save funds for her children's education. She is aiming for a stable living condition for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, medicines and vitamins  for hog sustenance

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana vive junto a su compañero de vida, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas desde hace quince años, tiene mucho tiempo de trabajar en este negocio y le ha dado muy buena experiencia, se siente orgullosa de que ha dado muy buenos resultados, la tortillería está ubicada en su vivienda y es muy conocida en el lugar pues vende las tortillas más ricas y calientitas, cuenta con mucha clientela y la prefieren porque lo que vende es de calidad, a precio accesible pero sobre todo con el servicio más rápido, adicional a esto también posee una crianza de ganado que le ayuda a completar los gastos del hogar; Juana es muy dedicada a su labor siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan aprovecharlas para obtener un futuro más próspero, desde hace algún tiempo aumento la demanda, por lo que Juana desea aumentar la producción, necesita  de capital para invertir en insumos por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, leña, etc. Juana tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable asegura que puede cancelar el financiamiento a tiempo y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en: Juana lives with her life partner.  She makes a living selling tortillas, which she has done for fifteen years.  She has spent much time working in this business and it has given her very good experience.  Juana is proud that her business has been successful.  Her tortilla shop is located in her home and is well known in the area, since the tortillas she sells are the freshest and most delicious.  Juana has many customers who like to buy her tortillas because of their quality and affordable price, and because her service is the fastest.  She also raises cattle, which helps her cover the household expenses.  Juana is very dedicated to her work, and is always on the lookout for new opportunities that could help her achieve greater prosperity in the future.  The demand for Juana’s tortillas has recently increased, and so she wants to increase her production.  She needs capital to purchase supplies for making tortillas, and that is why she is asking for a loan from Apoyo Integral.  The loan will allow her to buy corn in bulk, firewood, and other supplies.  Juana has good payment references and is very responsible.  She is confident that she can pay off her loan on time while providing her family with a full life.

loans.use: to purchase corn in bulk and firewood for making tortillas.

loans.name: Mary Rose

texts.en:
Mary Rose is 27 years old and married, with three children. Her husband is a farmer while Mary Rose is a vendor selling fruits and vegetables to the people in her village.  She earns about PHP 3,000 each month. Her income goes for daily meals and allowances. She would like to increase her sales so she is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy tomatoes, bananas, eggplant, and string beans to sell. This will help increase her sales and her income too. 

She hopes to make her business more profitable to pay for her children's education. This way, the family will achieve a better life someday.

loans.use: to buy tomatoes, bananas, eggplant, and string beans to sell

loans.name: Nemecia Antonia
